    bapp.me

    about

    preview

    join

    bapp.me

    Users: 121 . Toots: 199 . Connections: 436 . Language: English

    Welcome! Feel free to make an account and use this instance. I promise to keep it running if any users show up, at most I will close registration in the unlikely event that it gets too big for me to financially support.

    More Info... Registration is open unless it becomes a problem.

    Running on a 2CPU/2GB RAM droplet for now, will increase it if necessary (probably not past 50‚Ç¨/month or so but I might consider cheap colo hosting instead if it comes to that).

    Rules:

    No content promoting racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia or nazis allowed (and if your content skirts these categories then think twice before posting).

    I prefer restorative justice where possible but offending content will be removed, and continued toxicity results in a ban. Still pretty new to this whole thing and I set everything up manually instead of using a docker image as a learning experience so some things might be broken.

    Email: atbaaba@gmail.com

    Admin: @anttirt@bapp.me

    ivrianochi.com

    Ivri Anochi - ◊¢◊ë◊®◊ô ◊ê◊†◊ï◊õ◊ô

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    Welcome to Ivri Anochi - ◊¢◊ë◊®◊ô ◊ê◊†◊ï◊õ◊ô - a Mastodon based social network for Jews of all walks of life...
    Come on in, pull up a chair and make yourself comfortable. We're happy to have you.

    #Jewish #Jew #Hebrew #Israel


    More Info... Ivri Anochi - ◊¢◊ë◊®◊ô ◊ê◊†◊ï◊õ◊ô is a custom instance of the Mastodon Social Network which is made available for the Jewish world. It is moderated, and any and all forms of anti-semitism will result in immediate banning. While this instance is created primarily for Jews, we do not discriminate against persons of other faiths or origins, so long as they abide by our standards.

    All tooters on this instance are expected to uphold an environment that is tolerant and inclusive with respect for all users of the instance. It is expected that members adhere to general codes of conduct, and avoid the following:

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct Users are responsible for their own content, and their help in addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct is greatly appreciated.

    Email: info@ivrianochi.com

    Admin: Not Available

    ÁæéÂë≥„Åó„Åù„ÅÜ„Å™„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§öÂ™í‰Ωì„ÅßÁ¥π‰ªã„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åø„Çì„Å™„Å´„É¨„Ç∑„Éî„ÇíÁü•„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„Çâ„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åß„ÄÅÁæéÂë≥„Åó„ÅÑÊñôÁêÜ„Çí‰∏ñ„ÅÆ‰∏≠„Å´Â∫É„ÇÅ„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇ„Çø„Ç§„É†„É©„Ç§„É≥‰∏ä„ÅÆÂ∫ÉÂëä„ÇÑÁ¥π‰ªã„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅÑ„Åü„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åß„ÄÅÂèéÁõä„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÇíÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åï„Åõ„ÇãÁÇ∫„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®Ôºà„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº‰ª£„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ªÁ≠âÔºâ„Å´ÂÖÖ„Å¶„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫à„ÇÅ„Åî‰∫ÜÊâø‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑÔºÅÊúÄÂàù„ÅØÈöèÂàÜ„Å®ÊåÅ„Å°Âá∫„Åó„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÜ„Åã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅÈù¢ÁôΩ„Åù„ÅÜ„Å™„ÅÆ„ÅßÂßã„ÇÅ„Å¶„Åø„Åü„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºÅ„Åß„ÅØÔΩûÔºÅ

    More Info...

    ‚òÖÈáçË¶ÅÔºöÁôªÈå≤Á¢∫Ë™ç„É°„Éº„É´„Åå„ÄÅËø∑ÊÉë„É°„Éº„É´„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„Å´Â±ä„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„ÅôÔºÅÔºÅÁâπ„Å´Gmail„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅîÁ¢∫Ë™çÈ†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„ÅôÔºÅHTML„É°„Éº„É´„ÅåÂèó‰ø°„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑ„Çπ„Éû„ÉõÁ≠â„Åß„ÅØÁôªÈå≤„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åõ„ÇìÔºÅ

    ‚ÄªÂñÑ„ÅØÊÄ•„ÅíÔºÅ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åß„ÄÅÊÄ•„Åç„ÇáÈñãÂßãËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ‰ªäÂæå„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂ÊñπÈáù„Åå„Åæ„Å†Á¢∫ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    „ÄêÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ/ÂÖçË≤¨‰∫ãÈ†Ö/Á¶ÅÊ≠¢‰∫ãÈ†Ö„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„Äë

    ‚òÖ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Å´ÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„Çã„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´Á≠â„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∫∫„ÅØÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Åü„ÅîÊú¨‰∫∫„Å´Ê≥ïÁöÑ„Å™Ë≤¨‰ªª„ÅåÁîü„Åò„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁô∫Ë®ÄÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÂçÅÂàÜÊ∞ó„Çí‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÁôªÈå≤„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÅÆIP„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Åã„ÇâÂÄã‰∫∫„ÅÆÁâπÂÆö„ÅØ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çà„Çç„Åó„Åè„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅåË¶ã„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫„Å∏„ÅÆÂ®ÅÂúßÁöÑ„Å™„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÇÑ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„Çí„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚òÖ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂáçÁµê„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    ÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅÆ„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„Åå‰∏çÂø´„Å´ÊÄù„ÅÜÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´„ÅØ„Å©„Çì„Å©„Çì„Å®„Éü„É•„Éº„Éà„ÇÑ„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áä∂Ê≥Å„ÅåÁ∂ö„ÅÑ„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÈÄöÂ†±„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÔºïÂõû‰ª•‰∏ä„ÄÅÂêåÊßò„ÅÆÈÄöÂ†±„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åü„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„Åß„ÇÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç„Åó„Åü‰∏ä„Åß„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆ‰∫àÂëä„Å™„Åè1ÔΩûÔºí„ÅãÊúàÈñìÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÄÅË©≤ÂΩì„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Çí„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„Çí„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Å®„ÄÅ„É≠„Éº„Ç´„É´TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„ÅÆ„Éõ„Éº„É†TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªäÂæå„ÄÅ‰ªïÊßò„ÅåÂ§âÊõ¥„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÔºëÔΩûÔºí„ÅãÊúàÈñì„ÅÆÊúüÈñì‰∏≠„Å´‰∏çÂø´„Å™ÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇÑÈÅéÊøÄ„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„Åå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„Åó„Åü„Çâ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíËß£Èô§Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆÂÆåÂÖ®ÂáçÁµê„ÇíËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ´å„Åå„Çâ„ÅõË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØ„ÄÅÂàë‰∫ã‰∫ã‰ª∂„Å®„Å™„ÇãÂ®ÅÂäõÊ•≠ÂãôÂ¶®ÂÆ≥Á≠â„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁØÄÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„Çã‰∫§ÊµÅ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªËá™Ë≤ª„ÅßÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÅÆÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÅåÈùûÂ∏∏„Å´‰Ωé„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´Ë≤†Ëç∑„ÅÆÊéõ„Åã„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÂ∫¶„Å´30‰ª∂‰ª•‰∏ä„ÅÆCSV„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã„Å®„ÄÅÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÇíË∂Ö„Åà„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ßÈáè„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„ÉàÁ≠â„ÅØÁµ∂ÂØæ„Å´„ÅäÊéß„Åà‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇPawooÁ≠â„Å®ÊØî„Åπ„Çã„Å®Êï∞ÂçÉÂÄç„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÅÆÂ∑Æ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÅîÁêÜËß£È†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª‰ªñ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØÂéüÂâáÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å®„ÅØÈñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑ„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÅåÂ§ßÂπÖ„Å´Â¢ó„Åà„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„ÅåÈÅÖ„Åè„Å™„Å£„Åü„Çä„ÄÅHDD„ÅÆÂÆπÈáè„Åå‰∏ÄÊùØ„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÜ„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂºäÂÆ≥„ÅåÂá∫„ÇãÁÇ∫„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªñ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅpawoo.net„ÇÑfriends.nicoÁ≠â„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åã„Çâ„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„Å®Èñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÂÆ£‰ºùÁõÆÁöÑ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØÂç≥ÊôÇ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇË≤ßÂº±„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å™„Çì„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÊçúÊüªÊ©üÈñ¢Á≠â„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆË¶ÅË´ã„ÅåÊù•„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„ÇπÁ≠â„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®Á≠â„ÅÆË≤†ÊãÖ„ÅåÁµêÊßãÂ§ß„Åç„ÅÑÁÇ∫„ÄÅ‰ªäÂæåÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ª„ÇíË≥Ñ„ÅÜÁÇ∫„Å´„ÄÅÂ∫ÉÂëäÁ≠â„ÅåÂÖ•„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊúÄÁµÇÁöÑ„Å´ÊØéÊúà„Ç¶„É≥ÂçÅ‰∏áÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®„ÅåÊéõ„Åã„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „ÅîÊäïÁ®øÈ†Ç„ÅÑ„Åü„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§öÂ™í‰Ωì„Åß„ÅÆÁ¥π‰ªã„ÇÑ‰∫∫Âè£Áü•ËÉΩ„ÇíÁî®„ÅÑ„Åü„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅßÂà©Áî®„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂèéÁõä„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÇíÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åï„Åõ„ÇãÁÇ∫„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®Ôºà„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº‰ª£„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ªÁ≠âÔºâ„Å´ÂÖÖ„Å¶„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÈÄÄ‰ºöÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÅÆÊ©üËÉΩ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁèæÂú®„ÅÆ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Å´„ÅØ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜËÄÖ„Å´„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°È†Ç„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åã„Å≠„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫à„ÇÅ„Åî‰∫ÜÊâø‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÈÄÄ‰ºö„Å´Ëøë„ÅÑÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„Åü„ÅÑÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅîËá™Ë∫´„Åß„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„ÉØ„Éº„Çí„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÇíÂ§ñ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÂ§â„Åà„ÄÅ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÇíÊç®„Å¶„Ç¢„Éâ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„Åô„ÇãÁ≠â„ÅÆÂØæÂøú„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂøÖË¶Å„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    https://digitalnews365.com/mastodon-3„ÄÄÁ≠âWEB‰∏ä„ÅÆ„Éö„Éº„Ç∏„Çí„ÅîÂèÇÁÖß‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„Åå„ÅÇ„Å£„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„ÅÆ„Éö„Éº„Ç∏„Å´„Å¶„ÅîÂ†±ÂëäËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅåÂà•ÈÄîÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÇíÈô§„Åç„ÄÅÊú¨„Éö„Éº„Ç∏‰∏ä„Å´Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÇíË°®Á§∫„Åó„ÅüÊôÇÁÇπ„Çà„ÇäÂäπÂäõ„ÅåÁîü„Åò„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    mastodon.hasameli.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 49 . Toots: 5854 . Connections: 714 . Language: English

    Welcome to Hasameli!

    This is the Mastodon instance associated with Hasameli Information Services. "Hasameli" is the ancient Hittite god of the forge - and here at Hasameli, we like to forge new tools for the information security community. The projects that we build can be found at our github repo .

    Please note that the registrations are whitelisted to hasameli.com domains only. See the patreon for details.

    Our terms of service are fairly simple:

      This server is hosted in the United States, so please keep all content legal within this jurisdiction.
      Additionally, we would prefer to keep our content relatively SFW. Please make use of the CW flag if you want to post anything that is potentially NSFW.
      We are infosec people, so we understand [and sympathise with!] the desire to explore and experiment - but if you do find any issues, kindly report them to your administrator, @munin, rather than going hog-wild and raising his blood pressure.
      If @munin ends up having his blood pressure raised, he reserves the right to kick you off for any or no reason. I know what rules lawyering is and that's why I'm not setting specific terms.

    If you would like to support us, or see what else we're working on, try out our patreon page

    Other than that - have fun, and enjoy tooting!

    For those of you in the Hasameli community, the sysop for this instance is @munin [valid here and on birdsite]

    He can also be found at github as Dr-Syn, and can be emailed via the contact above.

    The federation policy is to allow federation to and from all other servers by default.

    However, should users of this server note significant abuse from a specific other server, the sysop may opt to block the other server at his discretion.

    Welcome to the madness place!

    Email: munin+mastodon@hasameli.com

    Admin: Not Available

    More Info... „Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅÆ„É´„Éº„É´„ÅØjp-mstdn.com„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅÆ„É´„Éº„É´„Å´Ê∫ñ„Åò„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „É´„Éº„É´

    „Ç§„É≥„Çø„Éº„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÅØÂÖ¨ÂÖ±„ÅÆÂ†¥„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Å™„Çì„Åß„ÇÇ„Åó„Å¶ËâØ„ÅÑÂ†¥„Åß„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Çí‰∏çÂø´„Å´„Åï„Åõ„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Ë®ÄÂãï„ÄÅË°åÂãï„ÅØË¨π„Çì„Åß„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ„ÅÇ„Åæ„Çä„Å´ÁõÆ„Å´‰Ωô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Ë®ÄÂãï„ÄÅË°åÂãï„Åå„ÅÇ„Å£„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂáçÁµê„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂá¶ÁΩÆ„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ„Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØÊó•Êú¨„ÅÆÊ≥ïÂæã„ÇíÈÅ©Áî®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Êó•Êú¨„ÅÆÊ≥ïÂæã„Å´Âèç„Åô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Ë°åÁÇ∫Á≠â„ÅåË¶ã„Çâ„Çå„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÇÇ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂáçÁµêÁ≠â„ÅÆÊé™ÁΩÆ„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‰∏ÄËà¨„Å´18Á¶Å„Å®Âëº„Å∞„Çå„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™ÊñáÁ´†„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØContent Warning„ÅßÈö†„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ18Á¶Å„ÅÆ„É°„Éá„Ç£„Ç¢ÔºàÁîªÂÉè„Å™„Å©Ôºâ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ‰∏çÈÅ©Âàá„Å™„Ç≥„É≥„ÉÜ„É≥„ÉÑ„Å®„Åó„Å¶„Éû„Éº„ÇØ„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ(NSFW„Éú„Çø„É≥„Åß„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô)

    „Éï„Ç©„É≠ÁàÜ„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç°„ÉúÁàÜ„ÄÅÈÄ£Êäï‰ªñÈÅéÂ∫¶„Å´„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´Ë≤†Ëç∑„Çí„Åã„Åë„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    BOT„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    ÂéüÂâáBOT„Çí‰Ωú„Çã„Å®„Åç„ÅØÁã¨Ëá™„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Çí‰ΩúÊàê„Åó„Å¶„Åù„Åì„Åß„ÇÑ„Å£„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    BOT„Å´„Çà„ÇãËá™Áô∫„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØ„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    ÊÇ™Ë≥™„Å†„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥ÂêàÈÄ£Áµ°„Å™„Åó„Å´ÂáçÁµê„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂá¶ÁΩÆ„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÊÉÖÂ†±„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    Mastodon„ÅÆ‰ªïÊßò„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÊßò„ÅÆ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÊÉÖÂ†±Á≠â„ÅØÂÖ®„Å¶ÂΩì„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´‰øùÂ≠ò„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„Çå„Çâ„ÅÆÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅØ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„Å´Á¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´Êèê‰æõ„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÂØÑ‰ªò

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅØÁßÅÔºàpinfortÔºâ„ÅÆÁßÅË≤ª„ÅßÈÅãÂñ∂„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆenty„ÅÆ„Éö„Éº„Ç∏„Åã„ÇâÂØÑ‰ªò„Çí„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åë„Çã„Å®„ÅÜ„Çå„Åó„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Çà„ÇäÂº∑„ÅÑ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´ÁßªË°å„Åß„Åç„Çã„Åã„ÇÇÔºü

    pinfort„ÅÆenty

    scifi.fyi

    about

    preview

    join

    Scifi!

    Users: 81 . Toots: 1689 . Connections: 443 . Language: English

    Scifi.Fyi is a general-purpose mastodon instance that seeks to foster a happy, inclusive community. All are welcome.
    We host monthly book clubs!
    We are reading Hothouse by Brian W. Aldiss for the month of May and everyone is welcome to participate under the hashtag #ScifiBookClub

    More Info...

    Some things to keep in mind while you're here:

    Add content warnings to your posts liberally. Someone's happiness will always be worth more than a few extra clicks.

    Hate speech and abuse of any kind will not be tolerated.

    This instance welcomes discussion in all languages.

    Please block follow bots if you encounter them.

    Additionally, please refer to the code of conduct outlined at mastodon.social.

    Running this instance has been an incredible learning opportunity for me and, like all great learning opportunities, accidents happen. If you are looking for a more stable place to call your home I can't recommend cybre.space highly enough.

    As long as you don't mind a little turbulence from time to time I would love for you to join us as we explore the final frontier.

    Domain blocks:

    SILENCE

    woofer.alfter.us

    social.au2pb.net

    gorf.club

    wrongthink.net

    SUSPEND

    rainbowdash.net

    shitposter.club

    freezepeach.xyz

    social.heldscal.la

    noadgendasocial.com

    sealion.club

    porntoot.com

    gs.smuglo.li

    unsafe.space

    pawoo.net

    Email: cwm@posteo.net

    Admin: @cwm@scifi.fyi

    mastodos.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Êó•Êú¨„ÅÆÊ≥ïÂæã„ÉªÂÖ¨Â∫èËâØ‰øó„Å´Âèç„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Å©„Åô

    Mastodon Opportun.e

    Users: 428 . Toots: 4389 . Connections: 715 . Language: English

    Une instance ouverte √† tou.te.s, qui se veut un minimum inclusive :

    • serveur r√©serv√© aux personnes parlant fran√ßais ou anglais, par souci de facilit√© de mod√©ration.
    • Sexisme, racisme, homophobie et toutes formes d'exclusion des minorit√©s sont √† proscrire pour le bien √™tre de tou.te.s.
    • Respectez la vie priv√©e des personnes.
    • Utilisez les tags et autres CW que vous jugez adapt√©s, en particulier pour le contenu NotSafeForWork (NSFW).
    • Essayez d'√™tre pr√©v√©nant.e.s et inclusif.ve.s.
    • Si l'un de vos propos est per√ßu comme excluant et que quelqu'un vous en informe, √©coutez. Nous sortirons tou.te.s grandi.e.s d'un tel dialogue.

    Sachez que nous pr√©f√©rerons toujours notre libert√© d'√™tre ensemble √† votre libert√© d'exclure.

    J'ai d√©cid√© de ne pas mod√©rer l'ext√©rieur de l'instance (bloquer des instances et/ou utilisatrices/eurs d'autres instances), sauf exceptions qui seront signal√©es ici et annonc√©es publiquements si des cas graves se pr√©sentent. J'estime qu'il est √† chacun.e de choisir ce qu'iel veut lire de l'ext√©rieur.

    Merci au POOP, dont je ne cesse de m'inspirer de leur code de conduite .

    Silence (and reject media file) instance :

    • pawoo.net
    • awoo.space

    More Info... Cette instance est h√©berg√©e en France. Chez moi, un administrateur syst√®me lambda, mais plut√¥t engag√©.

    L'acc√®s √† Internet se fait via un VPN associatif d'Illyse sur une fibre optique chez une grand fournisseur d'acc√®s √† internet commercial fran√ßais.

    De ce fait, le service d√©pent directement d'un acc√®s √† Internet grand public, et de mat√©riel grand public, je fais mon possible pour que tout fonctionne au mieux mais je ne peux pas vous garantir un service constant, ni de GTR, ni SLA.

    For non-french people.

    This instance is open to everyone, willing to have a modicum inclusivity:

    Server only for french and english speaking, to facilitate the moderation.

    Sexism, racism, homophobia and any other minority exclusion should be avoided.

    Respect for privacy.

    Use tags and CW when you consider them relevant, in particular for NotSafeForWork (NSFW) contents.

    Try to be considerate and inclusive.

    If you are saying things that could be perceived as excluding and someone informs you, listen. We will all come out enriched from the dialogue.

    Be aware that we will always prefer our freedom to be united than your freedom to exclude.

    I decided to not moderate outside the instance (blacklist other instances and/or users for other instances), with a few exceptions which will be publicly announced for serious cases. I consider that everyone should make his own choices regarding what he wants to read from outside.

    Thanks to the POOP for their inspiring code of conduct.

    This instance is hosted in France by myself, an average system administrator but rather committed.

    Internet access is directly done through a voluntary VPN of Illyse over a fiber provided by a major french ISP.

    Hence, the service depends on general public Internet access and hardware. I do my best, but I can't guarantee continuous service, nor SLA, nor MTTR.

    Email: courgette@unicorntelecom.eu

    Admin: @Courgette@mastodon.opportunis.me

    Mastodon.top

    Users: 942 . Toots: 44984 . Connections: 718 . Language: English

    Fran√ßais :

    Mastodon.top est une instance mastodon h√©berg√©e en France par VirtuBox . Notre instance est mise √† jour √† chaque nouvelle release de mastodon. Visitez notre page √† propos pour en savoir plus sur les r√®gles de l'instance et notre politique de mod√©ration.

    English :

    Mastodon.top is an mastodon instance hosted in France by VirtuBox . Our instance is updated with each new release of mastodon. Visit our about page to learn more about the rules of the instance and our moderation policy.

    More Info... Welcome on mastodon.top !

    We are very happy to be a part of the mastodon project and we will do our best to keep this instance running up. The instance is updated with each new release of mastodon, and we perform a daily backup on a offsite storage. We support freedom of speech, and we will not block instances or users unless there is a good reason. We may silence users or instances to hide them in the public timeline, this way only followers will see their toots.

    Follow-us

    ‚Ä¢ Status@mastodon.top

    ‚Ä¢ Thomas @VirtuBox

    ‚Ä¢ VirtuBox

    Rules :

    ‚Ä¢

    Don't flood

    ‚Ä¢

    Respect each other

    ‚Ä¢

    Legal NSFW is allowed with Content Warning only

    ‚Ä¢

    Use content warning for spoilers

    ‚Ä¢

    Our servers are under French jurisdiction.

    What is under the hood ? :

    ‚Ä¢ 8 vCores XEON E5-1620v2

    ‚Ä¢ 8GB RAM DDR3 ECC

    ‚Ä¢ 100GB SSD + Backup storage

    Server status :

    The full monitoring dashboard is available here.

    mastodon.top is hosted by VirtuBox

    Install mastodon tutorial available on Anystack & Jesuisadmin

    Email: contact@virtubox.net

    Admin: @virtubox@mastodon.top

    Qwerty City

    Users: 1 . Toots: 74 . Connections: 364 . Language: English

    take me down to Qwerty City \
    where the tyuiop is asdfgh \
    and the ghjkl are zxcvbn

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    Bots and automated accounts

    Automated accounts (‚Äúbots‚Äù) should follow these guidelines:

    Bots should include, in their user information, an indication that they are automated.

    Bots should include, in their user information, a link to their creator. This may be an account on mastodon.social, an account on another Mastodon instance, or a link to a method by which mastodon.social moderators and administrators can easily contact the owner of the bot.

    In most circumstances, bots should be limited to Unlisted posts. Consider carefully whether you want your bot‚Äôs posts to appear on the public timeline.

    Minor transgressions

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    Major transgressions

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Automatic suspension

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Harassment

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Moderators

    The following Mastodon.Social community moderators will follow our moderation protocol while ensuring the above guidelines are respected:

    @CM_chrismartin

    @CM_eramdam

    @CM_noelle

    @CM_rushyo

    Email: cwm@posteo.net

    Admin: @cwm@qwerty.city

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„ÅØ„ÄÅGoogle Analytics„Å™„Å©„ÅÆ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„ÇπËß£Êûê„ÇÑÂ∫ÉÂëä„ÅÆÊé≤Ëºâ„ÄÅ„Åù„Åó„Å¶ÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆÂèéÈõÜ„Çí‰∏ÄÂàáË°å„Å£„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÂÆâÂøÉ„Åó„Å¶„ÅîÂà©Áî®‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅZabbix„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶Ê≠ªÊ¥ªÁõ£Ë¶ñ„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „É´„Éº„É´

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅØÊó•Êú¨ÂõΩÂÜÖ„Å´„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÊó•Êú¨„ÅÆÊ≥ï‰ª§„Å´Âèç„Åó„Å™„ÅÑÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑ„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„ÅÆÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢‰∫ãÈ†Ö„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰∏ãË®ò„Å´„Åæ„Å®„ÇÅ„Å¶„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‰æã„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÔΩ¢Âá∫‰ºö„ÅÑÁ≥ª„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„Å∏„ÅÆË™òÂ∞éÔΩ£, ÔΩ¢ÁäØÁΩ™‰∫àÂëäÔΩ£ Á≠â„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Å™„Ç≥„É≥„ÉÜ„É≥„ÉÑ„ÅØ

    „ÉÜ„Ç≠„Çπ„Éà„Å´„ÅØÔΩ¢Content Warning (ÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Ê≥®ÊÑè)ÔΩ£„Çø„Ç∞„Çí„ÄÅ

    ‚úÖ ‚Üê„Åì„ÅÆ„Éû„Éº„ÇØ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜËÄÖ„ÅåÊâøË™ç„Åó„ÅüÊñπ„ÅÆ„Åø„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂà©Áî®„Åó„Åü„ÅÑÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁõÆÁöÑ„ÇíÊ∑ª„Åà„Å¶„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    meemu.org

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 15 . Toots: 364 . Connections: 365 . Language: English

    A fluffy mascotted mastodon instance. Join us to worship in the cult of meemu, or if you just want to join a queer/furry friendly mastodon instance. Racist/sexist/homophobic/"loli" content is not welcome on this instance.

    More Info... The cult of meemu, here, in the flesh and digital.

    This instance is intended to be queer friendly and will be moderated with that goal in mind.

    The following was taken from mastodon.social on April 13th, 2017 and the server will be run in accordance with these guidelines.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in the United States of America, where this instance resides

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @meemu@meemu.org

    scotland.computer

    about

    preview

    join

    Scottish Tech Mastodon

    Users: 29 . Toots: 102 . Connections: 145 . Language: English

    An instance of the Mastodon social network for the tech/startup scene in Scotland.

    The goal is to gather all the web/tech people in one place to make for an interesting local timeline.

    You don't need to actually be Scottish or in Scotland! Friends, the curious, and all of good will are welcome!

    More Info... This is an open instance of the Mastodon social network, aimed at gathering the Scottish web/tech/startup scene in one local timeline.

    You don't need to be Scottish or in Scotland to be welcome here! If you're interested in the tech scene, or friends with people here, you're more than welcome!

    Code of Conduct

    This will be fleshed out in more detail at a later date, but the summary is:

    Show respect for people's personal space. If they don't want you in their mentions, leave.

    Do not use this platform to harass, stalk, troll, spam, or otherwise be a dick.

    No nazis.

    If you are experiencing harassment or spamming, please report the offending account and I'll investigate. If you feel at risk or otherwise want to contact the admin directly, I can be reached at john@scotland.computer.

    The mgmt reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason, except as prohibited by law.

    Email: john@scotland.computer

    Admin: @semanticist@scotland.computer

    wickedtotally.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Wicked Totally

    Users: 76 . Toots: 77 . Connections: 301 . Language: English

    wickedtotally.com

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: atergens@gmail.com

    Admin: @AterNox@wickedtotally.com

    rich.gop

    about

    preview

    join

    Rich.GOP

    Users: 152 . Toots: 2060 . Connections: 779 . Language: English

    Rich.GOP is an open, privacy-conscious, decentralized social network, dedicated to honest, open, and civil political discourse.

    This instance is funded and maintained by @Motoma

    One of the incredibly important pieces of a decentralized social network is diversity of options. To that end I maintain a public Mastodon instance at https://rich.gop . This instance is free of ads, marketers, and stalkers.

    I provide this service on a virtualized infrastructure that I own. I would like to improve that infrastructure, in the dimensions of availability, reliability, and speed. Users of a free and public tools shouldn't be beholden to a second-rate service. Here, I leverage my 13 years of professions distributed software development and hosting experience to deliver a first-class experience to my users.

    If you would like to support me in my goal of delivering this quality service to the public, please consider supporting this site on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/motoma

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    Welcome to Rich.GOP! This Mastodon instance is here you with a friendly environment where you can converse, exchange and discuss ideas, politely debate political subjects, and converse about any other aspects of your lives. Communities are at their best when participants treat each other with respect and courtesy. Therefore, by signing up for an account, you are explicitly agreeing to conduct yourself in a civilized manner when using this instance.

    As a user of this instance, you agree to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    As a user of this instance, you commit to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, or political affiliation.

    By creating an account on this instance, you agree to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting @Motoma or by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances.

    Email: motoma@gmail.com

    Admin: @Motoma@rich.gop

    Fukuda Takuro„Åä„Çà„Å≥‰∏ÄÈÉ®„ÅÆÊâøË™ç„Åï„Çå„Åü„É°„É≥„Éê„Éº„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„ÄÅÈÄöÁß∞„Äå„Å©„Å©„Çì„Åå‰∏º„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜMastodon(Twitter„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™)ÈØñ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊâøË™ç„Åï„Çå„Åü‰∫∫„ÅØÂ§ßÊäµ„Åä„Å£„Åã„Å™„ÅÑ„Åì„Å®„ÅØ„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÜ„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÊõ∏„ÅçËæº„ÅøË¶èÂà∂„ÅØÁâπ„Å´Ë®≠„Åë„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Åß„ÇÇÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶„ÅØÁêÜÁî±ÊòéÁ§∫„ÅÆ‰∏äBAN„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊÇ™„Åó„Åã„Çâ„Åö„ÄÇ„Çà„Å£„ÅΩ„Å©„ÅÆ„Åì„Å®„Åå„Å™„ÅÑÈôê„ÇäËêΩ„Å®„Åô„Å§„ÇÇ„Çä„ÅØ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ In English version&further; information, pls click "About this instance".

    Ê•µÁ´Ø„Å´‰∏çÂø´(ex:Ë™πË¨ó‰∏≠ÂÇ∑„Å™„Å©)„Å™ÊäïÁ®ø„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÑ

    „Åì„Çå„Çâ„ÅÆÂü∫Ê∫ñ„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åô„Çã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Éª„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åî„Å®„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    -- English--

    This server for Fukuda Takuro and some approved members and named "Dodonga-don". Approved people may not toot dangerous/outrage/crazy contents, so this server didn't have restriction policy. But if I found problem toot, I'll ban with posting reasons. This server will never shutdown except when this server has the problem. This server's official language is "Japanese",and sometime "English" or "Spanish". Thanks for reading, I appreciate. Maintenance time: Every month, 0:30~0:32 JST and everyday, 2:30~2:40 JST. My Blog: "Shtore". Note: English version is not post frequently.

    Administrator's follow policy:

    MUST: Follow copyrights

    NOT: Curation media

    NOT: Affiliater/Ponzi scheme/Slur/Obscene/Risky

    MUST: Put CW/NSFW for nude/naked contents If you violate this policy, instance owner will block you or your instances.

    Email: tea_hugutaku („ÅÇ„Å£„Å®) yahoo.co.jp

    Admin: @f@social.otya.me

    social.lecker.coffee

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 2 . Toots: 1 . Connections: 270 . Language: German

    social.lecker.coffee

    More Info... Blocked instances

    We use the same blocking rules as Toot.cafe, which you can see here: Blocked instances

    Instance rules

    Rules are taken from Mastodon.social and Toot.cafe

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lecker.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Pornography and sexually explicit content

    Gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: HeadBarista@lecker.coffee

    Admin: @HeadBarista@social.lecker.coffee

    Put your Kitsune up!

    Since April 26 2017

    „É´„Éº„É´

    • We are THE ONE!

    Rules

    • Acts contrary to Japanese law are prohibited.
    • Acts that infringe the rights of others are forbidden.
    • Please do not post audio and video copied from CD, DVD, Blu-ray etc.
    • When you post photos and illustrations, please write down the source as much as possible.
      *In the case of illustrations, please be sure to state the author of it.
    • We are THE ONE!

    mastodon.network

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 6945 . Toots: 61251 . Connections: 1782 . Language: English

    A social network open to all users.

    More Info... This is a free and open Mastodon instance ran by @ian.

    We're one of the largest and most active Mastodon instances around, and we're quickly growing as a community. We are also federating with many of the other major instances. If you have questions about how this works or how to create your own instance, feel free to reach out.

    If you see any abusive behavior, please report it. Each report is reviewed personally. Please treat each other with respect.

    This instance is hosted on three servers: Two load balanced web servers and database server. They each have the following specifications:

    - 4 core Xeon 2.13GHz CPU

    - 8GB RAM

    - SSD storage

    Hosting costs are being covered by myself currently. If we need to upgrade servers in the future, I may post a link to help cover costs.

    If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

    Email: hello@mastodon.network

    Admin: Not Available

    • „Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆ‰Ωø„ÅÑÂõû„Åó„ÅØÁµ∂ÂØæ„Å´„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„Åß„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
      ‰∏ÄÈÄö„Çä„ÅÆ„Çª„Ç≠„É•„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£ÂØæÁ≠ñ„ÅØÊñΩ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÅåÂÆâÂÖ®„Å´Áµ∂ÂØæ„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ
    • „Çπ„Éû„Éõ„Éª„Ç±„Éº„Çø„Ç§„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÇíÁôªÈå≤„Å´Áî®„ÅÑ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ
      mastodon-notice_at_taruntarun.net ( _at_ „ÇíÔº†„Å´ÁΩÆÊèõ )
      „Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„ÇíÂèó‰ø°„Åß„Åç„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„Åã„ÇâÁôªÈå≤„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
    • „Ç®„É≠„Éª„Ç∞„É≠„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÁêÜÁî±„Åß 18 Á¶Å„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åù„ÅÜ„Å™ÊñáÁ´†„Å´„ÅØ Content Warning „ÄÅÂêåÁîªÂÉè„Å´„ÅØ NSFW „Çø„Ç∞„Çí‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ
      ÂÆà„Çâ„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂâäÈô§„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂØæÂá¶„Çí„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
    • 1 ÁßíÈñì„Å´‰ΩïÂõû„ÇÇ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Éª„Åµ„ÅÅ„Åº„Éª„Éñ„Éº„Çπ„ÉàÁ≠â„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´ÈÅéÂ∫¶„ÅÆË≤†Ëç∑„Çí„Åã„Åë„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØ„ÅäÈÅø„Åë„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    0day Agency social network

    Users: 23 . Toots: 77 . Connections: 244 . Language: English

    0day Agency - where your 0days fail and the world ends.

    We don't care

    We forget it all

    We don't know mercy

    Don't expect us

    We are 0day Agency

    This mastodon instance is information security related. But we are not the ones who take it too seriously. If shit happens, it happens.

    Don't trust anyone here. If shit happens to you, we don't care. It's your fault!

    Cry me a river!

    Rules:

    * No child porn

    * No warez

    * No racism

    For other stuff:

    I care a shit about what you post

    chaos.social

    about

    preview

    join

    chaos.social

    Users: 623 . Toots: 13028 . Connections: 883 . Language: English

    chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
    chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).
    Follow @ordnung for low-traffic instance-related updates.

    More Info... Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

    Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

    Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

    Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

    Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

    Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests

    Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.

    You can find further information on our instance in our GitHub repository, which also provides a list of currently blocked or silenced instances, alongside with reasons. We (@leah and @rixx) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

    Email: contact@chaos.social

    Admin: @ordnung@chaos.social

    webcommunity.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 75 . Toots: 256 . Connections: 123 . Language: English

    webcommunity.club

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @davatron5000@webcommunity.club

    mastodon.sandwich.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Sandwich

    Users: 323 . Toots: 1047 . Connections: 517 . Language: English

    This is Sandwich 's public Mastodon instance. Welcome! Moderation is at our discretion - please see below.
    We recommend that you read the #MastodonSandwich hashtag and @sungo's toot about Mastodon's risks . Feel free to chat with us about risk, privacy, security, and other questions.
    We support free and controversial speech, but also wish to maintain a pleasant environment. We forbid trolling, harassment, bigotry, and spam. Please use the Content Warning feature for NSFW or traumatic topics. When handling problems, we try to consider all of the circumstances, and to be reasonable and understanding.
    We will not sell your data, and will make every reasonable attempt to combat coerced disclosure of your data or our logs.

    Contact

    James Renken

    @jrenken

    Business e-mail:

    support@sandwich.net

    Email: support@sandwich.net

    Admin: @jrenken@mastodon.sandwich.net

    Up-to-date instance (running on latest commits of the master branch, not on tagged releases), and opened to everyone.

    The instance is running since the 03-04-2017, always on the master branch, so it way be unstable, but it's working the most of time ! It's opened to everyone, everything is allowed, except illegal things in France, where are the servers, harrassment and spam. IPv6 is activated, and storage is provided by an SSD. The instance is federating with everyone !

    securitymastod.one

    about

    preview

    join

    Security Mastodon

    Users: 2393 . Toots: 10669 . Connections: 917 . Language: English

    An open Mastodon instance for information security pros and enthusiasts. Donate to hosting expenses at PayPal or Patreon Didn't get a confirmation email? Check spam. Still no? Email notifications@securitymastod.one and ask to be manually activated.

    More Info... Donate to hosting expenses at PayPal or Patreon Hosting expenses are currently on a special; $63.99 total per year on an OpenVZ hosting provider. (This introductory price will probably not last, but a year is forever in internet time...) However, we have frequently experienced downtime due to hosting provider issues such as running into simultaneous connection limits, etc. The goal of asking for donations is to get $370/year to upgrade to a KVM VPS or dedicated server on a more stable hosting provider. This site is run by @scriptjunkie

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @scriptjunkie@securitymastod.one

    pawoo.net

    Code of Conduct

    We are dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone, and we do not tolerate harassment in any form.

    Please follow our code and rules:

    Be professional.

    Be responsible.

    Be welcoming.

    Be kind.

    Be respectful of other viewpoints and ideas.

    Be supportive and look out for each other.

    Don't flood

    Use NSFW tags for sensitive content

    Use content warning for spoilers

    Email: hello@hafen.io

    Admin: @HashDot@mastodon.hafen.io

    mastodon.direct

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 99 . Toots: 319 . Connections: 644 . Language: English

    Mastodon.direct is an open Mastodon instance welcoming people to discuss a broad range of topics. We strive to provide a high quality instance with reliability, speed, and a responsive moderation team.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    For abuse or copyright reports, please email abuse at this domain.

    Email: hello@mastodon.direct

    Admin: @djchen@mastodon.direct

    im-in.space

    about

    preview

    join

    SPAAAAACE!

    Users: 344 . Toots: 3201 . Connections: 1011 . Language: English

    Space. Space? I'm in space!
    This instance is using the Flat, Dark and Colourful! (Blue and Orange) stylesheet by @dia@aleph.land .
    Please follow @status to get updates and news!

    Space Core image by TertonDA

    More Info... Stats

    Status

    -

    NetData

    Registrations closed?

    Do you want to join but the registrations are closed? Ask Kody on that birbsite or on Mastodon with kdy@im-in.space! (Or use that as an email.)

    Code modifications

    We've made some changes to the Mastodon code and styles to personalize this instance. Our code is available on GitHub at im-in-space/mastodon.

    Blocked accounts and instances

    Due to the nature/behavior from some instances or users, we have silenced or suspended some of them. The complete list is available on GitHub, here.

    Basic rules

    Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech) and fight in direct messages.

    Please keep bad memes, sexism, racism or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

    If I get reports because you didn't respect the restrictions, you might get suspended.

    NSFW is allowed if you put it behind both NSFW and CW tags (below the message text box). Loli, gore and rape is not allowed.

    Don't make parody accounts and don't spam.

    We don't like bots who randomly follow users.

    Respect French law.

    In case of non-respect of those rules, use the report link (in the toot menu) or contact @kdy.

    Server info

    Like many other French people did, this server is hosted at Scaleway, in Paris.

    VC1M (4 x86 64bit Cores, 4GB memory) with a 50GB LSSD. Storage can be upgraded after a quick reboot.

    IPv4: 163.172.147.245

    IPv6: 2001:bc8:4400:2500::25:907

    We do daily offsite and encrypted backups.

    We will never look at your private toots, unless someone sends us a report about it.

    How long until this instance shuts down?

    Except if I suddenly don't have any money to run this, this instance will be running until the domain expires.

    For now it's until April 15th 2018, but we can renew it before we get there.

    Email: kdy@im-in.space

    Admin: @kdy@im-in.space

    jeunesse.media

    Bienvenue sur l'instance Jeunesse de Mastodon. Inscrivez-vous si vous √™tes int√©ress√©s par les livres, les magazines et les applications destin√©es aux enfants de 0 √† 18 ans.

    kosmos.social

    about

    preview

    join

    kosmos.social

    Users: 165 . Toots: 1631 . Connections: 560 . Language: English

    A friendly place for tooting. Run by the Kosmos peeps.

    More Info... Technical Details

    kosmos.social is currently hosted on a dedicated server at Hetzner in Germany (renewable energy source, German laws apply). We configure and deploy everything via Chef cookbooks. Your uploads are stored on Amazon S3. Automated backups are run regularly and pushed to S3 as well.

    Our fork of the source code is publicly available at https://github.com/67P/mastodon/ (we deploy the kosmos branch). We frequently update the repo and running code with the latest fixes and improvements.

    TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.

    IRC room

    If you're into that jazz, you can find us in #kosmos on Freenode. If there's no immediate response to a question, just idle for a while.

    The Rules

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of kosmos.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mail@kosmos.org

    Admin: @kosmos@kosmos.social

    Welcome to MastoBurn !

    The sign up is open.

    This Mastodon is administered by enthusiasts of server technology and self-hosting solution, who spends all their free time to eat linux documentation.

    This Mastodon will be maintained over the long term.

    Feel free to join us and share the Mastoburn instance to all your friends

    For any questions about our instance contact@mastoburn.com

    „Çø„Ç§„É†„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅÆ„ÉÅ„É©Ë¶ã„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ ÔΩú „Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅÆÊö´ÂÆö„É´„Éº„É´„Å™„Å©„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ

    „ÄêÊö´ÂÆö„É´„Éº„É´„Äë

    „Éª„Ç®„ÉÉ„ÉÅ„Å™Áµµ„Éª„Éù„É´„ÉéÁµµ„ÅØÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ

    I just opened this instance for the people who like oekaki (drawing & painting), especially for non-pornographic painters. This is a small and quiet instance yet, please feel free to join, toot and post your pictures.

    **temporary rules** Don't post any pictures containing sex & nudity.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @oekakist@toot.oekaki.st

    More Info... English version below, this instance is motsly french speaking.

    Le respect de la loi et des autres utilisateurs sont obligatoires.

    Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits.

    Les comptes parodiques sont tol√©r√©s √† condition de signaler qu'ils le sont dans leur description.

    Tous les contenus sont tol√©r√©s dans la limite de la l√©galit√©, utilisez le content warning pour les contenus

    inadapt√©s au public mineur ou nsfw.

    N'h√©sitez pas √† signaler tout message ne respectant pas les r√®gles.

    Toute personne ne respectant pas les r√®gles pourra voir son compte suspendu.

    Compliance with the law and respect of other users are mandatory.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are strictly prohibited.

    Parody account are allowed as long as their parodic status is clearly indicated in their description.

    Any type of content is allowed within the limits of the law, use content warning for nsfw or unsuitable for children contents.

    Feel free to report any message that do not follow the rules.

    Any user who breaks the rules may get suspended without warning.

    Email: maxime+mastodon@melinon.fr

    Admin: @DrEmixam@social.lou.lt

    Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits.

    Tous les contenus sont tol√©r√©s dans la limite de la l√©galit√©, utilisez le content warning pour les contenus inadapt√©s au public mineur ou nsfw.

    Toute personne ne respectant pas les r√®gles pourra voir son compte suspendu.

    voxpop.mediacast.ca

    about

    preview

    join

    Mediacast - Vox Populi

    Users: 24 . Toots: 6 . Connections: 190 . Language: English

    Open comment on current affairs with a Canadian focus . This instance embraces freedom of expression, as defined by our Charter . "Speak freely", says the law student grading their own paper.

    More Info... Open to all, free to use.

    Terms of Use

    We're working on it.

    Conduct

    Failure to use the "#nsfw" tag when media attached to a message depicts material unsuitable for viewing by a Canadian youth audience (persons under 18 years of age), examples of which include:

    nudity

    graphic violence

    Content

    The following types of content are explicitly forbidden and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children and youth (persons under 18 years of age)

    Threats of violence

    Content illegal in Canada and/or the United States of America.

    Federated instances

    Generally, follow their rules when visiting. Remote members will be expected to follow ours. For jurisdiction, start at the beginning.

    Network abuse

    Don't do it.

    Email: voxpop-contact@mediacast.ca

    Admin: @support@voxpop.mediacast.ca

    myfreckle.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - Myfreckle - Welcome

    Users: 66 . Toots: 111 . Connections: 244 . Language: English

    myfreckle.com

    More Info... About myfreckle.com:

    We believe Social Media is changing the world.

    This instance is for people who are fascinated with and enjoy being part of the change that Social Media is bringing.

    This instance has been set-up and continues to be maintained by professional developers. This instance is hosted on Amazon AWS infrastructure. We realise dependable infrastructure is important for a Social Media network to remain useful.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of myfreckle.com; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    General Rules and Guidelines

    Be nice to each other.

    Use common sense.

    Corporate accounts are welcome, but don‚Äôt overdo the posting and no direct advertising.

    Parody accounts are fine (identify your account as a parody), impersonation of others is not allowed.

    Bots are not allowed to post to the public timeline unless permission has been received from an admin.

    Automated posting is not allowed unless permission has been received from an admin.

    Content / behaviour that is illegal in the United States of America, Canada, France, Germany, United Kingdom or Australia is not permitted on this instance. Breach of this will result in a permanent ban of the account.

    The following content will be removed from the timeline and will get your account permanently banned:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Pornography and sexually explicit content

    Gore and extremely graphic violence

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    The administrators reserves the right of admission to this instance and the right to change the above from time to time except where limited by law. If there are any comments, questions please email the admins at freckle@myfreckle.com - please be patient as a response may take some time.

    Email: freckle@myfreckle.com

    Admin: Not Available

    anti.energy

    about

    preview

    join

    so very tired

    Users: 53 . Toots: 1359 . Connections: 656 . Language: English

    NO. FUCKING. NAZIS.

    More Info... This instance tracks https://github.com/d3vgru/mastodon which is a dev fork of Mastodon so it might not be like totally stable or anything.

    I am fairly anti-instance-block. I reserve the right but I'd really rather let users make their own sense of it.

    This particular instance should be considered experimental. I am currently tracking Mastodon releases but reserve the right to apply my own changes to the code and deploy them at any time. An example would be if an instance were making undue demands on resources and I found a way to throttle them without blocking.

    I want to replace the backend with a pure node API I am writing, then replace the web UI with something a little more my style. ReactJS? I dunno we'll see what's cool in 6 months. VueJS and Quasar. Trying to figure out the best way to let users still load the Mastodon UI if they like it.

    If I can get the new UI working, I'd like to add P2P capabilities so these networks can run more like torrent sharing and less like downloading from a server.

    Email: superbranch@riseup.net

    Admin: @superbranch@anti.energy

    glitch.social

    about

    preview

    join

    G L I T C H

    Users: 83 . Toots: 16193 . Connections: 764 . Language: English

    UNSTABLE BUT FRIENDLY

    BE WARNED this instance may actually be unstable at times. It will likely be used for experimenting with settings and tweaks to Mastodon. So the place may experience outages, not federate reliably with the rest of the world, have posts go missing, or other technical faults. As such it's meant to be a chill, maybe kinda playful place. Time to see what we can do with this thing! Time to À•‚àÄI∆ÜOS H∆Ü‚ä•IÀ•‚ÖÅ

    This instance also has domain level blocks on numerous others, using the block list found here .

    followbots from other instances will be blocked. please report them

    Some rules

    • Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
    • Racist, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.
    • You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)
    • try to be kind
    • no non-sentient bots until further notice
    • no shit that's illegal in Canada
    • animated gifs should always be marked sensitive/NSFW and identified as animated gifs (for now let's say just putting 'gif' in the text of the toot is sufficient), because they can cause serious problems for people

    some guidelines

    • stuff here is impermanent but i still want this to be as safe a space as we can reasonably make it. let's keep common triggers and angry/ranty/grumpy toots behind CWs
    • free speech maximalists can kindly fuck off. there are instances where that is a priority. this is not one of them.
    • all languages are welcome!

    the privacy stuff in the 'terms' isn't what it should be, but no time to change it yet. this instance's data will not be sold or traded or whatever.

    Contact

    beatrix bitrot

    @bea

    Business e-mail:

    haha@noooope.com

    Email: haha@noooope.com

    Admin: @bea@glitch.social

    Users: 22 . Toots: 206 . Connections: 223 . Language: Japanese

    Aqua Graphic(„Ç¢„ÇØ„Ç¢„Ç∞„É©„Éï„Ç£„ÉÉ„ÇØ)„Å®„ÅØ

    Aqua Graphic(„Ç¢„ÇØ„Ç¢„Ç∞„É©„Éï„Ç£„ÉÉ„ÇØ)„ÅØ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Ç¢„É™„Ç¶„É†„ÇÑÁÜ±Â∏ØÈ≠ö„ÄÅÊ∞¥ËçâÊ∞¥ÊßΩ„ÅåÂ•Ω„Åç„Å™Êñπ„ÅåÈõÜ„Åæ„Çå„Çã„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÊÉÖÂ†±‰∫§Êèõ„ÇÑ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Ç¢„É™„Ç¶„É†„ÅÆÂÜôÁúü„Å™„Å©„Çí„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÊòØÈùûÊ•Ω„Åó„Çì„Åß‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    social.weho.st

    about

    preview

    join

    social.weho.st

    Users: 93 . Toots: 4718 . Connections: 777 . Language: English

    This is an instance of mastodon that runs on the https://weho.st platform. weho.st is a non-profit internet service provider based in Amsterdam in the Netherlands.

    More Info... https://social.weho.st don't make use of advertising or external analytics software and does not make any money with your information. For more information on weho.st visit our FAQ.

    Blocked servers

    We have silenced the server pawoo.net due to a flood of images that are illegal in the US and EU. Their admin hasnt taken actions to moderate this content, if they do then we will consider removing the block.

    We aim to not block instances unless they are serving illegal content under Dutch or EU laws. We do not enjoy or condone censorship but fulfil our legal requirements when necessary.

    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administrators of social.weho.st.

    They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: hello AT weho DOT st

    Admin: @realitygaps@social.weho.st

    Open registration; email is a "work in progress" so confirmations may be manually processed.

    Rules:

    Don't be a jerk.

    Earn your bullshit. No ban evasion. While any account under your control is suspended or terminated, further use of this site is unauthorized. You may not access this site using any other account, nor register a new account under a different identity.

    Email: emacs.z.hemka@xoxy.net

    Admin: @hemka@emacs.li

    Les copains d'abord

    Users: 134 . Toots: 12837 . Connections: 626 . Language: English

    Vous √™tes les bienvenus si on a d√©j√† bu un verre ensemble !
    This site is for my friends. You're welcome if you know me in some way, for instance if we had a drink one day.

    H√©bergement : Dublin, Irlande. C'est moi qui d√©cide ce qui est permis ou pas, en tentant de le faire avec bienveillance et en tenant compte de l'avis des inscrits.     i.write.codethat.sucks

    about

    preview

    join

    We write code that sucks

    Users: 62 . Toots: 1043 . Connections: 598 . Language: English

    I write code that sucks, if you do too this is the place for you!

    More Info... Become a Patron!

    Site rules:

    Interaction with the community.

    Remember, people will never forget how you made them feel.

    Tag content that people may not want to see using the content warning function.

    Harassment and bullying of any kind will not be tolerated and will lead to a full suspension.

    Content

    Content illegal in the United Kingdom, France or the Netherlands is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Transphobic, homo/biphobic, racist, etc content is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Spam is prohibited.

    Bots are allowed but must not interact with users without being explicitly requested to.

    Network

    Please be aware that due to the nature of federated platforms, we have very little control over the behaviors of users from other communities.

    Use the standard mute and block functions where needed.

    However, please report users that offend the CoC of this instance and the administration will take action if necessary.

    Admin decisions are final and are not up for discussion.

    The rules set out above are guidelines for acceptable content/behavior and may be changed any time without notice.

    Please note the administration may take action in cases outside of the rules for the greater need of the community/federation at large.

    Suspended and silenced instances

    pawoo.net (Suspended)

    noagendasocial.com (Silenced)

    Email: kaylee@codethat.sucks

    Admin: @kaylee@i.write.codethat.sucks

    Cybrespace

    Users: 438 . Toots: 47501 . Connections: 1156 . Language: English

    ÔΩÉÔΩôÔΩÇÔΩíÔΩÖÔΩìÔΩêÔΩÅÔΩÉÔΩÖ: the social hub of the information superhighway

    jack in to the mastodon fediverse today and surf the dataflow through our cybrepunk, slightly glitchy web portal

    More Info... Join the conversation on im.cybre.space

    Administrators on this instance:

    @chr@nightpool

    Until deviation becomes necessary, this instance will follow the terms of service/code of conduct of the flagship instance. Please read and follow them while participating in this community.

    Additional guidelines:

    Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use NSFW tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.

    Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning

    Cybre.space is a multilingual instance and speakers of any language are welcome.

    All updates on site status, ToS changes, and so forth will be provided through @psa@cybre.space.

    The following domains are blocked by this instance:

    Domain Severity

    freezepeach.xyz suspend

    sealion.club suspend

    shitposter.club silence

    social.heldscal.la silence

    pawoo.net silence + no media

    noagendasocial.comsuspend

    unsafe.spacesuspend

    porntoot.comsilence + no media

    gs.archae.me silence

    gs.smuglo.li suspend

    Email: chr@cybre.space

    Admin: @chr@cybre.space

    mastod.life

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastod Life

    Users: 62 . Toots: 135 . Connections: 472 . Language: English

    A friendly mastodon instance for anyone to sign up to.

    • Fast
    • Secure
    • Stable
    • Reliable
    • Friendly
    • Awesome

    This instance does take a lot of hard work to run, and renting servers is not free. If it is at all possible a small donation towards the running costs would be grateful. You can follow this link for a few different methods of donating.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastod.life; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: paul.meeke@acclaro.digital

    Admin: @pmeeke@mastod.life

    Mastodon: vkdb@vkdn.jp

    Twitter: @vkdb

    ÊßãÊàê

    vkdn„ÅØGoogle Cloud Platform‰∏ä„ÅßÁ®ºÂÉç„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Çä„ÅÆ„Åô@Durandal / Áøî„Å°„Çì / ÊÉÖ„ÅëÁÑ°Áî®„ÅÆÁî∑ / „Åç„ÅÆ„Åó„Åü„Å≤„Åß„Çà„Åó„å† / Ê∞¥Ëâ≤ / „Éá„Éì„É´„É°„É≠„É≥ / ÂÖ®Á©∫‰∏Ä„ÅÆ„É™„É™„Ç£ / „ÇØ„É≠ / „Å™„Åé / „Åè„Çà„Éº / „Ç¨„É≥„Éû„É¨„Ç§ / s_kazuto / „Åó„Åó„Åå„ÇÑ / „ÇØ„É≠„Çº„É´ / Â±±ÈÇ£ / Ë©©Á¥ÄP@„Å°„Åè„Çè„å† / „Åû„Å£„Åè„Åô / „Åµ„Çã„Åê„Çâ / ‰πûÈ£ü

    resipsa.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Microblogging for Legal Professionals

    Users: 20 . Toots: 132 . Connections: 332 . Language: English

    resipsa.social is a microblogging platform, or more accurately an instance of the Mastodon platform, for legal professionals.

    This instance was originally intended to be for legal professionals, but all who respect the rules are welcome.

    In general, the rules are simple: be respectful of others -- their privacy, their content, and their right to be free from harassment.

    Don't be a bad seed.

    Email: andrew@leahey.org

    Admin: @Andrew@resipsa.social

    „Éï„Ç∏„Ç§„É¶„Ç¶„Ç∏::„Éâ„ÉÉ„Éà„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà „Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Éñ„É≠„Ç∞„Çí„Åü„Åæ„Å´Êõ¥Êñ∞„Åô„Çã‰∫∫„ÅåÁ´ã„Å¶„ÅüÂÄã‰∫∫„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÈÅ©ÂΩì„Å´„ÅîÂèÇÂä†„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ MASTOHOST„ÅßÂãï„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
