    social.csswg.org

    about

    preview

    join

    W3C CSS Working Group Mastodon

    Users: 115 . Toots: 95 . Connections: 312 . Language: English

    Mastodon server for anyone interested in CSS or general web development

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.csswg.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: csswg@csswg.org

    Admin: @csswg@social.csswg.org

    kinky.business

    about

    preview

    join

    Kinky Business

    Users: 166 . Toots: 3670 . Connections: 489 . Language: English

    kinky.business is a Mastodon instance for the kink community. All you naughty people are in the right place. Sign up and let's go :)

    More Info... I'm @bedtimedrillsgt, a 30-something Dom. Beard and boobs enthusiast.

    I built this Mastodon instance because there's plenty of room for fun sub-communities in the fediverse. And so, here is a home for all you kinky, filthy fucks.

    Discuss your hopes and desires, post your latest toys or bruises and most of all, have fun.

    If you have any questions or concerns, toot at me

    Rules

    Keep everything here safe, sane, and consensual. No exceptions.

    Do not flood the server with posts

    Use NSFW/CW tags for NSFW media

    Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

    Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content

    Feel free to report users or content that should not be here.

    Admins of this site reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    A note on federation

    Right now, this is a regularly federated instance. CW tags are somewhat necessary not to get blocked by other servers. In the future, I'd prefer to federate only with other naughty Mastodon instances, and we can drop the CW requirement.

    Email: admin@kinky.business

    Admin: @bedtimedrillsgt@kinky.business

    anticapitalist.party

    about

    preview

    join

    anticapitalist.party

    Users: 878 . Toots: 32478 . Connections: 1105 . Language: English

    Anticapitalist Mastodon instance. Party means fun, not political party. But we're still political.

    This instance follows stable updates (currently v1.3.3), it's not getting dev updates from the master branch.

    Registrations are invite-only on this instance. You must be recommended by a user to get in. How to invite a friend to anticapitalist.party ? Or : Joining anticapitalist.party without an invite

    More Info... Hello everyone! Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

    In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

    anticapitalist.party wasn't designed for sensitive militant operations. Such operations shouldn't be discussed here, and on any other social network. Details

    Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here. Illegal content will be deleted,

    and may lead to an account suspension.

    Porn is allowed, with NSFW tag on. Porn without that tag will be deleted.

    Content Warning HAS to be used for the following :

    violence (text and medias)

    stories including *phobias (text and medias)

    sexual content (text and medias)

    Please remember to use the NSFW tags for all of the above, are medias are displayed enven with Content Warning on.

    Parody accounts are allowed, and are advised to specify that they are as such in their description or name.

    We're blocking the following instances (what I think about blocking instances) :

    .tg {border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;}

    .tg td{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;}

    .tg th{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;}

    .tg .tg-9hbo{font-weight:bold;vertical-align:top}

    .tg .tg-yw4l{vertical-align:top}

    instance

    severity

    reason

    shitposter.club

    suspend

    harrassment

    sealion.club

    suspend

    annoying bots

    mastodon.technology

    silence

    big instance with no CoC at the time of blocking

    gs.smuglo.li

    silence

    lots of nsfw pictures without the tag

    Please use the report feature if you see a rule violation. Be specific by including a comment

    @Akatookey is in charge of moderation

    @corzntin is in charge of technical and security stuff

    ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning! I am not a professional sysadmin, and downtime may happen ‚Äî you have been warned.

    Don‚Äôt forget to follow me on Mastodon and Twitter to stay up-to-date with problems, updates and server downtime : @corzntin

    The ancom elefriend displayed on Getting Started page was made by @cigazze and is published under CC-BY 3.0. Thanks to her for her work !

    Because hosting has a cost, donations can be made on Patreon, PayPal, or using Bitcoins : 13WxR6gsxDu6Wt4JpTHuAxK64GHHzgVHjY. Thanks very much !

    Email: self@corzntin.fr

    Admin: @corzntin@anticapitalist.party

    This is a work in progress so be patient and be cool

    If you want to support this server or continuing development, bitcoin is always appreciated.
    1F69UCFCL24xNcRzCeRFMNmGLuaPi1z8yn

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of nomofomo.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: info@nomofomo.social

    Admin: @internaut@nomofomo.social

    aigisdon.net

    infinimatix.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Infinimatix

    Users: 59 . Toots: 383 . Connections: 422 . Language: English

    Infinimatix, coined by blending infinity and informatics , is a community of interest in informatics with a federated node in the Mastodon fediverse. The topics of informatics that we are interested in are mainly big data, data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, deep learning, data mining, information systems, cyber security, web design, web development, web performance optimization, human-computer interaction, user experience design, and so on. Reach out to @derekcecillewis if you'd like to have an appropriate discipline added to the list.

    Contact

    Derek Lewis

    @derekcecillewis

    Email: derlewis@iu.edu

    Admin: @derekcecillewis@infinimatix.net

    ieji.de

    about

    preview

    join

    ieji.de

    Users: 18 . Toots: 93 . Connections: 334 . Language: English

    SECURE multiple A+ TLS ratings ( TLS OBS QUA HTB )
    STABLE financially backed, won't go down in a week like some do
    POWERFUL Intel Xeon E5-1650v3, DDR4-2133 RAM, WD SE HDDs RAID10 (high traffic configs)
    LIBERAL based in Germany , Frankfurt and uses 1984.is DNS and LE Certs
    IPv6 SUPPORT via tunnelbroker.net
    NO LOGS nginx saves no logs, don't know about the mastodon ruby stuff though. Disregard the privacy policy, it's the default one
    USE VIA TOR NETWORK AT iejidevtqqdlukju.onion for extra anonymity (you have to accept an invalid https certificate though, as Let's Encrypt disallows .onion certification)
    KNOW YOUR HOST german legit Impressum (imprint) with many ways to contact

    More Info... Code of Conduct:

    ieji.de is availabe via Tor. That doesn't make this instance free of rules.

    Do NOT:

    - harass people in any way, constructive and founded critisism is ok

    - spam at others, especially on other instances

    - spread explicit pictures of minors

    - spread copyrighted material

    - break german law (no nazis or extremists allowed)

    Depending on the rules broken I may have to report you to german authorities as precise as I can or give you at max two warning before blocking you out.

    I'll do my best to respond to reports asap.

    Abuse of the report option will get you banned after the third misbehaviour.

    If you are an instance admin and run into a problem, be it technical or an abusive user, please reach out to me. Via mastodon account or mail displayed in the contact box.

    Basicly, act accordingly to german freedom of speech rules or prepare to get warned/banned.

    I'll be polishing the CoC soonish!

    Impressum(german imprint)

    Email: tor@ieji.de

    Admin: @SolSoCoG@ieji.de

    creativity.cafe

    about

    preview

    join

    creativity.cafe

    Users: 89 . Toots: 2676 . Connections: 647 . Language: English

    creativity.cafe is a Mastodon instance for people who make things - artists of any kind, including visual, musical, glitch, 3d, net art, writing, sculpture, and more. Even people who don't create but are just really enthusiastic about creating are welcome! Come on down to talk shop and be around fellow creators.

    This is an invite only instance, in order to make sure that people who are here truly want to be here (and to keep my server costs low). If you want an invite , send your email and desired username directly to @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com .

    More Info... Da Rules

    Be kind to each other

    Flag looping/flashing GIFs as NSFW for people with epilepsy/nausea/etc.

    Also flag actually NSFW content as NSFW

    This is an arts-focused instance. If you post work that isn't yours, try to find and include the source so we can find more of it :)

    Harassment, slurs, hate speech, etc. explicitly unwelcome

    Not a rule, but when you join feel free to introduce yourself with a post and the #introduction / #introductions tags! It's a great way to get found on the network, meet new people, and greet the community.

    If you have any issues, reports, complaints, bug notes, or requests, you may contact the administrator, Way, via Mastodon at @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com.

    Supporting creativity.cafe

    Like human beings require touch to survive at a young age, instances require money. If you enjoy this instance, you can throw me a dollar or so to my Patreon to make sure it grows up to be strong and healthy.

    Email: wayspurrchen@gmail.com

    Admin: @way@creativity.cafe

    queer.party

    about

    preview

    join

    Queer Party!

    Users: 157 . Toots: 1593 . Connections: 606 . Language: English

    A silly instance of Mastodon for queer folk and queer folk accessories. Let's be friends!

    More Info... Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of other instances such as mastodon.social, awoo.space and icosahedron.website,

    aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. The rules pretty much boil down to "be good to each other", but a few rules I'd like to explicitly list out are as follows:

    Any content or postings which may be illegal under French or Scottish law are not permitted.

    Any content or postings containing Nazi symbolism, ideology and the promotion thereof, are strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.

    Racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia and any other discriminatory conduct which attacks any individual or group of individuals based on what they are or what they believe in, is strictly forbidden and also seriously uncool.

    Any conduct which abuses this Mastodon instance, or which causes harm to other Mastodon instances, and/or the users thereof, is strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.

    A status page for this Mastodon instance is available here.

    This Mastodon instance generally operates in open federation, but specific domains are blocked if and when identified as being either indifferent to or permissive of abusive conduct. In the interest of full transparency, this list is published below.

    Table last updated 18/4/17.

    DomainSeverity

    shitposter.clubsuspend

    mastodon.0-z-0.comsuspend

    mastodon.delurk.comsuspend

    notmastodon.xyzsuspend

    mastodon.desync.netsuspend

    tooter.frsuspend

    mastodon.hostsuspend

    freezepeach.xyzsuspend

    sealion.clubsuspend

    rainbowdash.netsuspend

    social.heldscal.lasuspend

    pawoo.netsilence reject-media

    Email: mastodon-queeries@maff.im

    Admin: @maffsie@queer.party

    md.paoon.social

    join

    ITÁ≥ª„Å™„Çì„Åß„ÇÇ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    For Amateur Radio Operator .
    Notice:NO CB Radio or BCL/SWL.
    Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case) .

    Valid mail address,below domains ONLY.

    Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case).

    animalliberation.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Animal Liberation Network

    Users: 594 . Toots: 1528 . Connections: 515 . Language: English

    Animal Liberation Network is a community for animal activists on the Mastodon network. You can connect with other activists through the local timeline , as well as spread your activism to the outside world with the federated timeline . Please read our rules !

    More Info... This is a website by and for animal activists.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of animalliberation.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Speciesism or advocation of speciesism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: alex@alexgleason.me

    Admin: @alex@animalliberation.social

    mangadon.net

    about

    preview

    join

    „Éû„É≥„Ç¨„ÅØÊú¨ÂΩì„Å´Á¥†Êô¥„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑÊñáÂåñ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
    Êà¶Ââç„Åã„ÇâËÑà„ÄÖ„Å®Á∂ö„ÅèÊñáÂåñÁöÑ„Å™ËìÑÁ©ç„ÇÇ„Åï„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å™„Åå„Çâ„ÄÅÊñ∞„Åó„ÅÑÂêç‰Ωú„ÅåÊ¨°„Åã„ÇâÊ¨°„Å∏„Å®ÁôªÂ†¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰ΩïÂçÅÂπ¥„ÇÇ„Éû„É≥„Ç¨„ÇíË™≠„Çì„Åß„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Å†„Å´„Äå„Åì„Çå„ÅØ„Åô„Åî„ÅÑÔºÅ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ‰ΩúÂìÅ„Å´„ÄÅ1Âπ¥„Å´‰ΩïÂõû„ÇÇÂá∫‰ºö„Åà„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
    ‰Ωé„Ç≥„Çπ„Éà„Åß‰Ωú„Çå„Å¶„ÄÅ„Éè„É™„Ç¶„ÉÉ„ÉâÂ§ß‰Ωú„Å´„ÇÇÂºï„Åë„ÇíÂèñ„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑÁâ©Ë™û‰∏ñÁïå„ÇíÊßãÁØâ„Åß„Åç„Çã„Éû„É≥„Ç¨„ÅØ„ÄÅÊó•Êú¨„ÅÆ„Ç®„É≥„Çø„Éº„ÉÜ„Ç§„É°„É≥„ÉàÁî£Ê•≠„ÅÆÂÆù„Å†„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„ÇíÈÄö„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÈù¢ÁôΩ„ÅÑ„Éû„É≥„Ç¨„ÅÆÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇÑÊÑüÊÉ≥„ÇíÂÖ±Êúâ„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇ
    „Åì„Çå„ÅØÂà•„ÅÆ„ÅäË©±„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅÊâçËÉΩ„Å´Ëá™‰ø°„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊòØÈùû„ÄÅÊº´ÁîªÂÆ∂„ÇíÁõÆÊåá„Åó„Å¶Ê¨≤„Åó„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊó•Êú¨‰∏≠„ÅÆÊâçËÉΩ„Åå„Éû„É≥„Ç¨Áïå„Å´ÈõÜ„Åæ„Çå„Å∞„ÄÅ„Éâ„É©„Ç¥„É≥„Éú„Éº„É´„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´‰∏ñÁïå„Å´ÊóÖÁ´ã„Å§‰ΩúÂìÅ„Åå„ÄÅ‰ªäÂæå„ÇÇÁèæ„ÇåÁ∂ö„Åë„Çã„Åß„Åó„Çá„ÅÜÔºÅ

    More Info...

    -------------------------------------------------------------

    ‚òÖÈáçË¶ÅÔºöÁôªÈå≤Á¢∫Ë™ç„É°„Éº„É´„Åå„ÄÅËø∑ÊÉë„É°„Éº„É´„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„Å´Â±ä„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„ÅôÔºÅÔºÅÁâπ„Å´Gmail„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅîÁ¢∫Ë™çÈ†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„ÅôÔºÅHTML„É°„Éº„É´„ÅåÂèó‰ø°„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑ„Çπ„Éû„ÉõÁ≠â„Åß„ÅØÁôªÈå≤„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åõ„ÇìÔºÅ

    ‚ÄªÂñÑ„ÅØÊÄ•„ÅíÔºÅ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åß„ÄÅÊÄ•„Åç„ÇáÈñãÂßãËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ‰ªäÂæå„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂ÊñπÈáù„Åå„Åæ„Å†Á¢∫ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    „ÄêÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ/ÂÖçË≤¨‰∫ãÈ†Ö/Á¶ÅÊ≠¢‰∫ãÈ†Ö„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„Äë

    ‚òÖ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Å´ÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„Çã„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´Á≠â„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∫∫„ÅØÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Åü„ÅîÊú¨‰∫∫„Å´Ê≥ïÁöÑ„Å™Ë≤¨‰ªª„ÅåÁîü„Åò„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁô∫Ë®ÄÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÂçÅÂàÜÊ∞ó„Çí‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÁôªÈå≤„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÅÆIP„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Åã„ÇâÂÄã‰∫∫„ÅÆÁâπÂÆö„ÅØ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çà„Çç„Åó„Åè„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ö„Åè„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅåË¶ã„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫„Å∏„ÅÆÂ®ÅÂúßÁöÑ„Å™„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÇÑ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„Çí„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚òÖ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂáçÁµê„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    ÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅÆ„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„Åå‰∏çÂø´„Å´ÊÄù„ÅÜÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´„ÅØ„Å©„Çì„Å©„Çì„Å®„Éü„É•„Éº„Éà„ÇÑ„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áä∂Ê≥Å„ÅåÁ∂ö„ÅÑ„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÈÄöÂ†±„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÔºïÂõû‰ª•‰∏ä„ÄÅÂêåÊßò„ÅÆÈÄöÂ†±„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åü„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„Åß„ÇÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç„Åó„Åü‰∏ä„Åß„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆ‰∫àÂëä„Å™„Åè1ÔΩûÔºí„ÅãÊúàÈñìÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÄÅË©≤ÂΩì„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Çí„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„Çí„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Å®„ÄÅ„É≠„Éº„Ç´„É´TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„ÅÆ„Éõ„Éº„É†TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªäÂæå„ÄÅ‰ªïÊßò„ÅåÂ§âÊõ¥„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÔºëÔΩûÔºí„ÅãÊúàÈñì„ÅÆÊúüÈñì‰∏≠„Å´‰∏çÂø´„Å™ÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇÑÈÅéÊøÄ„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„Åå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„Åó„Åü„Çâ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíËß£Èô§Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆÂÆåÂÖ®ÂáçÁµê„ÇíËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ´å„Åå„Çâ„ÅõË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØ„ÄÅÂàë‰∫ã‰∫ã‰ª∂„Å®„Å™„ÇãÂ®ÅÂäõÊ•≠ÂãôÂ¶®ÂÆ≥Á≠â„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁØÄÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„Çã‰∫§ÊµÅ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªËá™Ë≤ª„ÅßÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÅÆÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÅåÈùûÂ∏∏„Å´‰Ωé„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´Ë≤†Ëç∑„ÅÆÊéõ„Åã„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÂ∫¶„Å´30‰ª∂‰ª•‰∏ä„ÅÆCSV„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã„Å®„ÄÅÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÇíË∂Ö„Åà„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ßÈáè„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„ÉàÁ≠â„ÅØÁµ∂ÂØæ„Å´„ÅäÊéß„Åà‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇPawooÁ≠â„Å®ÊØî„Åπ„Çã„Å®Êï∞ÂçÉÂÄç„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÅÆÂ∑Æ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÅîÁêÜËß£È†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª‰ªñ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØÂéüÂâáÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å®„ÅØÈñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑ„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÅåÂ§ßÂπÖ„Å´Â¢ó„Åà„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„ÅåÈÅÖ„Åè„Å™„Å£„Åü„Çä„ÄÅHDD„ÅÆÂÆπÈáè„Åå‰∏ÄÊùØ„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÜ„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂºäÂÆ≥„ÅåÂá∫„ÇãÁÇ∫„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªñ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅpawoo.net„ÇÑfriends.nicoÁ≠â„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åã„Çâ„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„Å®Èñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÂÆ£‰ºùÁõÆÁöÑ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØÂç≥ÊôÇ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇË≤ßÂº±„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å™„Çì„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÊçúÊüªÊ©üÈñ¢Á≠â„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆË¶ÅË´ã„ÅåÊù•„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„ÇπÁ≠â„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®Á≠â„ÅÆË≤†ÊãÖ„ÅåÁµêÊßãÂ§ß„Åç„ÅÑÁÇ∫„ÄÅ‰ªäÂæåÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ª„ÇíË≥Ñ„ÅÜÁÇ∫„Å´„ÄÅÂ∫ÉÂëäÁ≠â„ÅåÂÖ•„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊúÄÁµÇÁöÑ„Å´ÊØéÊúà„Ç¶„É≥ÂçÅ‰∏áÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®„ÅåÊéõ„Åã„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „ÅîÊäïÁ®øÈ†Ç„ÅÑ„Åü„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§öÂ™í‰Ωì„Åß„ÅÆÁ¥π‰ªã„ÇÑ‰∫∫Âè£Áü•ËÉΩ„ÇíÁî®„ÅÑ„Åü„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅßÂà©Áî®„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂèéÁõä„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÇíÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åï„Åõ„ÇãÁÇ∫„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®Ôºà„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº‰ª£„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ªÁ≠âÔºâ„Å´ÂÖÖ„Å¶„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÈÄÄ‰ºöÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÅÆÊ©üËÉΩ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁèæÂú®„ÅÆ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Å´„ÅØ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜËÄÖ„Å´„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°È†Ç„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åã„Å≠„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫à„ÇÅ„Åî‰∫ÜÊâø‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÈÄÄ‰ºö„Å´Ëøë„ÅÑÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„Åü„ÅÑÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅîËá™Ë∫´„Åß„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„ÉØ„Éº„Çí„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÇíÂ§ñ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÂ§â„Åà„ÄÅ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÇíÊç®„Å¶„Ç¢„Éâ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„Åô„ÇãÁ≠â„ÅÆÂØæÂøú„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂøÖË¶Å„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    https://digitalnews365.com/mastodon-3„ÄÄÁ≠âWEB‰∏ä„ÅÆ„Éö„Éº„Ç∏„Çí„ÅîÂèÇÁÖß‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„Åå„ÅÇ„Å£„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„ÅÆ„Éö„Éº„Ç∏„Å´„Å¶„ÅîÂ†±ÂëäËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅåÂà•ÈÄîÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÇíÈô§„Åç„ÄÅÊú¨„Éö„Éº„Ç∏‰∏ä„Å´Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÇíË°®Á§∫„Åó„ÅüÊôÇÁÇπ„Çà„ÇäÂäπÂäõ„ÅåÁîü„Åò„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    writing.exchange

    about

    preview

    join

    Writing Exchange

    Users: 15 . Toots: 90 . Connections: 189 . Language: English

    Writing Exchange is a small, focused community for poets, writers, bloggers, and anyone else who makes things. It was started by Matt from Write.as .

    More Info... We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically. If you're not interested in that, there are plenty of other great instances you can join.

    Guidelines

    We'll be more specific in the future, but in general, be good to each other. Enjoy talking to strangers (and friends!) on the internet, and give people the benefit of the doubt.

    If problems arise, please use Mastodon's features to Block, Mute, or Report users that are causing problems. If you need more help, contact @matt.

    Once you've joined

    Introduce yourself! Communities like these work best when they're filled with strangers who talk to each other.

    Background This is an experiment to see if we can create a small, purposeful community among the fediverse, with the eventual goal being a sustainable, community-run instance. If you'd like to help make that happen, get in touch.

    Email: hi@writing.exchange

    Admin: @matt@writing.exchange

    ‚Ä¢ 6c/12t - 3,5 GHz/3,8 GHz

    ‚Ä¢ 128Go DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz

    ‚Ä¢ SoftRaid 2x2To

    ‚Ä¢ 500 Mbps bande passante

    yoshis.woolly.world

    about

    preview

    join

    Yoshi's Awoolly World

    Users: 1 . Toots: 6 . Connections: 173 . Language: English

    the culmination of a 3 day battle with Docker, message me if you want in

    • birdsite: @knxggles
    • fediverse: @knxggles@mastodon.social / @callum@yoshis.woolly.world
    • email: me@knxggles.xyz

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: me@knxggles.xyz

    Admin: @callum@yoshis.woolly.world

    mastodon.my

    about

    preview

    join

    MyMastodon

    Users: 24 . Toots: 91 . Connections: 541 . Language: English

    A Mastadon instance launched for fellow Malaysians and everyone on the internet who likes being with us!

    More Info... This is a Mastodon instance run by @s.

    This Mastodon instance is created for fellow Malaysians (hence on .my domain extension). However, it is also open for everyone on the internet who likes being with us! ;-)

    Rules and Regulations:

    1) Never share your login credentials with anyone else and never save your login credentials on public or someone else's computer/phone/tablet browser.

    2) Do not post any copyrighted material unless the copyright is owned by you or by this website.

    3) Do not post any material which is knowingly false and/or defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, or otherwise violative of any law.

    4) Homophobic, misogynistic and racist posts are strictly not allowed, you will be permanently banned right away.

    5) NSFW (Not Safe for Work) and/or CW (Content Warning) options must be enabled for adults content such as sexually explicit images.

    6) Members are encouraged to use the report tool when you see inappropriate content such as adults content without NSFW/CW.

    This server is currently funded by myself. If you want to help me out, feel free to visit https://patreon.com/MyMastodon

    As a reward, your Mastodon username will be mentioned in our donator list on our website. Thank you! :-)

    Email: admin@mastodon.my

    Admin: @admin@mastodon.my

    @okumin

    „Éì„Ç∏„Éç„Çπ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ:

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @okumin@mstdn.okumin.com

    nog20.social

    about

    preview

    join

    noG20.social -

    Users: 37 . Toots: 111 . Connections: 122 . Language: English

    Since the 1999 Seattle WTO protests, social media has been an integral part in organizing protests. This year, the G20 will take place in Hamburg, Germany. Since 1999 the world and the web have changed. Twitter is full of fascists, sexists and misogynists. But a safe place to share ideas and discuss is more needed than ever! Thats why we created nog20.social. A safe place for everyone who wants to do something about the upcoming summit of the world‚Äòs 20 economically and politically most powerful countries. Warning! This site will close down and will be deleted after July 10th

    more info

    More Info...

    Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

    In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

    nog20.social was not designed for sensitive communication. Such communication shouldn't be discussed here, or on any other social network.

    Illegal content will be deleted, and may lead to an account suspension.

    Content Warning should be used for the following :

    violence (text and medias)

    stories including *phobias (text and medias)

    Please use the report feature if you see a rule violation. Be specific by including a comment.

    @chris

    is in charge of moderation

    Don‚Äôt forget to follow @chris to stay up-to-date with problems, updates and server downtime

    We are also reachable via email: contact@nog20.social.

    GPG Fingerprint: C64A 0730 3CC0 3BD3 1141 AEA2 8EAC F5C4 5C45 C68F

    Email: contact@nog20.social

    Admin: @chris@nog20.social

    unnerv.jp

    Users: 234 . Toots: 13059 . Connections: 423 . Language: Japanese

    Twitter‰∏ä„Åß„ÅØ„ÄÅ @UN_NERV „ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Åù„Çå„Å®„Åª„ÅºÂêåÁ≠â„Å™ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÈÖç‰ø°„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åô„Åπ„Å¶„ÅÆÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÈÖç‰ø°„Åô„Çã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ https://unnerv.jp/@UN_NERV „Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„Åì„ÇíÂü∫ÁÇπ„Å®„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÂêÑ„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„ÅÆÂ≠ê„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åå„Éñ„Éº„Çπ„ÉàÔºà„É™„ÉÑ„Ç§„Éº„Éà„Å®Âêå„Åò„ÇÇ„ÅÆÔºâ„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Åã„Åü„Å°„Å´„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ

    „Åì„Å°„Çâ„Åå2017Âπ¥4Êúà23Êó•ÁèæÂú®„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆ‰∏ÄË¶ß„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅîËá™Ë∫´„Å´ÂøÖË¶Å„Å™„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„Å†„Åë„ÇíÈÅ∏„Çì„Åß„É™„É¢„Éº„Éà„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Mastodon„ÅÆ‰Ωø„ÅÑÊñπ„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ

    Here is an instance of Mastodon founded by "Haru" who lives in Echigo-Tsumari "Tokamachi city, Niigata Prefecture" at the Echigo-tsumari Art Field(Triennial / Festival). People who live in Tokamachi City, people who love Tokamachi City, anyone can use it. Please do not hesitate to toot about local topics etc.

    „Ç¢„Éó„É™„Åß„ÇÇ‰Ωø„Åà„Åæ„Åô

    „É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤Âæå„ÄÅAppStore„ÇÑGoogle Play„Å™„Å©„Åß„Äå„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Äç„Å®Ê§úÁ¥¢„Åó„ÄÅMastodonÂØæÂøú„Ç¢„Éó„É™„Çí„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ„ÅÇ„Å®„ÅØ„Ç¢„Éó„É™„ÇíËµ∑Âãï„Åó„ÄÅÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„ÇπÔºà https://tokamstdn.jp/ Ôºâ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤ÊôÇ„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Å®„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Åß„É≠„Ç∞„Ç§„É≥„Åô„Çå„Å∞OK„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    masto.quad.moe

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 7 . Toots: 2995 . Connections: 536 . Language: English

    masto.quad.moe

    More Info...

    Invite-only instance for me and some friends.

    Even if a sign up form is visible, don't bother. You won't be able to confirm your mail address

    We do not allow:

    Continued, intentional and targeted bullying

    Pornographic avatars (No I won't complain about half-naked anime girls)

    NSFW content that's not tagged as NSFW

    Repeated spoiling of movies, games, books, etc. Use the content warning

    Obviously nothing that's actually illegal. Like child pornography or unironic bomb threats

    We do allow:

    Controversial opinions

    Shitposting (But please stop spamming people if they ask)

    almost everything else tbh, just don't be an asshole

    Server load

    5m averages:

    1h averages:

    Email: contact@quad.moe

    Admin: @quad@masto.quad.moe

    mst3k.interlinked.me

    about

    preview

    join

    Interlinked MST3K

    Users: 94 . Toots: 30810 . Connections: 774 . Language: English

    This is a Mastodon instance run by the interlinked.me IRC network, primarily geared towards (but not exclusively for) users of Interlinked. See this for a primer on Mastodon, what it is, and why it's so cool.

    More Info... We are a general-purpose community and anyone is welcome, as long as they follow the rules.

    The rules boil down to this: DON'T BE A DICK. The below serves as a more specific Code of Conduct.

    Code of conduct

    This is not a legal document.

    Nothing in this document is or should be construed as legal advice. We're not lawyers.

    Information

    These are our rules. Failure to adhere to this will result in warnings, silencing, or blocking.

    This site is moderated. This is not a free speech zone. There are other instances devoted to this if you disagree with our policies.

    Interpretation is entirely up to us.

    Remote users and instances are held to these standards and will be dealt with accordingly.

    Community guidelines should be construed as a base for these rules and interpreted with that frame of reference.

    We reserve the right to silence or ban anyone for any reason not in the rules, or to proactively do so.

    These rules apply not only to posts, but also to boosts, favourites, bios, or anything else that involves interaction with the site

    Banned forms of conduct

    These forms of conduct are not permitted and will result in the aforementioned sanctions:

    Excessive advertising, spam, or ham

    Irritating bots

    Stalking; harassing; threatening; or advocating any physical, sexual, or emotional harm against individuals or groups

    Promotion of extremely authoritarian forms of rule, including fascism and Stalinism

    Denial of documented genocides, pogroms, or purges

    Content that is prohibited in Germany, France, the European Union, or the United States of America

    Any sexual content featuring anyone under 18, including artistic depictions

    Patterns of extreme trolling

    Engaging in bad faith debate, or refusing to end debate if the other party wishes to

    Encouraging others to disregard this or other codes of conduct at other instances, or refusal to abide by the code of conduct of other instances (at our discretion)

    Attempts to prevent others from using this service, or degrading the quality or performance of it

    Unauthorised distribution of any personal information or data

    Circumventing any sanction, or sockpuppeting or meatpuppeting to circumvent a sanction

    Using sockpuppeting, meatpuppeting, or organising others to break the rules en masse

    Bots that do not respect the #nobot profile tag (following a user with such a tag in their profile)

    Abuse or misuse of the code of conduct, pursuing or grandstanding after an issue has been resolved to our satisfaction, pettifogging, or rule lawyering

    Registering accounts with inherently malicious intent

    Conduct filtered from the public timeline

    The following forms of conduct will be removed from the public timeline if seen:

    Astroturfing

    Bots that engage in promotion of news sources without permission

    Untagged gore, pornography, or other explicit content (use the NSFW tag)

    Patterns of excessive rudeness

    Links to pirated content, or instructions on how to commit piracy

    Propaganda, except for demonstration purposes

    Jingoism

    Political extremism not otherwise prohibited

    Advocating or promoting illegal acts

    Silenced, suspended, and media blocked instances

    We do not federate everywhere.

    We silence, suspend, and media block certain instances. For a list of such instances, brief summary of rationales, and what to do if you're on the list, see here.

    Other information

    Our AmbassadorBot can be found here.

    If you are an Interlinked user, you may be interested in this information on who's who.

    You can visit us at the Interlinked IRC network if you want to talk to us.

    Administration

    The patients in charge of this asylum are:

    Elizafox

    Mismagius

    luciferMysticus

    amrofnoc

    Alms to the poor

    If you like the service, consider donating to our Patreon.

    A big shout out to our Patreon supporters:

    Kyle Griesbach

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @Elizafox@mst3k.interlinked.me

    Users: 156 . Toots: 1062 . Connections: 249 . Language: English

    Èü≥„Ç≤„Éº„Éû„Éº „ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇACÂã¢„Åß„ÇÇ„Çπ„Éû„Éõ„Ç≤„ÉºÂã¢„Åß„ÇÇË™∞„Åß„ÇÇÊ≠ìËøé„Åß„ÅôÔºÅ „É™„Ç∂„É´„ÉàÊäïÁ®ø„ÇÑ„Éá„Ç£„Çπ„Ç´„ÉÉ„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Å™„Å©„Å´„ÅîÂà©Áî®‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑ

    „Éú„Ç´„É≠„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åå‰ºº„ÅüÊäÄË°ì(UTAU„Å™„Å©)„Åß„ÅÆÊ•ΩÊõ≤Âà∂‰Ωú„ÇÑÈü≥Ê∫êÂà∂‰Ωú„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØËÅ¥„ÅÑ„Åü„ÇäÊ≠å„Å£„Åü„Çä„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‰∫∫

    Mastodon„Å´„ÅØÂπ¥ÈΩ¢Á¢∫Ë™çÊ©üËÉΩ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇÁèæÊôÇÁÇπ(2017Âπ¥4Êúà)„Åß„ÅØ18Á¶Å„Ç≥„É≥„ÉÜ„É≥„ÉÑ„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂæã„ÅßÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    TOMOKI++„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫Âá∫Ë≥á„Å´„Çà„ÇãÈÅãÂñ∂„Å®„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Mastodon„ÅÆË≤†Ëç∑„Åå„Å©„ÅÆ„Åè„Çâ„ÅÑ„Åã„Çà„Åè„Çè„Åã„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÄÅ„Å©„ÅÆÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÇíÂèó„ÅëÂÖ•„Çå„Çâ„Çå„Çã„ÅÆ„Åã„Å™„Å©„ÅØ„ÇÑ„Å£„Å¶„Åø„Å™„ÅÑ„Å®‰ªä„ÅÆ„Å®„Åì„Çç„ÅØ„Å™„Çì„Å®„ÇÇË®Ä„Åà„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇË¶ãÂàá„ÇäÁô∫Ëªä„Åß„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÈáç„ÅÑ„ÄÅÂÖ•„Çå„Å™„ÅÑ„ÄÅ„Å™„Å©„ÅÆ„Ç±„Éº„Çπ„ÅåÂá∫„Å¶„Åè„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åà„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åî‰∫ÜÊâø„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÇíÂº∑Âåñ„Åô„ÇãÁ≠â„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„Å´‰∫àÂëä„Å™„Åè„É°„É≥„ÉÜ„Éä„É≥„Çπ‰ºëÊ≠¢„ÇíË°å„ÅÜÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    social.freechristian.life

    freechristian.life

    Users: 24 . Toots: 64 . Connections: 145 . Language: English

    In an effort to make local timelines more meaningful and make the instance a decision of note, this instance is for Christians. Commonly accepted core beliefs held in all denominations, sects, and times are sacred here. However, the walls in this garden have many doors on all sides that lead to many other places. You are encouraged to create your experience for yourself and others in the same instance.--- check junk folder if you don't receive a confirmation email. . .

    Since Christ, all Christians have believed in certain common things throughout time. This instance is intended for them. Due to the way this federated system works. You are encouraged to create your experience for yourself an others in the same instance. So on with the experiment.

    Email: @sym@social.freechristian.life

    Admin: @sym@social.freechristian.life

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    ÊñπÈáù

    „É´„Éº„É´„ÉªÊ≥®ÊÑè‰∫ãÈ†Ö

    „Åì„Åì„ÅØMastodon„Åß„Åô„Åå„Äå„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÔºÅ„Äç„Åå„Äå„Ç´„ÉÑ!„Äç„Å´„ÄÅ„Åæ„ÅüË±°„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„Åè„ÅÜ„Åï„Åé„Åå„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ „Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´ÂèÇÂä†„Åô„Çã„ÅÆ„Å´„Ç¢„Ç§„Ç´„ÉÑÔºÅ„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç°„É≥„Åß„ÅÇ„ÇãÂøÖË¶Å„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„Åå„ÄÅkirakiratter„Å´„ÅÑ„Çã„Åª„Å®„Çì„Å©„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„Ç¢„Ç§„Ç´„ÉÑÔºÅ„Éï„Ç°„É≥„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    Ë©≥„Åó„Åè„ÅØ „Åì„Å°„Çâ „ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ wiki „Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ


    It's Mastodon but "toot" is "katsu" and also there's a rabbit. You don't have to be an Aikatsu fan, but the majority of users on here are.

    See the extended info page for more details.

    More Info...

    The site icon is by @southrop (CC-BY 4.0).

    The Aikatsu-themed onboarding text is by @sumire and @bitmap.

    The Kirakiratter theme, kktCSS, is by @MasterDalK and contributors, and is available on GitHub.

    „Ç≠„É©„Ç≠„É©„ÉÉ„Çø„Éº„ÅÆ„É´„Éº„É´

    ÂÖ¨ÈñãÁØÑÂõ≤„ÅÆÂà∂Èôê„ÇÑCW„ÉªNSFW„ÇíÊ¥ªÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅ„É≠„Éº„Ç´„É´„Çø„Ç§„É†„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅØË¶™Â≠ê„ÅßÊ•Ω„Åó„ÇÅ„ÇãÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Å´„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ

    ‰ªñ‰∫∫„ÅÆ‰ΩúÂìÅ„ÇíÂãùÊâã„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ„ÅÑ„Åë„Åæ„Åõ„ÇìÔºà„Ç¢„Éã„É°„ÅÆ„Ç≠„É£„Éó„ÉÅ„É£„ÇÑÂÖ¨Âºè„ÅÆ„Ç§„É©„Çπ„Éà„ÇíÈô§„Åç„Åæ„ÅôÔºâ

    Guidelines

    Keep the local timeline family-friendly, and use the CW/NSFW flags accordingly

    Do not post someone else's artwork without permission (anime screenshots and official art are ok)

    octodon.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Octodon

    Users: 7001 . Toots: 123750 . Connections: 1582 . Language: English

    octodon.social

    More Info... Octodon:

    no rules in particular, be nice be reasonable call me mommy stuff like that

    Seriously though: It should be similar to mastodon.social.

    NSFW/any legal porn is allowed, but tag it as NSFW or make it unlisted or less. Trolls are only allowed if they're quiet; you can shitpost but not harass someone, and my threshold is pretty low.

    I'm not Twitter, I'll fuck up nazis and bullies for fun, and get an AI to do it if I get bored.

    I'm your nice cyberpunk queen and I intend to keep this place decent and safe for everyone.

    You should choose an instance based on shared values; here I believe everyone deserve freedom, but also to be safe from harassment and hate. Freedom will not be given a higher priority.

    I'll always try to solve problems in the most rational and safe way possible for users, and try to discuss any issue with the people concerned if I think it's worth it. If you at least try to be good and comprehensive, so will I.

    I understand and accept mistakes, but not being bad on purpose.

    Advertising: Probably never, if any it will not be integrated into content or intrusive, at most I'm thinking about the Wikipedia way of asking for donation when needed.

    Federation & Politics: It federates with nearly everything, I'll block whatever instance isn't compatible with this site's rules as needed. For example if a remote user harass a local user and their instance admin endorses it. See list at the end of this page.

    Reminder: that's a private place and your free speech means very little to me and most of my users. If your instance gets blocked it's because you endorse hate and/or harassment; then why be pathetic now and bitch about it? You can't force people to like you and being an asshole won't get you friends. Go run your little world.

    CW: On public toots (not unlisted, private, or direct), content warnings are required for

    any kind of (explicit enough) violence (with or without pics, including gore, *phobia, abuse, sexual or not) and referring to it;

    sexual content (pics must already be tagged as NSFW, use a CW if you have text or want to warn about specific content).

    This is not about what is culturally or religiously accepted, but about common sources of trauma

    that deeply hurt people for very real reasons. Consider yourself lucky if you don't need any of it, but it's not about you.

    They are also appreciated but not mandatory on:

    politics, spoilers, anything depressing or too negative. Use them in an opportunistic way.

    Enforcement:

    On this instance, a toot that doesn't follow these rules may be deleted.

    On repeated offences or if disturbing public timelines,

    the account may get silenced (only their followers will see toots).

    If silencing is not enough (harassment, ...), the account may get

    completely suspended.

    If the account is on another instance, it may get silenced and suspended from here, and I will not hesitate to share reports

    with other instance admins.

    Instance admins, feel free to contact me about this instance's users' behavior.

    Support / Servers:

    You can support me/this server through a Patreon here and you can get a VPN here or send bitcoins to 1F3TeADq25W471a1G5W5gJJ1BWbQYn6Di5.

    Anyway if you're wondering, it's hosted on Scaleway in France, and it should be pretty stable since I'm a competent sysadmin.

    There are full backups done every 12 hours, and sent fully encrypted to an append-only remote server.

    Feel free to report it to me directly if it's slow or anything doesn't work.

    Server stats:

    main,

    app01,

    app02,

    sidekiq01.

    Instance blocks:

    NameReason

    noagendasocial.comAdam is a fucking idiot who enjoys harassing people himself if they report someone. You're breaking the federation Adam.

    pawoo.netToo much child porn in public timelines. (silenced) Also: sealion.club, heldscal.la, freezepeach.xyz, shitposter.club, unsafe.space, gs.smuglo.li, are blocked or silenced as they did allow hate speech and harassment.

    Email: avoidstar@octodon.social

    Admin: @CobaltVelvet@octodon.social

    Cette instance de Mastodon est ouverte √† toutes et √† tous, quelle que soit votre opinion politique. Cette instance sera maintenue sur le long terme par une √©quipe comp√©tente, vous pouvez ainsi vous en servir comme compte principal sans craindre une quelconque fermeture.

    linuxrocks.online

    about

    preview

    join

    LinuxRocks.Online

    Users: 449 . Toots: 3575 . Connections: 559 . Language: English

    Linux Community Group Community-driven instance for people who love linux
    This instance is dedicated to Linux and technologies.
    Some rules for this Instance.
    When you post something offensive it shows up in the Local feed. Since this instance is dedicated to Linux and a Collaboration of technologies we do not tolerate obscene behavior. As we oppose the idea of censorship we also do not want a toxic area for our users.
    Remember Mastodon is suppose to work as each instance being a subreddit that's the point of the local feed. As we do enjoy the off-topic conversation the main voice should be around Linux and technologies.
    Remember you have the ability to only post to your followers then it will not show up in the local feed or even post directly to a given user within the mastodon network.

    Linux Community Group

    Email: support@linuxrocks.online

    Admin: @omnipotens@linuxrocks.online

    Users: 2 . Toots: 417 . Connections: 230 . Language: Japanese

    Á•ûÊ•ΩÂùÇ‰∏Ä‰∏ÅÁõÆÈÄö‰ø°Â±Ä Â±ÄÂì°Â∞ÇÁî®„ÅÆMastodonÈÄö‰ø°Â±Ä„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Çπ„Çø„Ç∏„Ç™„Éª„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„ÅØ „Ç≥„Çπ„Éó„É¨ „Çí„É°„Ç§„É≥„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„Å®„Åô„Çã„ÄÅ„Åß„Åç„Åü„Å∞„Åã„Çä (4/23 „Å´ UP) „ÅÆ Mastodon „Ç≥„Éü„É•„Éã„ÉÜ„Ç£„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ „Ç≥„Çπ„Éó„É¨„Ç§„É§„Éº „ÇÑ „Ç´„É°„É©„Éû„É≥ „ÅØ„ÇÇ„Å°„Çç„Çì„ÄÅ„Åù„Çå„Å´Èñ¢ÈÄ£„Åô„Çã Êº´Áîª „Éª „Ç¢„Éã„É° „Éª „Ç≤„Éº„É† „Å™„Å©„ÅÆË∂£Âë≥„ÄÅ„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Åù„Çå„Çâ„Å´ ËààÂë≥„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãÊñπ „Å´‰Ωø„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åè„Åì„Å®„ÇíÊÉ≥ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
    ÁôªÈå≤„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Çâ„Åæ„Åö„ÅØÊ∞ó„Å´„Å™„ÇãÊñπ„Çí„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Åó„Å¶„Åø„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜÔºÅ

    bne.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Brisbane Social

    Users: 103 . Toots: 1665 . Connections: 828 . Language: English

    The Brisbane Social Mastodon server. Hosted in sunny Brisbane, for users from and interested in southeast Queensland.

    More Info... This site is intended to be a pleasant space for folks to enjoy Mastodon. This instance is run out of Brisbane, Australia to allow faster access for locals.

    Instance rules

    The rules of this server are:

    Be respectful of your peers

    Abide by local and international laws

    Have fun

    If you have concerns about a person's conduct, please report the toot in question or get in touch with @ashkyd.

    Blocked instances

    As with other servers, we have blocked a number of instances that don't meet our standards for a number of reasons. At this time, we are keeping in step with the toot.cafe blocklist.If this is something that concerns you, please feel free to sign up for another instance.

    Copyright & Attribution

    The background image of Streets Beach is provided by user Foundationexpo88

    Get started!

    Get started by signing up or logging in, then toot using the #introduction hashtag to say hi!

    Email: bnesocial@kyd.com.au

    Admin: @ashkyd@bne.social

    mastodon.peshane.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Yet Another Mastodon Instance

    Users: 13 . Toots: 44 . Connections: 376 . Language: English

    Yet Another Mastodon Instance is a sustainable tiny instance.
    Feel free to register.

    Please, follow @YAMI_status in order to be aware of maintenance/reboot.

    Email: mastodon@peshane.net

    Admin: @peshane@mastodon.peshane.net

    ‚ÄªÈÄî‰∏≠„Åã„Çâ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÈö†„ÅôÊñπÊ≥ï„ÅØ„Äå„ÇÇ„Å£„Å®Ë¶ã„Çã„Äç„Çí‰Ωø„Å£„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇCW„ÅÆ‰∏ã„ÅÆÊ¨Ñ„Åå„ÄÅ„Äå„ÇÇ„Å£„Å®Ë¶ã„Çã„Äç„ÇíÊäº„Åô„Å®Ë¶ã„Çå„Çã„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏äÊÆµ„ÅÆ„ÄåË≠¶Âëä„ÄçÊ¨Ñ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊôÆÈÄö„Å´„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Å®„Åó„Å¶Ë°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Â≠¶Áîü„ÅØ„ÄÅÊò†Áîª„Çµ„Éº„ÇØ„É´„Å´„ÅÑ„ÅüÊò†Áîª„Éû„Éã„Ç¢„ÄÇ„Åì„ÅÆÂπ¥„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅÊò†Áîª„ÅØÊúÄÈ´ò„ÅÆÊÅØÊäú„Åç„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÊîπ„ÇÅ„Å¶ÂáÑ„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÅ‚Ä¶„Å®„ÄÇÊò†Áîª„ÅÆÁÑ°„ÅÑ‰∫∫Áîü„ÅØ„ÄÅËÄÉ„Åà„Çâ„Çå„Å™„ÅÑÔºÅ

    ‚ÄªÂñÑ„ÅØÊÄ•„ÅíÔºÅ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åß„ÄÅÊÄ•„Åç„ÇáÈñãÂßãËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ‰ªäÂæå„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂ÊñπÈáù„Åå„Åæ„Å†Á¢∫ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    ‚òÖ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂáçÁµê„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    ÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅÆ„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„Åå‰∏çÂø´„Å´ÊÄù„ÅÜÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´„ÅØ„Å©„Çì„Å©„Çì„Å®„Éü„É•„Éº„Éà„ÇÑ„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áä∂Ê≥Å„ÅåÁ∂ö„ÅÑ„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÈÄöÂ†±„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÊï∞Âõû‰ª•‰∏ä„ÄÅÂêåÊßò„ÅÆÈÄöÂ†±„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åü„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„Åß„ÇÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç„Åó„Åü‰∏ä„Åß„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆ‰∫àÂëä„Å™„ÅèÁÑ°ÊúüÈôê„Åß„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„Åã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂÅúÊ≠¢Âá¶ÂàÜ„Å®Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Å®„ÄÅ„É≠„Éº„Ç´„É´TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„ÅÆ„Éõ„Éº„É†TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªäÂæå„ÄÅ‰ªïÊßò„ÅåÂ§âÊõ¥„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„Åü„ÄÅÁèæÂÆüÁ§æ‰ºö„Åß„ÅÆ„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´„ÇÑ„ÄÅ„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà‰∏ä„ÅÆ„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´„ÇíÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å´ÊåÅ„Å°Ëæº„ÇÄ„Åì„Å®„ÅØÂé≥Á¶Å„Å®„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫ãÂÆü„ÅÆÊúâÁÑ°„Çí„ÉÅ„Çß„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åô„ÇãÂΩπÂâ≤„ÅØÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å´„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„Åó„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™ÊôÇÈñì„ÇÇ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫„Å∏„ÅÆÊâπÂà§ÁöÑ„Å™„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂÆü„ÅÆÊúâÁÑ°„Å´Èñ¢„Çè„Çâ„Åö„ÄÅÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Å®„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªËá™Ë≤ª„ÅßÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÅÆÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÅåÈùûÂ∏∏„Å´‰Ωé„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´Ë≤†Ëç∑„ÅÆÊéõ„Åã„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÂ∫¶„Å´30‰ª∂‰ª•‰∏ä„ÅÆCSV„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã„Å®„ÄÅÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÇíË∂Ö„Åà„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ßÈáè„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„ÉàÁ≠â„ÅØÁµ∂ÂØæ„Å´„ÅäÊéß„Åà‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇPawooÁ≠â„Å®ÊØî„Åπ„Çã„Å®Êï∞ÂçÉÂÄç„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÅÆÂ∑Æ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÅîÁêÜËß£È†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª‰ªñ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØÂéüÂâáÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å®„ÅØÈñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑ„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÅåÂ§ßÂπÖ„Å´Â¢ó„Åà„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„ÅåÈÅÖ„Åè„Å™„Å£„Åü„Çä„ÄÅHDD„ÅÆÂÆπÈáè„Åå‰∏ÄÊùØ„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÜ„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂºäÂÆ≥„ÅåÂá∫„ÇãÁÇ∫„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªñ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅpawoo.net„ÇÑfriends.nicoÁ≠â„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åã„Çâ„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„Å®Èñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÂÆ£‰ºùÁõÆÁöÑ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØÂç≥ÊôÇ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇË≤ßÂº±„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å™„Çì„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÊçúÊüªÊ©üÈñ¢Á≠â„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆË¶ÅË´ã„ÅåÊù•„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„ÇπÁ≠â„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®Á≠â„ÅÆË≤†ÊãÖ„ÅåÁµêÊßãÂ§ß„Åç„ÅÑÁÇ∫„ÄÅ‰ªäÂæåÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ª„ÇíË≥Ñ„ÅÜÁÇ∫„Å´„ÄÅÂ∫ÉÂëäÁ≠â„ÅåÂÖ•„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊúÄÁµÇÁöÑ„Å´ÊØéÊúà„Ç¶„É≥ÂçÅ‰∏áÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®„ÅåÊéõ„Åã„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „ÅîÊäïÁ®øÈ†Ç„ÅÑ„Åü„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§öÂ™í‰Ωì„Åß„ÅÆÁ¥π‰ªã„ÇÑ‰∫∫Âè£Áü•ËÉΩ„ÇíÁî®„ÅÑ„Åü„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅßÂà©Áî®„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂèéÁõä„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÇíÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åï„Åõ„ÇãÁÇ∫„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®Ôºà„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº‰ª£„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ªÁ≠âÔºâ„Å´ÂÖÖ„Å¶„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÈÄÄ‰ºöÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÅÆÊ©üËÉΩ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁèæÂú®„ÅÆ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Å´„ÅØ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜËÄÖ„Å´„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°È†Ç„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åã„Å≠„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫à„ÇÅ„Åî‰∫ÜÊâø‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÈÄÄ‰ºö„Å´Ëøë„ÅÑÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„Åü„ÅÑÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅîËá™Ë∫´„Åß„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„ÉØ„Éº„Çí„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÇíÂ§ñ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÂ§â„Åà„ÄÅ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÇíÊç®„Å¶„Ç¢„Éâ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„Åô„ÇãÁ≠â„ÅÆÂØæÂøú„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂøÖË¶Å„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Guidelines:

    Be kind to each other

    Don't post illegal shit

    Content warnings are required on NSFW images, no exceptions

    As the admin, I reserve the right to change any policy and do anything I want at any time‚Äîthis could include deleting posts, banning people, or converting the server into a juice machine

    tusk.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Tusk.Social

    Users: 558 . Toots: 7183 . Connections: 682 . Language: English

    PLEASE NOTE: There is no way yet to delete accounts or change usernames. So please bear that in mind before creating an account.

    Just another Mastodon instance. But we like it here. Bad behavior is not rewarded. If your hobbies involve harassing people, the constant use of 'SJW' or 'cuck' as pejoratives, or just general shitposting, then find somewhere else to go. You own your freedom. I own the server. A longer, more-detailed policy for this instance is in the works.

    Tusk.social uses the Witches.Town domain block list .

    Don't harass. Don't be a shitty person. Do that, and we'll get along just fine.

    PS - Yo, please get an icon straight away so you don't look like a bot. Also, local accounts which haven't tooted after 45 days are subject to deletion/suspension. Also also, while it's not a rule, just a request... please don't use this instance for follow bots and the like. If it takes, rather than contributes, please do that somewhere else.

    Extended About Page

    FYI - hotmail.com, outlook.com and live.com (so... all of Microsoft, basically) don't like our mail host (mailgun). So... you might have problems if your email is with one of those. Sorry.

    "What's this Mastodon thing all about??" - Here are a couple of articles to get you started.

    http://www.theverge.com/2017/4/7/15183128/mastodon-open-source-twitter-clone-how-to-use https://medium.com/@qinaliu/what-i-wish-i-knew-before-joining-mastodon-7a17e7f12a2b

    Email: accounts@tusk.social

    Admin: @tankgrrl@tusk.social

    ‰Ωï„ÅãÈÄ£Áµ°„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰∏ãË®ò„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Åæ„Åß„ÅäÂïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    fithack@bene.fit.ac.jp

    Á¶èÂ≤°Â∑•Ê•≠Â§ßÂ≠¶ „Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÉØ„Éº„ÇØÁ´∂ÊäÄÊÑõÂ•Ω‰ºö(FIT-HACK)„ÅØ„ÄÅÁ´∂ÊäÄ„Éó„É≠„Ç∞„É©„Éü„É≥„Ç∞„Å®CTF(ÊÉÖÂ†±„Çª„Ç≠„É•„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£„Ç≥„É≥„ÉÜ„Çπ„Éà)„ÅÆ‰∫åÂÖé„ÇíËøΩ„ÅÜ„Çµ„Éº„ÇØ„É´„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ „Éó„É≠„Ç∞„É©„Éü„É≥„Ç∞„Çí‰∏≠ÂøÉ„Å´„ÄÅÊÉÖÂ†±ÁßëÂ≠¶„ÄÅË´ñÁêÜÂ≠¶„ÄÅTeX„ÄÅ„Ç¶„Çß„Éñ„Éö„Éº„Ç∏Âà∂‰Ωú„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºÁÆ°ÁêÜ„ÄÅ „Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÉØ„Éº„ÇØ„ÄÅËá™‰ΩúPC„ÄÅDTP„Å™„Å©„ÄÅÂ§öÂ≤ê„Å´„Çè„Åü„ÇãÊ¥ªÂãï„ÇíÂ±ïÈñã„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    mastodon.dremtech.fr

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 476 . Toots: 2099 . Connections: 606 . Language: English

    An open Mastodon instance in french and english for tech enthusiasts

    More Info... The following guidelines (thanks mastodon.social) are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.dremtech.fr; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: dfages@dremtech.fr

    Admin: @dfages@mastodon.dremtech.fr

    ◊û◊©◊™◊û◊©◊ô tooot.im ("◊î◊©◊®◊™") ◊û◊°◊õ◊ô◊û◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊ß◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊°◊ë◊ô◊ë◊î ◊û◊õ◊ô◊ú◊î ◊ï◊û◊õ◊ë◊ì◊™ ◊¢◊ë◊ï◊®

    ◊ê◊†◊ï ◊©◊ï◊ê◊§◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊û◊®◊ó◊ë ◊û◊©◊ï◊™◊£ ◊ú◊ú◊ê ◊ì◊ô◊õ◊ï◊ô ◊ï◊ì◊ï◊®◊°◊†◊ï◊™, ◊ë◊û◊ï◊ë◊ü ◊©◊ú ◊©◊§◊î ◊ï◊î◊™◊†◊î◊í◊ï◊™

    ◊î◊û◊ë◊ò◊ê◊ï◊™, ◊û◊ó◊ñ◊ß◊ï◊™, ◊ê◊ï ◊û◊¢◊ï◊ì◊ì◊ï◊™ ◊õ◊ú ◊¶◊ï◊®◊î ◊©◊ú ◊¢◊ú◊ô◊ï◊†◊ï◊™ ◊ó◊ë◊®◊™◊ô◊™ ◊û◊¢◊®◊õ◊™◊ô◊™.

    ◊î◊™◊ß◊§◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ô◊©◊ô◊ï◊™

    ◊î◊¢◊®◊ï◊™ ◊™◊ï◊ß◊§◊†◊ô◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ï ◊û◊©◊§◊ô◊ú◊ï◊™

    ◊¶◊ï◊®◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ó◊®◊ï◊™ ◊©◊ú ◊î◊™◊†◊î◊ú◊ï◊™ ◊ï◊©◊§◊î ◊ì◊õ◊ê◊†◊ô◊™

    ◊ì◊ï◊í◊û◊ê◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊î◊™◊†◊î◊ú◊ï◊™ ◊†◊§◊ï◊¶◊î ◊©◊ô◊õ◊ï◊ú◊î ◊ú◊î◊ó◊©◊ë ◊õ◊î◊ò◊®◊ì◊î:

    ◊î◊û◊©◊ö ◊ê◊ô◊†◊ò◊®◊ê◊ß◊¶◊ô◊î ◊¢◊ù ◊û◊©◊™◊û◊©/◊™ ◊©◊ë◊ô◊ß◊©/◊î ◊ë◊ê◊ï◊§◊ü ◊ë◊®◊ï◊® ◊ú◊î◊§◊°◊ô◊ß ◊ê◊™

    ◊î◊ê◊ô◊†◊ò◊®◊ê◊ß◊¶◊ô◊î ◊î◊ñ◊ï, ◊ê◊ï ◊¢◊ô◊ì◊ï◊ì ◊û◊©◊™◊û◊©◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊ó◊®◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊¢◊©◊ï◊™ ◊ñ◊ê◊™.

    ◊ê◊ô◊°◊ï◊£ ◊ê◊ï ◊î◊§◊¶◊î ◊©◊ú ◊†◊™◊ï◊†◊ô◊ù ◊§◊®◊ò◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊©◊ú ◊ê◊ì◊ù ◊ú◊ú◊ê ◊®◊©◊ï◊™◊ï ◊î◊û◊ï◊¶◊î◊®◊™

    (◊§◊®◊ß◊ò◊ô◊ß◊î ◊î◊û◊õ◊ï◊†◊î ◊ú◊¢◊™◊ô◊ù doxing).

    ◊ô◊¶◊ô◊®◊î ◊ï◊©◊ô◊™◊ï◊£ ◊©◊ú ◊¶◊ô◊ú◊ï◊û◊ô ◊û◊°◊ö ◊©◊ú ◊î◊ï◊ì◊¢◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊¢◊ï◊ß◊ë◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊ú◊ë◊ì ◊ê◊ï ◊î◊ï◊ì◊¢◊ï◊™

    ◊§◊®◊ò◊ô◊ï◊™.

    ◊™◊õ◊†◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊°◊ï◊®◊ô◊ù

    ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊û◊î◊°◊ï◊í◊ô◊ù ◊î◊ë◊ê◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊§◊ô◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊î◊§◊ï◊û◊ë◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊ô◊ï◊°◊® ◊ë◊ú◊ô ◊ê◊ñ◊î◊®◊î, ◊ï◊ô◊õ◊ï◊ú ◊ú◊î◊ï◊ë◊ô◊ú

    ◊ú◊ó◊°◊ô◊û◊™ ◊î◊í◊ô◊©◊î ◊©◊ú◊ö ◊ú◊©◊ô◊®◊ï◊™:

    ◊í◊ñ◊¢◊†◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ï ◊™◊û◊ô◊õ◊î ◊ë◊í◊ñ◊¢◊†◊ï◊™

    ◊°◊ß◊°◊ô◊ñ◊ù ◊ê◊ï ◊™◊û◊ô◊õ◊î ◊ë◊°◊ß◊°◊ô◊ñ◊ù

    ◊ú◊î◊ò◊ë◊ï◊§◊ï◊ë◊ô◊î ◊ê◊ï ◊™◊û◊ô◊õ◊î ◊ë◊ú◊î◊ò◊ë◊ï◊§◊ï◊ë◊ô◊î

    ◊©◊†◊ê◊™ ◊ñ◊®◊ô◊ù ◊ï/◊ê◊ï ◊ú◊ê◊ï◊û◊†◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ú◊ô◊û◊î

    ◊ó◊©◊ë◊ï◊†◊ï◊™ ◊©◊û◊©◊û◊©◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊ê◊ï◊§◊ü ◊ß◊ë◊ï◊¢ ◊ú◊î◊§◊ô◊• ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊û◊î◊°◊ï◊í◊ô◊ù ◊î◊†"◊ú, ◊í◊ù ◊ê◊ù ◊ú◊ê

    ◊ë◊ê◊ï◊§◊ü ◊§◊ï◊û◊ë◊ô ◊ú◊ó◊ú◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ü, ◊ô◊ô◊ó◊°◊û◊ï ◊ú◊¶◊û◊ô◊™◊ï◊™.

    ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊û◊î◊°◊ï◊í◊ô◊ù ◊î◊ë◊ê◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊°◊ï◊® ◊ú◊ó◊ú◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ü ◊ï◊ô◊í◊®◊ï◊® ◊ó◊°◊ô◊û◊î

    ◊û◊ô◊ô◊ì◊ô◊™:

    ◊î◊¶◊í◊î ◊û◊ô◊†◊ô◊™ ◊©◊ú ◊ô◊ú◊ì◊ô◊ù/◊ï◊™

    ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊©◊¢◊ï◊ë◊® ◊¢◊ú ◊î◊ó◊ï◊ß ◊ë◊¶◊®◊§◊™ ◊ï◊ë◊í◊®◊û◊†◊ô◊î (◊©◊ù ◊û◊ê◊ï◊õ◊°◊ü ◊î◊©◊®◊™), ◊õ◊ï◊ú◊ú ◊î◊õ◊ó◊©◊™

    ◊©◊ï◊ê◊™ ◊î◊ô◊î◊ï◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ï◊î◊¶◊í◊™ ◊°◊û◊ú◊ô◊ù ◊†◊ê◊¶◊ô◊ô◊ù

    ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊î◊û◊ß◊ì◊ù ◊ê◊ô◊ì◊ô◊ê◊ï◊ú◊ï◊í◊ô◊î ◊†◊ê◊¶◊ô◊™ ◊ê◊ï ◊õ◊î◊†◊ô◊°◊ò◊ô◊™

    ◊õ◊ú ◊û◊©◊™◊û◊©◊ô/◊ï◊™ ◊î◊©◊®◊™ ◊û◊ß◊ë◊ú◊ï◊™ ◊¢◊ú ◊¢◊¶◊û◊ü ◊ú◊©◊ê◊ï◊£ ◊ú◊ß◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊™ ◊õ◊ú◊ú◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊ú◊ï ◊ï◊ú◊§◊¢◊ï◊ú

    ◊†◊í◊ì ◊™◊õ◊†◊ô◊ù ◊ï◊î◊™◊†◊î◊ú◊ï◊™ ◊©◊¢◊ï◊ë◊®◊ô◊ù ◊¢◊ú◊ô◊î◊ù. ◊ë◊§◊®◊ò ◊ê◊†◊ï ◊û◊¢◊ï◊ì◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊™ ◊õ◊ú

    ◊î◊û◊©◊™◊û◊©◊ô◊ù/◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊ì◊ï◊ï◊ó ◊¢◊ú ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊©◊û◊§◊®◊ô◊¢ ◊ú◊î◊ü ◊õ◊ì◊ô ◊ú◊î◊ë◊ô◊ê◊ï ◊ú◊™◊©◊ï◊û◊™ ◊ú◊ë ◊û◊†◊î◊ú◊ô

    ◊î◊©◊®◊™.

    ◊™◊õ◊†◊ô◊ù ◊®◊í◊ô◊©◊ô◊ù

    ◊ô◊© ◊°◊ï◊í◊ô ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊ê◊ï◊™◊ù ◊ê◊†◊ó◊†◊ï ◊©◊ï◊ê◊§◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊ê ◊ú◊î◊¶◊ô◊í ◊ë◊ê◊ï◊§◊ü ◊í◊ú◊ï◊ô ◊ú◊õ◊ú, ◊ê◊ú◊ê

    ◊ú◊î◊©◊™◊û◊© ◊ë◊õ◊ú◊ô◊ù ◊ú◊î◊°◊™◊®◊™ ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü (CW ◊ú◊ò◊ß◊°◊ò, NSFW ◊ú◊™◊û◊ï◊†◊ï◊™) ◊ú◊î◊°◊™◊®◊™◊ù ◊û◊¢◊ô◊†◊ô◊ô◊ù

    ◊©◊ú◊ê ◊ë◊ï◊ó◊®◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊®◊ê◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ï◊™◊ù. ◊õ◊û◊ï◊ë◊ü ◊©◊í◊ù ◊ú◊ê ◊†◊¶◊ô◊í ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊õ◊ñ◊î ◊ú◊¢◊ô◊†◊ô ◊õ◊ú ◊ë◊™◊û◊ï◊†◊™

    ◊î◊§◊®◊ï◊§◊ô◊ú ◊ê◊ï ◊ë◊™◊ô◊ê◊ï◊® ◊î◊ê◊ô◊©◊ô ◊ë◊§◊®◊ï◊§◊ô◊ú ◊©◊ú◊†◊ï.

    ◊™◊õ◊†◊ô◊ù ◊©◊ô◊© ◊ú◊î◊°◊™◊ô◊® ◊ë◊§◊®◊°◊ï◊û◊ô◊ù ◊§◊ï◊ë◊û◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊õ◊ï◊ú◊ú◊ô◊ù:

    ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊§◊ï◊®◊†◊ï◊í◊®◊§◊ô ◊ê◊ï ◊û◊ô◊†◊ô ◊û◊ê◊ï◊ì

    ◊õ◊ú ◊™◊ï◊õ◊ü ◊î◊û◊¶◊ô◊í ◊ê◊ú◊ô◊û◊ï◊™ (◊õ◊ï◊ú◊ú ◊ô◊ô◊¶◊ï◊í◊ô◊ù ◊í◊®◊§◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊©◊ú ◊ê◊†◊©◊ô◊ù ◊û◊™◊ô◊ù ◊ï◊ó◊ô◊ï◊™

    ◊û◊™◊ï◊™, ◊ï◊©◊ú ◊ê◊†◊©◊ô◊ù ◊ó◊û◊ï◊©◊ô◊ù)

    ◊ê◊†◊ô◊û◊¶◊ô◊ï◊™ ◊ê◊ï ◊°◊®◊ò◊ï◊†◊ô◊ù ◊©◊û◊®◊¶◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊ï ◊û◊©◊™◊†◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊û◊î◊ô◊®◊ï◊™

    ◊®◊ï◊ë◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ù

    ◊ê◊†◊ó◊†◊ï ◊©◊®◊™ ◊ô◊ì◊ô◊ì◊ï◊™◊ô ◊ú◊®◊ï◊ë◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ù, ◊¢◊ì ◊í◊ë◊ï◊ú ◊û◊°◊ï◊ô◊ù.

    ◊ê◊§◊° ◊°◊ï◊ë◊ú◊†◊ï◊™ ◊ú- followbots (◊®◊ï◊ë◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ù ◊©◊¢◊ï◊ß◊ë◊ô◊ù ◊ê◊ó◊®◊ô ◊õ◊ú ◊û◊©◊™◊û◊© ◊©◊î◊ù

    ◊®◊ï◊ê◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊®◊©◊™ ◊î◊û◊ë◊ï◊ñ◊®◊™ ◊ë◊©◊ë◊ô◊ú ◊ú◊ê◊õ◊ú◊° ◊ê◊™ ◊î◊§◊ô◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊©◊®◊™ ◊î◊ë◊ô◊™ ◊©◊ú◊î◊ù)

    ◊û◊¢◊ò ◊û◊ê◊ï◊ì ◊°◊ï◊ë◊ú◊†◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊®◊ï◊ë◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ù ◊©◊û◊°◊§◊ô◊û◊ô◊ù, ◊ú◊ì◊¢◊™◊†◊ï, ◊ê◊™ ◊î◊§◊ô◊ì◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊§◊®◊°◊ï◊û◊ô◊ù

    ◊ê◊ï◊ò◊ï◊û◊ò◊ô◊ô◊ù ◊û◊ï◊í◊ñ◊û◊ô◊ù

    ◊ê◊§◊° ◊°◊ï◊ë◊ú◊†◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊®◊ï◊ë◊ï◊ò◊ô◊ù ◊©◊¢◊ï◊ë◊®◊ô◊ù ◊¢◊ú ◊õ◊ú◊ú◊ô ◊î◊©◊®◊™

    ◊©◊®◊™◊ô◊ù ◊ó◊°◊ï◊û◊ô◊ù

    ◊ô◊© ◊©◊®◊™◊ô◊ù ◊ë◊®◊©◊™ ◊î◊û◊ë◊ï◊ñ◊®◊™ ◊©◊ú◊ê ◊†◊ô◊™◊ü ◊ú◊î◊™◊ó◊ë◊® ◊ê◊ô◊™◊ù ◊ì◊®◊ö ◊î◊©◊®◊™ ◊õ◊ô ◊î◊ù

    ◊ó◊°◊ï◊û◊ô◊ù. ◊î◊®◊©◊ô◊û◊î ◊î◊û◊¢◊ï◊ì◊õ◊†◊™ ◊¢◊ù ◊î◊°◊ô◊ë◊ï◊™ ◊ú◊ó◊°◊ô◊û◊î ◊†◊û◊¶◊ê◊™ ◊ë◊í◊ô◊ò◊î◊ê◊ë.

    ◊ß◊†◊®◊ô◊™ ◊¶◊ê"◊§ ‚Äì 1 ◊ë◊û◊ê◊ô 2017

    mastodon.at

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 1870 . Toots: 123158 . Connections: 1114 . Language: English

    mastodon.at is open to all users and federates with most instances.

    üá©üá™ üá¶üáπ üá®üá≠ mastodon.at ist offen f√ºr alle User und ist mit vielen anderen Instanzen verbunden.

    More Info... Welcome to mastodon.at! This instance is open to all users and federates with all other instances with the exception of those with community values that are overwhelmingly incompatible with our Terms of Service below.

    Please read the section Responsibility of Contributors below and report any content that you feel might be inappropriate.

    Follow @Support for important updates!

    üá©üá™ üá¶üáπ üá®üá≠ Willkommen auf mastodon.at! Diese Instanz ist offen f√ºr alle User und ist mit allen anderen Instanzen verbunden, mit der Ausnahme jener, deren Werte mit unseren Nutzungsbedingungen (siehe unten) √ºberwiegend inkompatibel sind.

    üá©üá™ üá¶üáπ üá®üá≠ Bitte lies den Punkt Responsibility of Contributors unten genau durch und melde Inhalte, die du f√ºr unangebracht h√§ltst.

    Folge @Support f√ºr wichtige Updates!

    Terms of Service:

    The following terms and conditions govern all use of the mastodon.at website and all content, services, and products available at or through the website. Our Services are¬†offered subject to your acceptance without modification of all of the terms and conditions contained herein and all other operating rules, policies (including, without limitation, the Privacy Policy) and procedures that may be published from time to time¬†by mastodon.at (collectively, the ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù).¬†You agree that we may automatically upgrade our Services, and these terms¬†will apply to any upgrades.

    Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using our Services. By accessing or using any part of our services, you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access or use any of our services. If these terms and conditions are considered an offer by mastodon.at, acceptance is expressly limited to these terms.

    Use of our¬†Services requires a mastodon.at account. You will be solely responsible and liable for any activity that occurs under your username. You are responsible for keeping your password secure.

    1. Your mastodon.at Account

    If you create an account on mastodon.at, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and blog, and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with your account. You must immediately notify mastodon.at of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. mastodon.at will not be liable for any acts or omissions by you, including any damages of any kind incurred as a result of such acts or omissions.

    2. Responsibility of Contributors

    If you post material to mastodon.at, post links on mastodon.at, or otherwise make (or allow any third party to make) material available (any such material, ‚ÄúContent‚Äù), you are entirely responsible for the content of, and any harm resulting from, that Content or your conduct. That is the case regardless of what form the Content takes, which includes, but is not limited to text, photo, video, audio, or code. By using mastodon.at, you represent and warrant that your Content and conduct do¬†not violate the following terms:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Austria and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    If you delete Content, mastodon.at will use reasonable efforts to remove it from mastodon.at, but you acknowledge that caching or references to the Content may not be made immediately unavailable. Without limiting any of those representations or warranties, mastodon.at has the right (though not the obligation) to, in mastodon.at‚Äôs sole discretion, (i) reclaim your username or website‚Äôs URL due to prolonged inactivity, (ii) refuse or remove any content that, in mastodon.at‚Äôs reasonable opinion, violates any mastodon.at policy or is in any way harmful or objectionable, or (iii) terminate or deny access to and use of mastodon.at¬†to any individual or entity for any reason.

    3. Responsibility of Visitors.

    mastodon.at has not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, posted to our¬†Services, and cannot therefore be responsible for that material‚Äôs content, use or effects. By operating our Services, mastodon.at does not represent or imply that it endorses the material there posted, or that it believes such material to be accurate, useful, or non-harmful. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. Our Services¬†may contain content that is offensive, indecent, or otherwise objectionable, as well as content containing technical inaccuracies, typographical mistakes, and other errors. Our Services may also contain material that violates the privacy or publicity rights, or infringes the intellectual property and other proprietary rights, of third parties, or the downloading, copying or use of which is subject to additional terms and conditions, stated or unstated. mastodon.at disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from the use by visitors of our Services, or from any downloading by those visitors of content there posted. You‚Äôre encouraged to report any content that you feel is inappropriate or in violation of these terms.

    4. Content Posted on Other Websites.

    We have not reviewed, and cannot review, all of the material, including computer software, made available through the websites and webpages to which mastodon.at links, and that link to mastodon.at. mastodon.at does not have any control over those non-mastodon.at websites, and is not responsible for their contents or their use. By linking to a non-mastodon.at website, mastodon.at does not represent or imply that it endorses such website. You are responsible for taking precautions as necessary to protect yourself and your computer systems from viruses, worms, Trojan horses, and other harmful or destructive content. mastodon.at disclaims any responsibility for any harm resulting from your use of non-mastodon.at websites and webpages.

    5. Changes.

    We are constantly updating our Services, and that means sometimes we have to change the legal terms under which our Services are offered. If we make changes that are material, we will let you know by posting on one of our admin accounts, or by sending you an email or other communication before the changes take effect. The notice will designate a reasonable period of time after which the new terms will take effect. If you disagree with our changes, then you should stop using our Services¬†within the designated notice period. Your continued use of our Services¬†will be subject to the new terms. However, any dispute that arose before the changes shall be governed by the Terms (including the binding individual arbitration clause) that were in place when the dispute arose.

    6. Termination.

    mastodon.at may terminate your access to all or any part of our¬†Services¬†at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately. If you wish to terminate this Agreement or your mastodon.at account (if you have one), you may simply discontinue using our Services. All provisions of this Agreement which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

    7. Disclaimer of Warranties.

    Our Services are¬†provided ‚Äúas is.‚Äù mastodon.at and its suppliers and licensors hereby disclaim all warranties of any kind, express or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. Neither mastodon.at nor its suppliers and licensors, makes any warranty that our Services will be error free or that access thereto will be continuous or uninterrupted. You understand that you download from, or otherwise obtain content or services through, our Services at your own discretion and risk.

    8. Limitation of Liability.

    In no event will mastodon.at, or its suppliers or licensors, be liable with respect to any subject matter of this Agreement under any contract, negligence, strict liability or other legal or equitable theory for: (i) any special, incidental or consequential damages; (ii) the cost of procurement for substitute products or services; (iii) for interruption of use or loss or corruption of data; or (iv) for any amounts that exceed the fees paid by you to mastodon.at under this agreement during the twelve (12) month period prior to the cause of action. mastodon.at shall have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond their reasonable control. The foregoing shall not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law.

    9. General Representation and Warranty.

    You represent and warrant that (i) your use of our Services will be in strict accordance with the mastodon.at Privacy Policy, with this Agreement, and with all applicable laws and regulations (including without limitation any local laws or regulations in your country, state, city, or other governmental area, regarding online conduct and acceptable content, and including all applicable laws regarding the transmission of technical data exported from Austria or the country in which you reside) and (ii) your use of our Services will not infringe or misappropriate the intellectual property rights of any third party.

    Adapted from WordPress.com Terms of Service and the mastodon.social content guidelines. WordPress.com Terms of Service available under the Creative Commons Sharealike license.
