    mastodonti.co

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodonti.co

    Users: 187 . Toots: 2685 . Connections: 579 . Language: English

    Hey baby, wanna see my federated timeline?

    Probabilmente la prima istanza italiana di Mastodon. Comportatevi bene.

    More Info... Siamo un gruppo di cinque persone con la passione per FOSS e self-hosting; e quando abbiamo sentito di Mastodon, beh - questo √® il risultato.

    Probabilmente la prima istanza italiana.

    Non ci sono molte regole; se non avete intenzione di spammare, spendere il vostro tempo trollando e/o molestando le altre persone, postare merda fascista/nazista/razzista/misogina/omofobica/transfobica, o porno e/o materiale NSFW senza taggarlo - AKA, evitando di essere teste di cazzo - andremo perfettamente d'accordo.

    In ogni caso, il nostro server √® collocato in un datacenter francese, e quindi dobbiamo rispettare le leggi francesi. Chiediamo ai nostri utenti di non postare o boostare materiale illegale nella giurisdizione francese.

    Altrimenti, come detto da @tankgrll - voi avete la vostra libert√†. Noi possediamo il server.

    We are a group of five people passionate about FOSS and self-hosting; and when we heard about Mastodon, well - this is the result.

    Probably the first Italian instance.

    There are not many rules; if you aren't going to spam, spend your time trolling and/or harassing other people, posting fascist/nazi/racist/mysoginist/homophobe/transphobe shit, or porn and/or NSFW stuff without tagging it as such - AKA, you are not going to be a dick - we'll get along just fine.

    In any case, our server is located in a France datacenter, and as such we have to abide by France's laws. We ask our users to not post or boost material that is illegal by French law. Otherwise, as @tankgrll said - you own your own freedom. We own the server.

    Email: admin@mastodonti.co

    Admin: @mastodontico@mastodonti.co

    cute.group

    Users: 219 . Toots: 2775 . Connections: 603 . Language: English

    ‚ú® A mastodon instance for cuties. üòç

    More Info... In general we follow the terms of service/code of conduct of the flagship instance.

    No nazis, no hate speech, no homophobia, no misogyny, no racism, no sexism, no xenophobia and definitely no transphobia. Just be respectful.

    Please flag all porn with nsfw and make sure it's unlisted so it doesn't show up in the local timeline. Feel free to create private AD accounts.

    It's important to keep in mind that this site is run by a queer trans girl. You are encouraged to report and complain if people are giving you trouble. I want people to feel safe here. If that doesn't sound like something you can do, DON'T JOIN.

    Server is based in Silicon Valley. Stats

    Email: c.stars@icloud.com

    Admin: @stickypaws@cute.group

    "Tekkadon" is Mastodon instance for community of around the Miura Peninsula, Kanagawa, Japan. However, even if you are unrelated to the Miura Peninsula, you are OK. Basically anyone can join. Welcome to Tekkadon!

    But "Tekkadon" is test driving slowly and loosely. Server down or data lose may occur. Suddenly "Tekkadon" may disappear. Please be ready at any time to be able to start again in another Mastodon instance.

    Tekkadon administrator is also one of the beginners who want to learn while enjoying Mastodon.

    Let's enjoy with us, Pawooooooooooooooooon!

    (Ôºí) Áµ±Ë®àÁöÑÊÉÖÂ†±„Å®„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅ„ÅäÂÆ¢ÊßòÂÄã‰∫∫„ÇíË≠òÂà•„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑÁä∂ÊÖã„Å´Âä†Â∑•„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    (Ôºì) Ê≥ï‰ª§„Å´Âü∫„Å•„ÅÑ„Åü„ÄÅÈÅ©Ê≥ï„Å™ÈñãÁ§∫Ë¶ÅÊ±Ç„ÇíÂèó„Åë„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    swast.club

    Swast Club

    Users: 5 . Toots: 43 . Connections: 248 . Language: English

    The Swast Club is a Mastodon instance for friends and family of Tim & Alexandra Swast.

    If you don't know Tim or Alexandra, consider using another Mastodon instance .

    • Be kind to each other.
    • Do not post content that is illegal in the United States of America.

    These guidelines are not a legal document. The final say is up to @tim and @alexandra. We reserve the right to remove your account from this instance.

    Email: tswast@gmail.com

    Admin: @tim@swast.club

    ohai.su

    about

    preview

    join

    ohai.su mastodon

    Users: 51 . Toots: 897 . Connections: 687 . Language: English

    ohai.su

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    The use of sexualized / violent language or imagery at non-consenting parties, on the public timeline, or without the nsfw filter

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct

    Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on ohai.su and to public spaces when an individual is representing ohai.su or its community. Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Email: lukas@fnordserver.eu

    Admin: @lutoma@ohai.su

    redwombat.social

    about

    preview

    join

    RedWombat.social

    Users: 1 . Toots: 96 . Connections: 128 . Language: English

    RedWombat.social is a Mastodon Instance for use by Kevin Sonney , Ursula Vernon, and their friends and family.

    Accounts are by invitation only , although we connect and share with the rest of the Mastodon Universe.

    More Info... Shamelessly borrowed with permission from Kitty.Town

    As a user of RedWombat.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from RedWombat.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admins.

    Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

    Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Admins)

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and graphic violence

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from RedWombat.social.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on RedWombat.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing RedWombat.social or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Admins reserve the right to revoke any user's content on or access to RedWombat.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: kevin@sonney.com

    Admin: @ksonney@redwombat.social

    coales.co

    about

    preview

    join

    COALES.CO - Come Together!

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    Micro-blogging site operated by Mark Shane Hayden of Coalesco Digital Systems Inc. We are located in Alberta, Canada. This is NOT intended to be a commercial/promotional site! Registration is open to anyone interested in civil discussions on any interesting topic--especially technology, current events and politics.

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    Site administration reserved the right to suspend or remove users that do not behave in a civil manner. Specific guidelines are being further developed and will be placed here as the site develops.

    Inappropriate Content

    Users who post inappropriate content will be suspended after a warning. Repeat offenders will be permanently banned.

    Advertisements of any kind without the express written permission of site administration are PROHIBITED. Please ask permission before posting anything of a commercial nature

    Bots are allowed only if they do not clutter the timeline or engage with other users without their permission. Please contact site administration before using bots to be sure they are appropriate!

    Content that is considered obscene, libelous, hate speech or otherwise unlawful under Canadian law will be removed immediately and the user who posted it banned without warning

    Personal attacks, derogatory remarks or discriminatory behaviour towards others based on ANY personal characteristics will not be tolerated!

    Accounts that mislead or misrepresent the true identity of a user will be banned immediately (no fake celebrities allowed!)

    Harassment, bullying or otherwise inciting hatred against others is prohibited

    Users are responsible for vetting articles/links they post or share. Users who repeatedly post "fake news" without stating it is as such will be suspended or banned.

    Content Warnings

    The Mastodon platform offers a "content warning" feature that obscures post content until a user explicitly opens it. This allows for sensitive information or potentially offensive or distressing content to be hidden from those who do not wish to see it. The following should be placed within content warnings:

    Any level of violence, nudity or sexual content that would be deemed higher than a "PG" rating

    Anything that would be considered a "spoiler" when discussing popular movies, television shows, sporting events or current events

    VERY sensitive topics which may incite excessively heated arcuments. Keep in mind that healthy lively discussion is encouraged and users are NOT expected to conceal everything that might be the slightest bit disagreeable!

    Blocked Instances

    Insances that are the source of repeated posts to the federated timeline that violate ou code of conduct will be blacklisted.

    Currently no instances are banned. This area will be kept up to date if and when an instance is added to the blacklist.

    Email: info@coalesco.ca

    Admin: @msh@coales.co

    myriad.social

    about

    preview

    join

    myriad.social

    Users: 19 . Toots: 241 . Connections: 374 . Language: English

    " a social network where i'm not blocked...yet " - @Dre2Dee2

    myriad.social is a discrete node in the mastodon network and the gnu social -compliant fediverse .

    myriad.social is hosted in bucharest, romania and operates as a 'free-speech friendly' instance with emphasis on low moderation, high security, and full transparency, and operates under the auspices of the myriad truths project.

    More Info... myriad.social has a 'low-moderation' policy to facilitate free speech on this instance. This is not a legally binding document and may be updated and changed at our discretion, but currently our policy is to only remove content if it:

    - depicts minors in a sexually explicit manner

    - is illegal in romania (the locale where our infastructure resides)

    - disrupts the stability of the instance for other users

    please report any content which violates one of these directives. general security-related correspondence, such as vulnerability disclosures, are gladly received at security@myriad.social. myriad.social is a venture of The Myriad Truths Project, which accepts financial contributions from individual supporters and backers.

    Email: speak@myriadtruths.com

    Admin: @myriadtruths@myriad.social

    Áü•ÁöÑÂ•ΩÂ•áÂøÉ„ÇíÊ∫Ä„Åü„Åô„Åü„ÇÅ„Å†„Åë„Å´Á´ã„Å¶„ÅüÂÄã‰∫∫„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÄÇÂÄã‰∫∫„Å™„ÅÆ„ÅßÂãùÊâã„Å´Âãï„Åã„Åô„ÅóÂãùÊâã„Å´Ê≠¢„ÇÅ„Çã„Å£„Å¶ÊÑü„Åò„Åß„ÇÜ„Çã„ÅèÊ§úË®º‰ΩúÊ•≠„Å®„Åã„Çí„ÇÑ„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÇÇ„ÄÇ

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    https://free.m.to/ „Çà„Çä„ÅäÂÄü„Çä„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂÄã‰∫∫„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„ÉÜ„Çπ„Éà‰∏≠„ÄÇ „Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ‰∏ÄË¶ß„Å™„Å©„Å∏„ÅÆÊé≤Ëºâ„ÅØ„ÅîÈÅ†ÊÖÆ„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁöÑ„Å´‰Ωø„ÅÑ„Åü„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„ÅßÁÆ°ÁêÜ„Åß„Åç„ÇãÈôê„Çä„ÅØÂèÇÂä†ÁôªÈå≤„ÇÇÂèó„Åë„Å§„Åë„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    CMU.party

    Users: 17 . Toots: 50 . Connections: 105 . Language: English

    A Mastodon instance for the Carnegie Mellon community.

    This is space for Carnegie Mellon students, staff, and faculty to chat. This will be moderated for harassment. Please note that registration is restricted to cmu.edu (and subdomain) email addresses!

    Email: cgleason@cmu.edu

    Admin: @cgleason@cmu.party

    icosahedron.website

    Icosahedron

    Users: 565 . Toots: 53842 . Connections: 1206 . Language: English

    icosahedron.website

    More Info... Ôº¥„ÄÄÔº°„ÄÄÔºÆ„ÄÄÔº°„ÄÄÔº≥„ÄÄÔº©„ÄÄÔºÆ„ÄÄÔºÆ

    Site rules

    In order for this website to be able to function, there are some rules that you will have to follow while using it.

    Be friendly.

    The internet is a network that connects people using computers. The other endpoint is a human being with an inner life just as complex as your own. Act accordingly.

    Consider the reach of the posts you make. Tag content that you expect others might not want to see.

    Harassment and bullying of any kind are not tolerated here. Do not engage with a user if they do not want you to. Do not ask other users to, either.

    Don‚Äôt start shit.

    Do not make posts just to get angry reactions.

    ‚ÄúI was being ironic‚Äù is an extremely flimsy excuse for behaving badly.

    Do not drag unrelated people into a discussion.

    Obey the law.

    Specifically, Dutch (server location) and German (owner location) law.

    No illegal file sharing, no illegal pornography, no publication of personal protected information, no holocaust denial, you know the drill.

    Spam is not allowed.

    Bots that interact with a user without a users explicit request are not allowed.

    Automated or excessive advertising is not allowed.

    Be aware of the nature of the network.

    This website is part of a network of similar websites. Other websites may have different rules.

    The local administration has little control over users of other websites. You can, however, block and mute them - same as local users.

    In egregious cases, remote users or entire groups of users may be blocked from interacting with users of this website.

    Fascism is incompatible with a free exchange of ideas.

    When you endorse racism, exclusion and the structural and physical violence that come with it, you show yourself to not be interested in any sort of dialogue.

    Those who work towards a society based on chauvinism and nationalism rather than peaceful coexistance are not welcome here.

    Admin decisions are final.

    The interpretation of these rules is up to the administration and an admins decision overrides the rules.

    ‚ÄúTechnically I did not violate any rule‚Äù is an extremely flimsy excuse for behaving badly.

    The rules may be changed or amended when necessary.

    These goal of these rules is to ensure a safe and welcoming environment.

    Rule enforcement is guided by this goal.

    Any enforcement action will generally be kept between those involved.

    Try to self-moderate, but do not hesitate to involve an admin when necessary.

    There are presently three people with administrative access to the website, @halcy, @dotUser, @WAHa_06x36 .

    You can report rule violations via e-mail.

    Email: lorenzd+icosa@gmail.com

    Admin: @halcy@icosahedron.website

    join

    Users: 40 . Toots: 254836 . Connections: 34 . Language: English

    More Info...

    ‚òÖÈáçË¶ÅÔºöÁôªÈå≤Á¢∫Ë™ç„É°„Éº„É´„Åå„ÄÅËø∑ÊÉë„É°„Éº„É´„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„Å´Â±ä„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„ÅôÔºÅÔºÅÁâπ„Å´Gmail„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅîÁ¢∫Ë™çÈ†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„ÅôÔºÅHTML„É°„Éº„É´„ÅåÂèó‰ø°„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑ„Çπ„Éû„ÉõÁ≠â„Åß„ÅØÁôªÈå≤„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åõ„ÇìÔºÅ

    ‚ÄªÂñÑ„ÅØÊÄ•„ÅíÔºÅ„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åß„ÄÅÊÄ•„Åç„ÇáÈñãÂßãËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ‰ªäÂæå„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂ÊñπÈáù„Åå„Åæ„Å†Á¢∫ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    „ÄêÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ/ÂÖçË≤¨‰∫ãÈ†Ö/Á¶ÅÊ≠¢‰∫ãÈ†Ö„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„Äë

    ‚òÖ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Å´ÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„Çã„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´Á≠â„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∫∫„ÅØÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Åü„ÅîÊú¨‰∫∫„Å´Ê≥ïÁöÑ„Å™Ë≤¨‰ªª„ÅåÁîü„Åò„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁô∫Ë®ÄÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÂçÅÂàÜÊ∞ó„Çí‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÁôªÈå≤„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÅÆIP„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Åã„ÇâÂÄã‰∫∫„ÅÆÁâπÂÆö„ÅØ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çà„Çç„Åó„Åè„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅÂΩì„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„Åß‰∫ãÂÆüÁ¢∫Ë™ç„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„ÅØËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂÆü„ÅÆÊúâÁÑ°„Å´Èñ¢„Çè„Çâ„ÅöÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫„Å∏„ÅÆÂ®ÅÂúßÁöÑ„Å™„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÇÑ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„ÄÅÈÅéÂéª„ÅÆ„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´„ÅÆÂëäÁô∫Á≠â„ÅÆÁô∫Ë®Ä„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚òÖ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„ÉàÂáçÁµê„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    ÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅÆ„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„Åå‰∏çÂø´„Å´ÊÄù„ÅÜÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´„ÅØ„Å©„Çì„Å©„Çì„Å®„Éü„É•„Éº„Éà„ÇÑ„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏çÂø´„Å™Áä∂Ê≥Å„ÅåÁ∂ö„ÅÑ„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÈÄöÂ†±„Åó„Å¶‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇË§áÊï∞„ÅÆÊñπ„Åã„Çâ„ÄÅÂêåÊßò„ÅÆÈÄöÂ†±„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åü„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„Åß„ÇÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç„Åó„Åü‰∏ä„Åß„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆ‰∫àÂëä„Å™„ÅèÊï∞„ÅãÊúàÈñìÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÄÅË©≤ÂΩì„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Çí„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„Çí„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ‰∫ãÂÆü„ÅÆÊúâÁÑ°„Çí„ÉÅ„Çß„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åô„ÇãÊ©üËÉΩ„ÅØÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å´„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇÈôê„Çä„ÅÇ„ÇãÊôÇÈñì„ÅÆ‰∏≠„ÅßÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫ãÂÆü„ÅÆÊúâÁÑ°„Å´Èñ¢„Çè„Çâ„Åö„ÄÅÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫„ÇíÂØæË±°„Å®„Åó„ÅüÁô∫Ë®Ä„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å∏„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà‰∏ä„ÅÆ„Éà„É©„Éñ„É´„ÅÆÊåÅ„Å°Ëæº„Åø„ÅØÂé≥Á¶Å„Å®„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åù„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„ÅØ„ÄÅÊúâÂêçÊé≤Á§∫Áâà„Å∏Êõ∏„ÅçËæº„Çì„Åß‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„Å®„ÄÅ„É≠„Éº„Ç´„É´TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊñπ„ÅÆ„Éõ„Éº„É†TL„Å´„ÅØ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªäÂæå„ÄÅ‰ªïÊßò„ÅåÂ§âÊõ¥„Åï„Çå„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‰∏çÂø´„Å™„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅÆÂâäÈô§„ÅåÂÆüË°å„Åï„Çå„ÄÅÈÅéÊøÄ„Å™Áô∫Ë®Ä„Åå„Å™„Åè„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Åß„Åó„Åü„Çâ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíËß£Èô§„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÇÇ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„É¨„É≥„ÇπÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆÂÆåÂÖ®ÂáçÁµê„ÇíËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ´å„Åå„Çâ„ÅõË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØ„ÄÅÂàë‰∫ã‰∫ã‰ª∂„Å®„Å™„ÇãÂ®ÅÂäõÊ•≠ÂãôÂ¶®ÂÆ≥Á≠â„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁØÄÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„Çã‰∫§ÊµÅ„Çí„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªËá™Ë≤ª„ÅßÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÅÆÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÅåÈùûÂ∏∏„Å´‰Ωé„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Å´Ë≤†Ëç∑„ÅÆÊéõ„Åã„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÂ∫¶„Å´30‰ª∂‰ª•‰∏ä„ÅÆCSV„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã„Å®„ÄÅÂá¶ÁêÜËÉΩÂäõ„ÇíË∂Ö„Åà„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ßÈáè„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„É™„Çπ„Éà„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Éù„Éº„ÉàÁ≠â„ÅØÁµ∂ÂØæ„Å´„ÅäÊéß„Åà‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇPawooÁ≠â„Å®ÊØî„Åπ„Çã„Å®Êï∞ÂçÉÂÄç„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Çπ„Éö„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÅÆÂ∑Æ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÅîÁêÜËß£È†Ç„Åë„Çå„Å∞Âπ∏„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª‰ªñ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØÂéüÂâáÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å®„ÅØÈñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑ„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÅåÂ§ßÂπÖ„Å´Â¢ó„Åà„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„ÅåÈÅÖ„Åè„Å™„Å£„Åü„Çä„ÄÅHDD„ÅÆÂÆπÈáè„Åå‰∏ÄÊùØ„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÜ„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÂºäÂÆ≥„ÅåÂá∫„ÇãÁÇ∫„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªñ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅpawoo.net„ÇÑfriends.nicoÁ≠â„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åã„Çâ„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Éû„Å®Èñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÂÆ£‰ºùÁõÆÁöÑ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØÂç≥ÊôÇ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§Ëá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇË≤ßÂº±„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å™„Çì„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÊçúÊüªÊ©üÈñ¢Á≠â„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆË¶ÅË´ã„ÅåÊù•„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„ÇπÁ≠â„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®Á≠â„ÅÆË≤†ÊãÖ„ÅåÁµêÊßãÂ§ß„Åç„ÅÑÁÇ∫„ÄÅ‰ªäÂæåÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ª„ÇíË≥Ñ„ÅÜÁÇ∫„Å´„ÄÅÂ∫ÉÂëäÁ≠â„ÅåÂÖ•„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊúÄÁµÇÁöÑ„Å´ÊØéÊúà„Ç¶„É≥ÂçÅ‰∏áÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÉºË≤ªÁî®„ÅåÊéõ„Åã„ÇãÂèØËÉΩÊÄß„ÇÇ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „ÅîÊäïÁ®øÈ†Ç„ÅÑ„Åü„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§öÂ™í‰Ωì„Åß„ÅÆÁ¥π‰ªã„ÇÑ‰∫∫Âè£Áü•ËÉΩ„ÇíÁî®„ÅÑ„Åü„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅßÂà©Áî®„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂèéÁõä„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÇíÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åï„Åõ„ÇãÁÇ∫„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®Ôºà„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº‰ª£„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂Ë≤ªÁ≠âÔºâ„Å´ÂÖÖ„Å¶„Åï„Åõ„Å¶È†Ç„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ÄªÈÄÄ‰ºöÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÅÆÊ©üËÉΩ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁèæÂú®„ÅÆ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Å´„ÅØ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÁÆ°ÁêÜËÄÖ„Å´„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°È†Ç„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇÂØæÂøúËá¥„Åó„Åã„Å≠„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫à„ÇÅ„Åî‰∫ÜÊâø‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÈÄÄ‰ºö„Å´Ëøë„ÅÑÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„Åü„ÅÑÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅîËá™Ë∫´„Åß„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÇíÂâäÈô§„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„ÉØ„Éº„Çí„Éñ„É≠„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÇíÂ§ñ„Åó„ÄÅ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÂ§â„Åà„ÄÅ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÇíÊç®„Å¶„Ç¢„Éâ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„Åô„ÇãÁ≠â„ÅÆÂØæÂøú„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶È†Ç„ÅèÂøÖË¶Å„Åå„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Blocked instances

    Instance

    Block type

    Reason

    pawoo.net

    Silence

    Lots of Japanese posts which our users don't understand

    (Silence means that an instance's posts don't show up in in the federated timeline. Suspend means that they don't show up at all.)

    mastodon.land

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 907 . Toots: 6250 . Connections: 802 . Language: English

    Free Mastodon instance open to all users.
    Create an account here give you an opportunity to interact with mastodon users across all other instances.

    More Info... Description

    We believe in free softwares and we plan to maintain our instance on the long term.

    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time.

    Any user not respecting these rules may get suspended.

    Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited

    Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description

    Servers location : France

    Stats

    Mastodon

    Syst√®me

    Email: contact@rock-hosting.com

    Admin: @Yann@mastodon.land

    Anitwitter [Pawoo]

    Users: 213 . Toots: 4653 . Connections: 466 . Language: English

    Anitwitter is a Anime-focused Mastodon instance, with a focus on free speech and little to no moderation.

    More Info... Don't be a dick.

    Please note: your confirmation email will LIKELY go to spam. Check there.

    Moderation disclaimer:

    Toots made on anitwitter.com will not be moderated in any way. I believe that forcing people to abide to what they can say online is not my business, and people are able to filter the content they don't want to see.

    That being said, NSFW post flagging is not required.

    HOWEVER

    If you do nothing but harass people mindlessly just to be an edgelord werido I will have zero qualms about investigating why I should keep you on this instance.

    Also don't post child porn** or something,

    **Lolicon art isn't child porn.

    Email: dogrunes@outlook.com

    Admin: @dogrunes@anitwitter.com

    ‰ºÅÊ•≠„ÉªÂ∫óËàó„Éª„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Éª„É©„Ç§„Çø„Éº„Éª„É°„Éº„Ç´„Éº„ÉªÈõëË™å„ÉªÁï™ÁµÑÈñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅÆÂèÇÂä†„ÅäÂæÖ„Å°„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÈÅãÁî®ÊñπÈáù„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„Äê„Éë„ÉÅ„É≥„Ç≥„Éª„Çπ„É≠„ÉÉ„Éà„Å´Èñ¢„Å£„Å¶„ÇãÊñπ„ÅåÊ•Ω„Åó„ÅèÈÅé„Åî„Åõ„ÇãÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Äë„ÇíÁõÆÊåá„Åó„Å¶„ÇÑ„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åç„Åü„ÅÑ„Å®ËÄÉ„Åà„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „É´„Éº„É´ Ê≥ïÂæã„ÅØÂÆà„Å£„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑÔºéÁäØÁΩ™„Å´Âä†ÊãÖ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åù„ÅÜ„Å†„Å£„Åü„ÇäÔºå„ÉÜ„Ç≠„Çπ„ÉàÁîªÂÉèÂê´„ÇÅÂÖ¨Â∫èËâØ‰øó„Å´Âèç„Åô„ÇãÁâ©„ÇÑÊó•Êú¨Ê≥ï„Å´ÊäµËß¶„Åô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„Åü BOT„ÅÆÈ°û„ÄÅ ‰ªñËÄÖ„Å∏„ÅÆË™πË¨ó‰∏≠ÂÇ∑„ÄÅÁΩµÂÄí„ÄÅÊö¥Ë®Ä„ÄÅÂ∑ÆÂà•ÁöÑÁô∫Ë®Ä„ÇÇ„ÅäÊ≠¢„ÇÅ„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    mastodon.nu

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.nu

    Users: 120 . Toots: 450 . Connections: 660 . Language: English

    Mastodon Site running on AWS (Frankfurt), managed from The Netherlands.

    More Info... This Mastodon instance is managed from The Netherlands, but can be used by any nationality. No restrictions on languages.

    Admin only speaks Dutch/English/German and a little French.

    Launched April 12th, 2017.

    The server runs on an Amazon AWS server, and is monitored for capacity / load. It can be extended if needed.

    Also, daily backups are created and stored in a different location.

    Rules are easy:

    No illegal or offensive content. Donations are welcome for maintaining and expanding the server.

    Email: info@mastodon.nu

    Admin: @ruudboy@mastodon.nu

    forum.manga.tokyo

    about

    preview

    join

    Forum.MANGA.TOKYO

    Users: 306 . Toots: 887 . Connections: 41 . Language: English

    A community for fans of Japanese culture, such as anime, manga, voice actors and more, operated by MANGA.TOKYO through a mastodon instance. Anybody can participate in talks about the hottest topics and the newest anime information as well as find new friends and talk to people who have the same interests.

    How to make an account

    To use forum.manga.tokyo you must create an account.

    1. Fill in your username, e-mail address and password and click ‚ÄòGet Started‚Äô.

    2. You will receive a confirmation e-mail, please confirm your account by clicking on the link in the e-mail.

    3. Log in via the Login page.

    That completes your registration.
    Let's have fun!!

    Forum Rules

    Use hashtags when talking about specific anime/manga etc
    Use the spoiler tag ‚ÄòCW‚Äô for spoilers
    Respect others to create a place that everybody likes to return to.

    Note

    • Acts against the law are prohibited.
    • Do not infringe on the rights of others.
    • Do not copy or post the work of others without permission.
    • Do not act against public order or morals.
    • Do not impersonate other people or imitate organizations etc.
    • Do not cause hurt or loss in any form to other people
    • Do not overload the server with material

    ‚Äª Please note that anything you write in your toots (posts) here may be quoted on MANGA.TOKYO

    Contact and Inquiries

    Twitter: @manga_tokyo_

    If you find we have infringed upon copyright, please contact us on the following address

    Mail: info.manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Terms of Use

    Privacy Policy

    Contact

    MANGA.TOKYO

    @mangatokyo

    Business e-mail:

    manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Email: manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Admin: @mangatokyo@forum.manga.tokyo

    join

    Mastodon @ UMU

    Users: 10 . Toots: 23 . Connections: 511 . Language: English

    mastodon.acc.umu.se is run by the Academic Computer Club at Ume√• University located in Ume√•, Sweden.

    Currently registration is only open to users affiliated with Ume√• University so please use your university email when signing up!

    For those outside of Ume√• University, please see our sibling instance mastodon.acc.sunet.se which is open for registration to the world.

    More Info... WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

    ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks.

    You can read more about our projects and our servers on the ACC website.

    Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.

    General Usage

    Accounts on mastodon.acc.umu.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own? :)

    We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):(in English) (i Svenska)

    You may not post (or boost/repost):

    material illegal under Swedish laws

    material against the rules of SUNET

    material in breach of the copyright act

    material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

    It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

    Code of Conduct

    Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

    You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

    Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

    If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

    Reporting an issue

    For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

    For content or abuse issues:

    if you're a user on mastodon.acc.umu.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;

    If you're not a user on social.tchncs.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".

    For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

    Privacy

    ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

    Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

    Federation

    mastodon.acc.umu.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

    Currently not federating with: none

    In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions on content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

    Currently silenced:

    pawoo.net (no media)

    Last updated: 2017-04-28

    Email: mastodon@acc.umu.se

    Admin: @maswan@mastodon.acc.umu.se

    m.massy.city

    Notre r√©seau social, et son r√©seau entier selon nous, est d√©di√© √† la r√©appropriation des moyens de communication et √† la cr√©ation de communaut√©s meilleures pour le collectif.     Ces r√®gles sont inspir√©es par celles √©crites pour l'instance unixcorn, merci √† eux.

    engineered.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Engineered Space

    Users: 2 . Toots: 88 . Connections: 164 . Language: English

    A Mastodon Instance for engineering professionals wishing to collaborate and keep in touch that isn't run by a corporation.

    More Info... Basic rules

    This instance is intended for engineering professionals wishing to collaborate and keep in touch

    Users must use their real names

    Discussions about politics and the state of the world are not permitted. If you want that, go to Twitter

    Don't be a jerk

    Respect others and if you have a disagreement, keep it in direct messages, not in public

    Please keep bad memes, sexism, racism or any politically incorrect commentary out of the public timeline

    No hate speech will be tolerated

    Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends

    Loli, gore and rape is not allowed

    Don't make parody accounts and don't spam

    No bots are permitted on this instance

    If you see any posts or behaviour that breech these rules then please report them (in the Toot Menu) or directly to the administrator @chidgey. All reports will be investigated, and if investigation determines you didn't respect the restrictions, you might get suspended.

    NSFW (Not Safe For Work) is allowed if you put it behind both NSFW and CW tags (below the Toot/Message text box).

    Email: admin@engineered.network

    Admin: Not Available

    Anrealmsdon„ÅØMastodon„ÅÆAnrealmsÂÖ¨Âºè„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇAnrealms („Ç¢„É≥„É¨„É´„É†„Ç∫) „ÅØ„ÉÅ„Éº„É†„Å®„Åó„Å¶„Ç¢„Éº„Éà„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„Ç®„É≥„Çπ„ÄÅ„Éá„Ç∂„Ç§„É≥„ÄÅ„Ç®„É≥„Ç∏„Éã„Ç¢„É™„É≥„Ç∞„Å™„Å©„ÅÆ„Ç≥„É©„Éú„É¨„Éº„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Çí‰∏ª‰Ωì„Å®„Åó„Åü„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„ÉàÊ¥ªÂãï„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊúÄËøë„Åß„ÅØÁ©∫„ÅçÂÆ∂„ÇíÊ¥ªÁî®„Åó„Åü„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„ÄÅAI„ÇíÊ¥ªÁî®„Åó„Åü„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„ÇíÁ´ã„Å°‰∏ä„Åí„Åü„Çä„ÇÇ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´info„ÅåÂÖ¨Âºè„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Åù„Çå‰ª•Â§ñ„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„É°„É≥„Éê„Éº„ÅÆ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    wandering.shop

    about

    preview

    join

    Wandering Shop

    Users: 178 . Toots: 9829 . Connections: 444 . Language: English

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct .

    Code of Conduct

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone. By joining the Wandering Shop, you're agreeing to abide by our code of conduct .

    More Info... The Wandering Shop Code of Conduct

    Welcome!

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics.

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form.

    Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone.

    Unacceptable Behavior

    The following behavior is not welcome anywhere in The Wandering Shop:

    Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.

    Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism.

    Deliberate or persistent misgendering.

    Threats of violence.

    Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm.

    Deliberate intimidation.

    Publishing any individual's address, phone number, or other private identifying information without consent.

    Sexual depictions of children.

    Unwelcome sexual attention, including sharing sexual content with specific users without consent.

    Gratuitous sexual images or behavior without a content warning.

    Simulated physical contact (e.g. textual descriptions like ‚Äú*hug*‚Äù or ‚Äú*backrub*‚Äù) without consent or after a request to stop.

    Publication of non-harassing private communication without consent.

    Sustained disruption of discussion.

    Continued communications with someone who's asked that you leave them alone.

    Unwelcome comments regarding a person‚Äôs lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment.

    The following behavior is not allowed on the public timeline:

    Graphic violent or sexual content without a content warning

    Gratuitous advertizing or spam. It's fine to promote your work, but it shouldn't be the bulk of what you share.

    Known Harassers:

    The admins may ban or silence users whom we know to be harassers or abusers, even if they have not violated the rules of this instance. The mere presence of a harasser can make past or potential victims uncomfortable, and it can put potential victims who are unaware of the person's history in particular danger. Users are encouraged to individually mute, block, and/or report accounts they don't want to see, but at our discretion, we may take the additional step of blocking or silencing someone instance-wide if we believe they endanger the safe and welcoming space we're trying to maintain.

    Reporting

    The current admins are:

    Annalee

    Phildini

    If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the admins. They'll respond as promptly as they can.

    We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom we‚Äôve received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent.

    Consequences

    Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

    If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from the wandering shop and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

    Credits and License This code of conduct is based on Annalee Flower Horne's Sample Slack Code of Conduct, which is in turn based on Geek Feminism's Community Anti-Harassment Policy.

    Email: phildini@phildini.net

    Admin: @phildini@wandering.shop

    mastodon.gougere.fr

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - Goug√®re Network

    Users: 1169 . Toots: 22621 . Connections: 936 . Language: French

    Vive les goug√®res ! mnt-by: @yapret @papaeng89

    More Info... Goug√®re ?

    Vous vous trouvez sur l'instance Mastodon de Goug√®re, un r√©seau informatique g√©r√© sur notre temps libre. L'instance est maintenue par @papaeng89 et @yapret.

    Le serveur se trouve dans le datacenter Auxerrois de Virtua Networks, et utilise la bande passante de SCANI.

    Quelques r√®gles

    De mani√®re g√©n√©rale, les utilisateurs de cette instance sont invit√©s √† respecter la Netiquette (telle que d√©crite dans la RFC 1855).

    Les contenus NSFW sont autoris√©s seulement s'ils sont tagg√©s comme tels et l√©gaux en France, de m√™me que les spoilers pouett√©s doivent l'√™tre sous Content Warning explicite. Il est souhaitable que chacun tente, dans la mesure du possible, de ne pas flooder, notamment sur les timelines publiques.

    La libert√© des uns s'arr√™te l√† o√π commence celle des autres. Si quelqu'un empi√®te sur la v√¥tre, vous pouvez le bloquer et/ou le signaler aux administrateurs, qui se chargeront, avec l'avis de la communaut√©, de prendre les mesures n√©cessaires.

    Nous aider

    L'acc√®s √† l'instance est gratuit et le restera, mais le r√©seau Goug√®re a un co√ªt. Pour nous aider √† le supporter, c'est par l√† : https://www.patreon.com/yapret

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @gougerenet@mastodon.gougere.fr

    august-don.site

    about

    preview

    join

    ÂÖ´ÊúàÈØñ (august-don)

    Users: 48 . Toots: 121 . Connections: 120 . Language: English

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„ÉÄ„É´„Éà„Ç≤„Éº„É†„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÆË©±È°å„ÇíÊâ±„ÅÜ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¥îÊÑõ„Éª„Ç≠„É£„É©„Ç≤„Éº„Çí‰∏≠ÂøÉ„Å´„Ç™„Éº„Ç¨„Çπ„Éà„Å´Èôê„Çâ„ÅöÊßò„ÄÖ„Å™„É°„Éº„Ç´„Éº„Åï„Çì„ÅÆ‰ΩúÂìÅ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶Ë©±„ÅóÂêà„ÅÑ„Åü„ÅÑ‰∫∫„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„Å´‰ΩúÊàê„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ

    „ÇÇ„Å°„Çç„Çì„ÄÅÊó•Â∏∏ÁöÑ„Å™‰ºöË©±„ÇÇOK„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÂêÑÁ®Æ„É°„Éº„É´„ÅØ„ÄÅnotification@mail.august-don.site„Çà„Çä„ÅäÈÄÅ„Çä„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Ê≥®ÊÑè‰∫ãÈ†Ö

    „Çµ„Éº„Éê„ÅÆË≤†Ëç∑Á≠â„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅ‰ΩïÊôÇ„Åß„ÇÇ„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Åå‰∏≠Êñ≠„ÉªÁµÇ‰∫Ü„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å´Ë≤†Ëç∑„ÅÆ„Åã„Åã„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„Éª‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å∏„ÅÆËø∑ÊÉëË°åÁÇ∫„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÂáçÁµê„Åï„Åõ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÊÜëÂñ™„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶Êàë„ÄÖ„ÅØ„Åæ„Å£„Åü„Åè„ÅÆÁÑ°Âäõ„Å†„Å£„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„Å®„ÅÇ„ÇãÁ•ûÁ§æ„Å´Â•âÁ¥ç„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÅüÁ•ûÂàÄ„ÅåÊÜëÂñ™„Å´ÊúâÂäπ„Å†„Å£„Åü„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÂ†±Âëä„ÅåÂèçÊíÉ„ÅÆÁ≥∏Âè£„Å®„Å™„Çã„ÄÇ

    (This server located in Kamakura-city, Yokohama pref, Japan)

    @pref.yokohama / @monora.me „ÅÇ„Åü„Çä„ÇíÊåÅ„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‰∫∫„ÅØÂ§öÂàÜ‰Ωø„Åà„Åæ„Åô

    meow.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Meow social

    Users: 358 . Toots: 4555 . Connections: 807 . Language: English

    This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

    More Info... Welcome to meow.social! A mastodon instance.

    NetData Monitoring

    Admin members : @Tiwy57 and @Nomaxice

    Official Accounts : @TransparencyReports and @meow

    This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !

    Meow is federated to nearly all instances of mastodon, which means you can follow pretty much anyone you want, no matter what instance they are on!

    While it is open publicly, mind this is just one instance in the fediverse, and we encourage you to look at other instances available to be sure it‚Äôs the one you like, and if none please you and you got some knowledge, why not come help mastodon by making your own instance too!

    Ruleset

    Stay legal.

    Respect international laws.

    Respect laws from the country the instance is hold in (Netherlands).

    Respect laws from the admins' country (France).

    Respect laws from your own country.

    Be respectful.

    Don‚Äôt go insult others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.

    Contents that are racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way are forbidden.

    Stalking and harassment is forbidden, if someone don‚Äôt want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.

    Tag your content.

    Tag as NSFW content properly, hidden behind a CW button, and keep porn as private or unlisted for AD posts.

    Tag gore and NSFL content and keep it behind a CW button.

    Tag politics and the like, again with a CW button.

    Accounts policy.

    Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (so long as you stay respectful).

    Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.

    Bots must be tagged as such, and bot owners must ensure they will have a minimal impact on the instance's performances.

    If your handle has been taken or stolen, and have the means to prove it yours, we will reattribute it to you.

    Do NOT use a "verified" status (with checkmark) : prove that you are someone official by all your means possible

    You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account has been suspended.

    Failure to respect any of those rules will lead to a warning, content removal, and/or suspension of your account.

    The admins have the upmost right to decide to delete your account for any reason.

    You may discuss with the admins if you feel you were unfairly sanctioned, so long as you don‚Äôt try to force your way after the final statement has been given by them.

    If you require any help or need to contact us, please contact @Tiwy57, @Nomaxice, or send a mail at meow@meow.social

    About this server

    This server is hosted on Scaleway, with four dedicated CPU cores, 8GB RAM, and 50GB of storage on SSD. It can be updated any time. Uptime will be kept at the highest possible, hopefully only going down for updates.

    Email: meow@meow.social

    Admin: @Tiwy57@meow.social

    don.de-liker.com

    about

    preview

    join

    „Éâ„É≥.de-liKeR

    Users: 3 . Toots: 848 . Connections: 173 . Language: English

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„ÅØde-liker.com„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶ÈÅãÁî®„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Êµ™‰∫∫ÁîüÊ≠ìËøé

    (Ë™çË®º„ÅØ„É°„Éº„É´„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„ÅèÊ∏©„Åã„Åø„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãÊâã‰ΩúÊ•≠„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åå„Å©„ÅÜ„Åó„Å¶„ÇÇÊ¨≤„Åó„ÅÑ‰∫∫„ÅØ‰∏äË®ò„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Å´„É°„Éº„É´„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åë„Çå„Å∞„ÄÅ„ÅÇ„ÇãÁ®ãÂ∫¶‰ª≤„ÅÆËâØ„ÅÑ‰∫∫„Å™„Çâ„Å∞Ë™çË®º‰ΩúÊ•≠„Çí„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ)

    Ë™çË®º„ÅØ„É°„Éº„É´„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„ÅèÊâã‰ΩúÊ•≠„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åå„Å©„ÅÜ„Åó„Å¶„ÇÇÊ¨≤„Åó„ÅÑ‰∫∫„ÅØ‰∏äË®ò„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Å´„É°„Éº„É´„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åë„Çå„Å∞„ÄÅ„ÅÇ„ÇãÁ®ãÂ∫¶‰ª≤„ÅÆËâØ„ÅÑ‰∫∫„Å™„Çâ„Å∞Ë™çË®º‰ΩúÊ•≠„Çí„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Email: qsf@de-liker.com

    Admin: @CreatorQsF@don.de-liker.com

    MAGI::Systems

    Users: 26 . Toots: 114 . Connections: 338 . Language: English

    This Mastodon instance is for people interested in Programming and Anime .

    Though English is the main language, all languages are welcomed. Site administrator can speak ‰∏≠Êñá, English, Fran√ßais and Êó•Êú¨Ë™û (with support of Google Translate ;) ). So, be nice and have a nice day.

    Contact @ryan if you have any question. Follow @status for server status notifications.

    System

    Nginx

    Donation: 17NsvpXkBtSwPzyERGxMXdBgBeVCW4tpRL

    lgbt.io

    about

    preview

    join

    LGBT.io

    Users: 32 . Toots: 596 . Connections: 478 . Language: English

    By signing up, you agree to abide by the Terms and the Rules for this instance as follows:-

    1. Do not discriminate, harrass and/or insult members based on their religion, race, sex, political beliefs, or whether they are gay or straight.
    2. Do not bully and/or pick on other members.
    3. Do not flame other members.
    4. Do not advertise. As of now, you are not permitted to make money using lgbt.io.
    5. Do not publicly expose your real identity unless you're using "Direct" privacy and you're communicating with someone you can trust.
    6. Do not post screenshots or history of toot conversations publicly without all participants' consent.
    7. Do not post copyrighted, piracy, warez and leaked content.
    8. Do not spam.
    9. All NSFW/sexual content must be accompanied by NSFW (not safe for work) and/or CW (content warning) option when writing a toot.
    10. ..more rules will be added when needed.

    Note: Make sure to report any toots that violate the rules. A staff member will evaluate the reported toots and take appropriate actions against the them.

    Happy tooting! :)

    Support us on Patreon

    Email: admin@lgbt.io

    Admin: @self@lgbt.io

    awoo.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Awoo.space

    Users: 1094 . Toots: 57907 . Connections: 44 . Language: English

    awoo.space is a Mastodon instance where people can rely on a team of moderators to help resolve conflict and uses a server whitelist to minimize abuse.

    Favicon and menu column art by @kyra (@kyradoesart on Twitter)

    More Info... What is Awoo.space?

    Awoo.space is a small social network where folks are expected to be respectful of boundaries and identities. We have a dedicated team of moderators available to help deescalate conflict and help educate folks on social missteps if they inadvertantly cause harm.

    While the Mastodon platform gives its users a great many tools that help to deal with abuse, the nature of federation can expose our users to admins and users on distant instances completely out of their control. To mitigate this possible problem, awoo.space uses a server whitelist to selectively federate with other instances in order to more sustainably grow the network and limit exposure to potential harassment and abuse.

    Our vision is to curate a space where folks can be more open with one another while still being able to control their public visibility without being forced to provide emotional labor when folks accidentally step across boundaries.

    If things sound too locked down here for you, there are plenty of other great instances you can find from our whitelist below or searching for an instance using instances.mastodon.xyz.

    Consider following and supporting our artist, @kyra!

    I'm an instance admin. How do I federate with awoo.space?

    We think of Awoo.space as a well-run house party, with other instances as the invitees. We need to trust the folks we let into our party, and we need to know they won't bring along anyone else who will make the party suck for everyone. This is especially a concern given how admins can't always account for the actions of all their users, much less users of other instances they federate with.

    With that in mind, here's what we look for when deciding whether or not to federate with other instances:

    Your instance has a CoC similar to Mastodon.social's, or you agree with Mastodon.social's CoC and follow its principles while administrating your instance

    You understand that your users are subject to awoo.space's CoC while interacting with our users

    You're not federating with instances whose administration has a history of ignoring or encouraging abuse of Mastodon users on their platform. The instances we're currently particularly concerned about are:

    shitposter.club

    sealion.club

    freezepeach.xyz

    rainbowdash.net

    social.heldscal.la

    unsafe.space

    We are willing to make exceptions for these rules for very small closed-registration instances as long as your users all respect our CoC when interacting with awoo.space users and are careful to respect whether or not folks are okay with you boosting their posts.

    It's worth noting that due to how private posts federate publicly onto GnuSocial, and therefore potentially boostable, we do not federate with GnuSocial instances at this time.

    If all of this sounds reasonable to you, please sign up using this Google Form.

    Feel free to contact us if you want to discuss these terms or have any questions about federating with us.

    Administration

    The current administrators of this instance are:

    @vahnj

    @noiob

    Moderators

    The current moderators of this instance are:

    @inurashii

    @thefishcrow

    Moderators here take on a different role than other places- they do not have the power to directly silence or ban your account, and are instead are volunteers whom the administration trusts with a direct line of commmunication with the admin to help facilitate the respect of boundaries and keep discussion and education civil so that awoo.space is a safe place for folks.

    We are interested in more moderators, but are not currently actively searching for new ones. If you are interested, please contact the administrator. We are trying to build a diverse team for this place and if you feel you fit into that and don't mind volunteering then please let us know!

    Other Staff

    @kyra - Artist

    @indi - UI/UX Consultant

    Guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Awoo.space; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    When interacting with other users, all users both local and remote are expected to adhere to the following:

    Respect boundaries as placed by others

    Be respectful/apologize if someone tells you that you cross a boundary accidentally

    Give people space if you accidentally push past a boundary

    If you are on either side of this and are worried about the situation escalating, contact the admin or a mod

    Tag potentially upsetting content such as violence/blood, politics, and other such topics

    When interacting with other users, any users (local or remote) will be considered in the wrong in a conversation that goes sour if they participate in the following:

    Microaggressions ("not all men", white/man/cis-splaining, using the wrong pronouns to address someone after being corrected, etc)

    Demanding education on problematic behavior from a non-admin/moderator

    Skirting the lines of being a troll

    Not tagging potentially sensitive replies

    This is not an exhaustive list. If any of these don't make sense, please speak with an admin or moderator- we are more than happy to help you understand the problems with these kinds of behavior.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Advertising

    Posts that do not tag upsetting content

    Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Arguing with a moderator or admin in bad faith, especially as a new member to the community

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: awoo.space@gmail.com

    Admin: @vahnj@awoo.space

    mstdn.web0000.jp

    VR Mastodon

    Users: 120 . Toots: 313 . Connections: 337 . Language: English

    VR(„Éê„Éº„ÉÅ„É£„É´„É™„Ç¢„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£)„ÅÆÊúÄÊñ∞ÊÉÖÂ†±„Å®„ÅãÈñãÁô∫„Å®„Åã„Å®„Åã„ÄÇMR„ÄÅAR„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆË©±È°å„ÇÇÊ∞óËªΩ„Å´„Å©„ÅÜ„ÅûÔΩû

    ‚Äª„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº‰ª£„Åè„Çâ„ÅÑ„Éö„Ç§„Åß„Åç„Åü„Çâ„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Å™„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„Å®„Åì„Çç„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä

    „Çµ„Éº„ÉêÈÅãÁî®„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„Åæ„Å†„Åæ„Å†Êú™ÁÜü„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Åß„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÊ∞ó„Å´„Å™„ÇãÁÇπ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Çâ„ÅîÊÑèË¶ã„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Éâ„Éê„Ç§„Çπ„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éù„Éº„Éà„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åë„Çã„Å®„ÅÜ„Çå„Åó„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÄÅjojomonvr@gmail.com„ÄÅhttps://twitter.com/jojomonvr„Å©„Åì„Åã„Çâ„Åß„ÇÇ„ÄÇ

    v1.3.2„Åå„Åß„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„ÅÇ„ÇãÁ®ãÂ∫¶ÂÆâÂÆö„Åó„Å¶Á®ºÂÉç„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÅåÁ¢∫Ë™ç„Åß„Åç„Å¶„Åã„Çâ„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„Éá„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã‰∫àÂÆö„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    2017.04.22

    „Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„ÅåGmail„ÅÆËø∑ÊÉë„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„Å´ÊåØ„ÇäÂàÜ„Åë„Çâ„Çå„Çã‰∫ãË±°„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅäÊâãÊï∞„Åä„Åã„Åë„Åó„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅGmailÁôªÈå≤ÊôÇ„ÅØËø∑ÊÉë„Éï„Ç©„É´„ÉÄ„ÅÆ„ÅîÁ¢∫Ë™ç„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑ„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇGmail„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç£„É´„Çø„Éº„ÅßËø∑ÊÉë„É°„Éº„É´„Å´„Å™„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„Çà„ÅÜË®≠ÂÆöÂèØËÉΩ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    v1.3.3„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„Éá„Éº„ÉàÂÆå‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

    ÂÜÖÂêëÁöÑ„Åß‰∫∫„Å®Êé•„Åô„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅØ„Éã„Ç¨„ÉÜ„Å†„Åë„Å©„ÄÅËá™ÂàÜ„ÅÆ‰∏ñÁïå„ÇíÊåÅ„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‰∫∫

    „ÅÇ„Åæ„Çä„É°„Ç∏„É£„Éº„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åë„Å©„ÄÅËá™ÂàÜ„ÅÆÂ§ßÂ•Ω„Åç„Å™„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Çí„Åø„Çì„Å™„Å´Áü•„Å£„Å¶Ê¨≤„Åó„ÅÑ‰∫∫ÔºàËä∏Ë°ì„ÄÅÈü≥Ê•Ω„ÄÅÈ£ü„ÅπÁâ©„ÄÅÂãïÁâ©„ÄÅÂ≠¶Âïè„Éª„Éª„Éªetc.‰Ωï„Åß„ÇÇÔºÅÔºâ

    Ê∫¢„Çå„Åü‰ªï‰∫ã„Çí„Ç∑„Çß„Ç¢„Åß„Åç„Çã‰ª≤Èñì„ÇíË¶ã„Å§„Åë„Åü„ÅÑ‰∫∫

    ‰ºöÁ§æ„Å´Âã§„ÇÅ„Å™„Åå„Çâ„ÄÅË∂£Âë≥„ÇÑÂâØÊ•≠„ÅßÂ•Ω„Åç„Å™„Åì„Å®„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‰∫∫

    masto.io

    about

    preview

    join

    Masto.io

    Users: 497 . Toots: 1427 . Connections: 911 . Language: English

    Small alternative Mastodon instance with a short name. Registrations are open, but they may suspended/closed at any time if performance is compromised.

    More Info...

    Contacts

    Fell free to contact me (through @sena@masto.io or sena@smux.net) for any instance related issue.

    Rules

    Here are the house rules:

    No harassing other people;

    No posting NSFW content or spoilers without using the Content Warning feature;

    No posting illegal content which can get you or me in trouble (this content will be removed if necessary, you may or may not be banned);

    Parody accounts are permitted (and encouraged!), but it's suggested (not required) that such is stated in the bio.

    Just be a good human being‚Ñ¢.

    Location and jurisdiction

    Currently, the infrastructure which supports this instance is hosted in the United States (Kansas City, Missouri), although there are medium term plans to migrate it to some European location.

    I am not based on the United States, so I may be more or less free from harassment from US law enforcement. Keep in mind that they should be able to shut the instance down and eavesdrop on communications and data without even warning me.

    Federation

    For transparency reasons,here's a list of instances we don't federate with:

    we currently don't block any instance

    Donations

    If you want to help with hosting costs, feel free to donate through:

    Bitcoin: 1ESdVqpycpQoXjdzjnW7Q9GpVr2ehT9mCy;

    PayPal: paypal.me/jsribeiro.

    Email: sena@smux.net

    Admin: @sena@masto.io

    dq10.online

    about

    preview

    join

    dq10.online

    Users: 240 . Toots: 2021 . Connections: 326 . Language: English

    „Éâ„É©„ÇØ„Ç®10Áî®„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥‰Ωú„Å£„Å¶„Åø„Åæ„Åó„ÅüÔºÅ„Å©„Å™„Åü„Åß„ÇÇ„ÅîËá™Áî±„Å´„Åä‰Ωø„ÅÑ‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ„ÄÄ‚Äª„Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅØ„Çπ„ÇØ„Ç¶„Çß„Ç¢„Éª„Ç®„Éã„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÇπÂÖ¨Âºè„Å®„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàáÈñ¢‰øÇ„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÔºë„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Åß„Åô

    „É´„Éº„É´

    Êó•Êú¨Âèä„Å≥„Ç¢„Çπ„Éà„É´„ÉÜ„Ç£„Ç¢„ÅÆÊ≥ïÂæã„ÅØÂÆà„Å£„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÁäØÁΩ™ÔºàRMT„ÄÅ„Éú„ÉÉ„Éà„ÄÅ„ÉÅ„Éº„ÉàË°åÁÇ∫Ôºâ„Å´Âä†ÊãÖ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åù„ÅÜ„Å†„Å£„Åü„Çä„ÄÅÊó•Êú¨Ê≥ï„Å´ÊäµËß¶„Åô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊúÄÊÇ™Ë≠¶ÂØü„ÇÑË£ÅÂà§ÊâÄ„ÅÆË¶ÅË´ã„Å´Âøú„Åò„Å¶„É≠„Ç∞„ÇíÈñãÁ§∫„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„ÅöÊúÄÂàù„Å´„ÄÅÂã¢„ÅÑ„Å†„Åë„ÅßÁ´ã„Å¶„ÅüMastodon„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Å§Ê≠¢„Åæ„Å£„Å°„ÇÉ„ÅÜ„Åã„ÇÇ„Çè„Åã„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åó„ÄÅÁ™ÅÁÑ∂ÁµÇ‰∫Ü„Åó„Å°„ÇÉ„ÅÜ„Åã„ÇÇ„Åó„Çå„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„ÅÇ„Å®„ÄÅÂÖ®ÁÑ∂„Çè„Åã„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅæÂßã„ÇÅ„Åü„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ‰Ωï„ÅåËµ∑„Åç„Çã„Åã„Çè„Åã„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    tusk.schoollibraries.net

    about

    preview

    join

    School Libraries Community

    Users: 5 . Toots: 5 . Connections: 60 . Language: English

    This Instance has been created to help educators collaborate and provide feedback to establish and improve the School Libraries Resource Network

    More Info... In the nineteen-eighties, the Internet was a small, decentralized collective of computers. This is not the same Internet we know today. Today most communication flows through a small set of corporations; and thus, falls under the influence of those companies and institutions.

    Internet users now regularly submit to terms-of-service agreements that give companies license to share their personal data with other institutions, from advertisers to governments.

    Distributed solutions like Mastodon and WebSonar will allow us to start to create outposts that can grow into the better web Berners-Lee envisions, where users control where their data is stored and how it‚Äôs accessed.

    For example, social networks would still run in the cloud. But you could store your data locally. Alternately, you could choose a different cloud server run by a company or community you trust.

    Email: cowboy@wisdomquest.com

    Admin: Not Available

    We are based in Zagreb, Croatia.

    Hacklab in Mama is a public working space of technology enthusiasts in the Club Mama. Initiated by the group gathered around the Skill Sharing program, the methodology, atmosphere and philosophy of the gatherings quickly spread from the Skill Sharing gatherings on Saturdays to the rest of the week.

    Este servidor autogestionado est√° en l√≠nea solamente por el esfuerzo de su administrador, por lo cual es posible que existan ocasionales bajas del servicio (downtime), durante condiciones meteorol√≥gicas extremas o cortes de energ√≠a prolongados. Las cuentas registradas en este servidor no pueden ser utilizadas para publicar contenido gore/snuff/pornograf√≠a infantil/pedofilia de ning√∫n tipo, de otra forma su cuenta ser√° eliminada inmediatamente si se detecta esa actividad. Se puede publicar contenido ocasionalmente NSFW, pero inundar los espacios p√∫blicos (flooding) con publicaciones hardcore NSFW puede llevar a la eliminaci√≥n de su cuenta. Este pod esta en contra de la publicaci√≥n de contenido racista, sexista, homof√≥bico o cualquier otro tipo de discriminaci√≥n, as√≠ como tambi√©n el uso de las cuentas con fines de propaganda/comerciales o de persecuci√≥n y asedio a otros usuarios. Cuentas creadas en MastodonChile que queden abandonadas, sin publicaciones o suscripciones, ser√°n eliminadas en las limpiezas de rutina del servidor de cuentas creadas por bots, por lo tanto si se registra, use su cuenta y pruebe que existe o que no es un bot. Este servidor hace eco de los principios del software libre y nuestro esp√≠ritu militante, es ser un nodo m√°s de una red descentralizada y federada que respeta al usuario y no invade su privacidad.

    Aqu√≠ pueden encontrar unas Peguntas Frecuentes.

    soc.ialis.me

    about

    preview

    join

    soc.ialis.me mastodon

    Users: 442 . Toots: 11523 . Connections: 1062 . Language: English

    A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France .
    Learn about the instance information, guidelines , and the privacy policy .

    More Info... A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France.

    Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

    don't be a dick,

    no advertising, harassment, spam,

    no abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),

    Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

    Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin.

    Currently the only human administrating this instance is @href. Other administrators may be added in the future, as I (href) prefer focusing on managing the servers and the underlying infrastructure than people.

    Don't hesitate to ping either @href or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at hrefhref/mastodon on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

    The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.

    The servers are run by an organization (with no legal grounds; entierly privately owned) called random.sh / random labs; which hosts other services such as irc.random.sh, a ChatSpike.net IRC Server, Etherpad.fr, and much more. I also intend to one day make it my own company for some products, but I'll then separate the business with theses community services (the business will just be a sponsor, and without any advertisement, tracking, or anything else evil).

    soc.ialis.me logo and derivations (not found and errors)

    by @Famine, license CC BY-NC-SA.

    The bird escaped, don't worry. Mastodons aren't that good at aiming.

    Background image Sunset Landscape Rocks Silhouettes by skeeze, licensed under CC0 Public Domain.

    Email: soc@ialis.me

    Admin: @admin@soc.ialis.me

    social.bytesexual.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Bytesexual Mastodon

    Users: 276 . Toots: 3710 . Connections: 507 . Language: English

    social.bytesexual.net is a Mastodon instance run by the Merry Men of bytesexual.net . All fun and no SLA since 2012.
    We run this instance for ourselves and our friends. Courteous lifeforms of all backgrounds are welcome to coexist with us.
    Lead maintainer is @q3k , follow for service updates.

    Bytesexual Networks is a transcontinental non-profit guerilla of {sys,net}ops specializing in shoestring budget infrastructure for Hackerspaces and other NGOs.

    This instance is physically hosted in France by a hosting company registered in the same country. The maintainers of this instance are EU citizens.

    We have not been served any secret court orders and are not under any gag orders.

    Email: q3k@q3k.org

    Admin: @q3k@social.bytesexual.net

    social.etc-services.de

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon social.etc-services.de

    Users: 41 . Toots: 138 . Connections: 336 . Language: English

    It's an open Mastodon instance, feel free to join us ;)

    More Info... Blocked servers

    There are no blocked servers atm.

    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.etc-services.de.

    They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: social@duke.de

    Admin: @duke@social.etc-services.de

    keio.ac.jp „Åã keio.jp „Å™„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÇíÊåÅ„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‰∫∫„ÅåÂà©Áî®„Åß„Åç„Çãmastodon„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊïôËÇ≤„ÉªÁ†îÁ©∂ÁõÆÁöÑ„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÄÅÁ†îÁ©∂ÂÆ§„ÅÆÂû£Ê†π„ÇíË∂Ö„Åà„Åü„Çπ„Çø„ÉÉ„Éï„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶ÈÅãÂñ∂„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊÖ∂ÊáâÁæ©Â°æ„ÅåÊ≠£Âºè„Å´Ë®≠ÁΩÆ„Åó„Åü„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    Anyone who has keio.ac.jp or keio.jp email address can signup this instance.

    Ê≥®ÊÑè‰∫ãÈ†Ö / ToS

    Êú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØÊú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØÊÖ∂ÊáâÁæ©Â°æÂ§ßÂ≠¶„ÅÆË≥áÁî£‰∏¶„Å≥„Å´„ÄÅSFC-CNS‰∏ä„ÅßÈÅãÁî®„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ SFC-CNSÂà©Áî®ÂÜÖË¶è II„Å™„Çâ„Å≥„Å´„ÄÅ keio.jpÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ®ã „ÅßÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢‰∫ãÈ†Ö„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãÂà©Áî®(‰æã.ÂïÜÁî®„ÄÅÂÖ¨Â∫èËâØ‰øó„Å´Âèç„Åô„ÇãÊäïÁ®ø„Å™„Å©)„ÅØÂõ∫„ÅèÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    This instance is running on the assets of Keio University and network connectivity has provided by SFC-CNS. Activities prohibited by Internal Rules for Using SFC-CNS and keio.jp Terms of Use are also prohibited on this instance.

    SFC-CNS „ÇÑ keio.jpÁ≠â„ÄÅÂêÑÁ®ÆÊÖ∂ÊáâÁæ©Â°æ„ÅåÊèê‰æõ„Åô„Çã„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Åß‰ΩøÁî®„Åô„Çã„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Å®Âêå‰∏Ä„ÅÆ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Åß‰ΩøÁî®„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Çª„Ç≠„É•„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£‰∏ä„É™„Çπ„ÇØ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÊéß„Åà„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    Âïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ / Contact Us

    Hold kammertonen og overhold dansk lov.

    Og husk at det betyder meget p√• Mastodon hvem de andre p√• ens server f√∏lger, fordi de, og dem de snakker med, er de mennesker der dukker op i den f√∏dererede tidslinie.

    cuttlefi.sh

    about

    preview

    join

    Cuttlefish

    Users: 6 . Toots: 36 . Connections: 20 . Language: English

    Cuttlefish

    More Info... By charging a small monthly amount, Cuttlefish can pay its costs and its development team a fair wage and distribute the rest back to its members.

    Cuttlefish is in the early stages of formation. We have an idea of how we‚Äôd like it to operate, but are figuring out the details as we go. The answers below sketch our current thinking about the project and the direction we hope to go in the future.

    Q&A;

    Why shouldn‚Äôt I sign up for a free social network?

    You can, and if you prefer you should. Cuttlefish is an alternative that attempts to answer the question of how a social network can be run without showing you ads or selling your information. Since Cuttlefish runs inside a larger OStatus network, members can interact with a larger community of users.

    Mastodon was written by volunteers, and other instances are run by volunteers as well. Why not donate your time instead of asking for money?

    The progress that the maintainers and contributors to Mastodon and OStatus is impressive, and their dedication to the stewardship of these projects is admirable. Our focus is on creating a sustainable instance, and we think that means having a dedicated staff working on the project. That gives us time to devote to moderation, maintenance, and contributing back to the open source projects that are being used to run Cuttlefish. We don‚Äôt think that this would be possible if running Cuttlefish was treated as a side project.

    Why not just accept donations?

    Accepting donations leads to some members having undue influence in the community, because their donations are required to cover operating costs. We ask each user to contribute equally to the cost of running the service, with the hope of returning membership fees to active members.

    What do you mean by active members?

    At this point, just members in active standing. In the future, this might also include looking at who is posting good stuff within their local network. We realize that add more terms to unpack, and raises more questions than it resolves. Our goal is to promote a healthy community, and we will be looking at how different means of profit-sharing might help that being achieved.

    How are membership fees redistributed?

    Our intention is to do this on a quarterly basis, and initially by equally dividing profit between members. During the initial quarter of a membership, the amount returned will be based on the percentage of the quarter for which the membership was active.

    How are the operating costs determined?

    Currently we are basing our operating costs on having one developer, one community moderator, and a part-time operations manager work on the project. There are also legal issues that require counsel that will need to be addressed in the initial months of operation. We estimate operating costs for the first month to be around twelve thousand US dollars. We will be publishing our actual operating costs quarterly, and revising that estimate to account changes in staffing.

    Who is running this instance?

    Cuttlefish is currently solely sponsored by the team at Standard Library, a small development firm that works inside of the cultural sector. We have a strong experience in building and maintaining Rails applications.

    Email: cuttlefishcoop@gmail.com

    Admin: @root@cuttlefi.sh

    gamecluster.net

    Email: martin.jakl@macsnet.cz

    Admin: @Mac_CZ@mastodon.macsnet.cz

    mammouth.cafe
