    Mammouth Caf√©

    Users: 90 . Toots: 3505 . Connections: 778 . Language: English

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.
    PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

          .----.-.     _____________________________________
     /    ( o \   /   Welcome! Bienvenue! Willkommen!   \
    '|  __ ` ||  /\  Benvenuta e benvenuto! Bainvegni!  /
     |||  ||| -'   -------------------------------------

    (In the spirit of tilde.club ...)

    English: Mammouth Caf√© is a Swiss Mastodon instance running on a French server and open to the world. We particularly welcome artists and illustrators, journalists and writers, librarians and archivists, scientists and engineers, teachers, as well as all curious minds.
    Registrations will be limited to 640 users ( ‚Äò640 users ought to be enough for anybody.‚Äô ‚Äî Bill Gates ).

    Fran√ßais: Mammouth Caf√© est une instance suisse de Mastodon tournant sur un serveur fran√ßais et ouverte au monde. Nous accueillons particuli√®rement volontiers les artistes, les illustratrices et illustrateurs, les journalistes, les auteures et auteurs, les biblioth√©caires et les archivistes, les scientifiques, les ing√©nieures et les ing√©nieurs, les enseignantes et enseignants, ainsi que tous les esprits curieux.
    Les inscriptions √† cette instance seront limit√©es √† 640 utilisateurs ( ¬´640 utilisateurs devraient suffire √† quiconque.¬ª ‚Äî Bill Gates ).

    Italiano: Mammouth Caf√© √® un'istanza svizzera di Mastodon installata su un server francese e aperta al mondo. Particolarmente benvenute e benvenuti sono artiste e artisti, illustratrici e illustratori, giornaliste e giornalisti, autori, bibliotecarie e bibliotecari, archivisti, scienziate e scienziati, ingegnere e ingegneri, insegnanti, cos√¨ come tutte le menti curiose.
    Le iscrizioni su questa istanza saranno limitate a 640 utenti ( ‚Äú640 utenti dovrebbero bastare a chiunque.‚Äù ‚Äî Bill Gates ).

    With ‚ù§ from Atelier Mammouth .

    More Info... [ English | Fran√ßais | Italiano ]

    (Source)

    English

    Welcome to the Mammouth Caf√©

    In the spirit of tilde.club, here are a few, simple rules:

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.

    There is NO GUILT here. NOR SHAME. Not knowing things is fine. Not finishing them is fine too.

    We're all trying, and we're all in this together. :)

    IMPORTANT NOTE: PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

    Guidelines

    Aside from the general rules stated above, mammouth.cafe follows principles similar to those of mastodon.social, to wit:

    Absolutely no content allowed that would be illegal in Switzerland and/or France.

    No discrimination, no racism, no xenophobia, no sexism, no incitement to hate or to violence of any kind.

    We take a very dim view of stalking or harassment of other persons, here or elsewhere.

    Same goes for encouraging or inciting other people to take part in such activities.

    There are CW (Content Warning) and NSFW (Not Safe For Work) options: use them accordingly when you post.

    No hard or child/minor pornography of any kind, and keep material of an erotic nature behind CW and/or NSFW filters.

    No gore or extremely graphic violence.

    No spam, no ads, no affiliate links or excessive promotion.

    Of course, you are still welcome to announce your latest comic, self-published novella or upcoming local amateur theatre stage play to our community.

    We discourage any sort of corporate accounts: we prefer to keep it personal.

    On the other hand, educational institutions, associations and other non-profit organisations (such as e.g. amateur dramatics groups) are warmly welcome.

    No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

    We discourage bots, unless they're cute or friendly.

    Robots that bang on the server will get bitcanned.

    Replicants are like any other machine: they‚Äôre either a benefit or a hazard. If they‚Äôre a benefit, it‚Äôs not our problem.

    No zombies allowed under any circumstance.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    Final interpretation and implementation of these rules, guidelines and of general good netiquette, as well as all decisions that may result in account suspension and/or revocation of access, will be up to the administration of mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Support is available: ping @support@mammouth.cafe.

    For status updates, planned downtimes and so on, you can follow @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Please remember: this is essentially a one-man show for now, so do not expect an answer within the hour. If it's urgent, try asking the community: someone may be able to lend you a hand.

    We'll try not to mess things up, but we probably will at some point. If you feel that what you post here is vital to you, do make a backup somewhere else (atom feeds are available for every account) or, even better, give some of your time and knowledge to help us out with this thing.

    Handling abuse and harassment

    If you are being abused or harassed, please report the user using the "‚Ä¶" button and then "Report."

    If you engage in abusing or harassing behavior, the administration may take any action we deem appropriate, such as an account suspension or revocation of access.

    Abuse is anything we say it is. Too bad if you disagree.

    Blocked instances

    We do block some Mastodon instances where a sizeable part of their community infringes our rules and/or guidelines with their behaviour. We do not usually comment on individual accounts muting, suspension or removal.

    Privacy and security

    We value your privacy. We are here to have fun, not to make any money by throwing ads down your throat or monetizing the shit out of your online activities. No ads or trackers are installed on this instance.

    Please understand however that mammouth.cafe's administrators have potentially access to your data, including your direct messages. The backend is also not encrypted. If this is not all right with you, this might not be the instance you're looking for.

    Finally, a word of advice: consider this a public space. Whatever you publish here is public and can (and probably will) be read by someone else or potentially be archived by the Internet Archive and/or other similar insititutions.

    We'll try to keep things reasonably safe, but if you need to keep your sources confidential or you are involved in activities that may put yourself or others in jeopardy in your country or elsewhere, please take into account the fact that we won't be able to offer you the necessary confidentiality and/or security here.

    Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. Use a dedicated E2E application with good reputation, like e.g. Signal, for the communications you really want to keep private.

    And remember to always practice safe hex.

    About this instance

    This instance is run by Atelier Mammouth in a TARDIS somewhere/time in a big ball of wibbly-wobbly timey-wimey... stuff.

    For the time being, costs for running this server are pretty reasonable and the admin can afford them. You should absolutely not feel obliged to pay anything, but if you really wish to support this thing, you can donate something on our Liberapay account. Thank you so much!

    But remember: we only accept donations. You don't pay us for this service. Don't act like you do.

    And remember: this is FREE software and...

    ‚Äú...if it destroys your computer, rapes your pet, installs Win98 on your toaster and microwave, stops your pacemaker, causes sexual dysfunction, and turns your children into fucked-up trenchcoat-wearing teens carrying guns and worshipping Hitler, don't blame me because I told you it could do that and you went ahead and used it anyway.‚Äù

    ‚Äî James Turinsky

    ‚§¥

    Amusez-vous. Respectez les autres. Pas de drame.

    Nous faisons de notre mieux, et nous sommes √† bord du m√™me bateau. :)

    Lignes directrices

    Outre les r√®gles g√©n√©rales mentionn√©es ci-devant, mammouth.cafe suit des principes semblables √† ceux de mastodon.social, √† savoir:

    Nous ne permettons absolument aucun contenu qui serait ill√©gal en Suisse et/ou France.

    Pas de discrimination, pas de racisme, pas de x√©nophobie, pas de sexisme, pas d'incitation √† la haine ou √† la violence d'aucune sorte.

    Nous avons la m√™me attitude envers quiconque encouragerait ou inciterait d'autres personnes √† proc√©der de la sorte.

    Des options CW (Content Warning = avertissement de sujet sensible) et NSFW (Not Safe For Work = pas adapt√© √† un environnement de travail ou public) vous sont propos√©es: employez-les √† bon escient au moment de publier.

    Pas de pornographie dure ou impliquant des mineurs, d'aucune sorte. Veuillez √©galement placer vos contenus de nature √©rotique derri√®re des filtres CW et/ou NSFW.

    Pas de contenu violent.

    Pas de spam, pas de pubs, pas de liens affili√©s ou de promotion excessive.

    Bien entendu, vous pouvez sans autres annoncer votre derni√®re BD, votre roman auto-publi√© ou le prochain spectacle de votre troupe de th√©√¢tre amateur locale √† notre communaut√©.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les comptes d'entreprise: on pr√©f√®re garder une touche personnelle.

    D'autre part, nous accueillons volontiers les √©coles, associations et autres organisations √† but non lucratif (telles p.ex. les troupes de th√©√¢tre amateur).

    Pas de faux comptes personnifiant des c√©l√©brit√©s, m√™me dans un but humoristique.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les bots, √† moins qu'ils ne soient mignons ou attachants.

    Les robots qui abusent du serveur seront envoy√©s √† la casse.

    Les r√©pliquants sont comme les autres machines: ils sont ou b√©n√©fiques, ou nocifs. S‚Äôils sont b√©n√©fiques, c‚Äôest pas notre probl√®me.

    Aucun zombie n'est admis, en aucun cas.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interpr√©tation et l'application finales de ces r√®gles, lignes directrices et de ce qui constitue une bonne n√©tiquette en g√©n√©ral, ainsi que toute d√©cision pouvant r√©sulter en la suspension et/ou la suppression d'un compte, est du seul privil√®ge de l'administration de mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Vous pouvez contacter notre support en suivant ou contactant ce compte: @support@mammouth.cafe.

    Afin d'obtenir des informations sur le statut du serveur, les arr√™ts planifi√©s pour des mises √† jour, etc., vous pouvez √©galement suivre @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Veuillez prendre bonne note que ceci est pour l'instant un spectacle interpr√©t√© et mis en sc√®ne par une seule et m√™me personne. Ne vous attendez donc pas √† une r√©ponse dans l'heure qui suit. S'il s'agit d'une urgence, essayez de poser votre question √† l'ensemble de la communaut√©: il se peut que quelqu'un puisse venir √† votre aide.

    Nous allons t√¢cher de ne pas gaffer, mais probablement que cela nous arrivera un jour ou l'autre.     Traitement des abus et du harc√®lement

    Si vous √™tes victime d'abus ou de harc√®lement, veuillez signaler l'utilisateur √† l'aide du bouton "‚Ä¶" puis "Signaler".

    Si vous avez un comportement abusif ou harcelant, l'administration peut prendre toute mesure que nous jugeons appropri√©e, telles une suspension de compte ou une r√©vocation d'acc√®s.

    Un abus est tout ce que nous consid√©rons comme tel. Tant pis si vous n'√™tes pas d'accord.

    Instances bloqu√©es

    Nous bloquons certaines instances de Mastodon dans les cas o√π une partie importante de leur communaut√© enfreint nos r√®gles et/ou lignes directrices avec son comportement. Nous ne faisons g√©n√©ralement aucun commentaire au sujet des comptes individuels ayant √©t√© rendus silencieux, suspendus ou supprim√©s.

    Confidentialit√© et s√©curit√©

    Nous respectons votre vie priv√©e. Nous sommes ici pour nous amuser, pas pour gagner de l'argent sur votre dos en vous faisant avaler des tonnes de pubs indigestes ou en mon√©tisant √† longueur de journ√©e vos activit√©s en ligne. Aucune publicit√© ou traceur n'est install√© sur cette instance.

    Veuillez toutefois prendre bonne note que les administrateurs de mammouth.cafe ont potentiellement acc√®s √† toutes vos donn√©es, y compris vos messages directs. Le backend n'est pas chiffr√© non plus. Si cela ne vous convient pas, ceci n'est peut-√™tre pas l'instance que vous recherchez.

    Enfin, un bon conseil: consid√©rez ceci comme √©tant un espace public. Tout ce que vous publierez ici est public et peut √™tre (et probablement sera) lu par d'autres personnes ou potentiellement √™tre archiv√© par l'Internet Archive et/ou d'autres insititutions similaires.

    Nous allons t√¢cher de maintenir une s√©curit√© raisonnable, mais si vous √™tes dans l'obligation d'assurer la confidentialit√© de vos sources ou que vos activit√©s risquent de mettre en p√©ril vous-m√™me ou d'autres personnes dans votre pays ou ailleurs, veuillez tenir compte du fait que nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir une confidentialit√© et/ou s√©curit√© suffisante ici.

    En outre, pour des donn√©es vraiment priv√©es envoy√©es entre deux personnes, Mastodon n'offre aucun chiffrement de bout en bout (end-to-end). Utilisez une application E2E d√©di√©e avec une bonne r√©putation, comme Signal par exemple, pour les communications que vous souhaitez vraiment garder priv√©es.

    Et n'oubliez pas de toujours vous prot√©ger lors de toute activit√© hexuelle.

    √Ä propos de cette instance

    Cette instance est g√©r√©e par l'Atelier Mammouth depuis un TARDIS quelque-part/temps dans une sorte de grande boule de truc-machin tempo-spatio... bidule.

    Pour le moment, les co√ªts li√©s √† ce serveur sont plut√¥ts raisonnables et l'administrateur peut se les permettre.     Mais rappelez-vous: nous n'acceptons que les dons. Vous ne nous payez pas pour ce service. N'agissez pas comme si c'√©tait le cas.

    ‚Äî James Turinsky (traduit de l'anglais)

    Italiano

    Benvenuta e benvenuto al Mammouth Caf√©

    Nello spirito del tilde.club, ecco alcune regole semplici:

    Divertiti. Rispetta le altre e gli altri. Niente drammi.

    Qui NON C'√à COLPA. N√à VERGOGNA. Non sapere qualche cosa va benissimo. Non finire qualche cosa va pure benissimo.

    Facciamo del nostro meglio, e siamo a bordo della stessa nave. :)

    NOTA IMPORTANTE: NON PIRATARE IL GIBSON, GRAZIE.

    Linee direttrici

    Oltre alle regole generali di qui sopra, mammouth.cafe segue principi simili a quelli di mastodon.social, vale a dire:

    Non permettiamo assolutamente nessun contenuto illegale in Svizzera e/o Francia.

    Nessuna discriminazione, nessun razzismo, nessuna xenofobia, nessun sessismo, nessun incitamento all'odio o alla violenza di alcun genere.

    Non toleriamo molestie o intimidazioni di altre persone, qui o altrove.

    Lo stesso vale per l'incorraggiamento o l'incitamento verso altre persone a prendere parte a tali attivit√†.

    Ti proponiamo delle opzioni CW (Content Warning = avviso di contenuto sensibile) e NSFW (Not Safe For Work = non adatto ad un ambiente di lavoro o pubblico): utilizzale come si deve al momento di pubblicare.

    Nessuna pornografia dura o minorile di alcun tipo. Inoltre, pubblica il tuo materiale di natura erotica dietro filtri CW e/o NSFW.

    Nessun contenuto violento.

    Nessuno spam (pubblicit√† non richiesta), nessuna pubblicit√†, nessun rinvio (link) affiliato o promozione eccessiva.

    Naturalmente, se vuoi annunciare il tuo nuovo fumetto, il tuo ultimo romanzo autopubblicato o il prossimo spettacolo della compagnia teatrale amatoriale del tuo quartiere alla nostra communit√†, non c'√® nessun problema.

    Scorraggiamo i conti aziendali: preferiamo mantenere un tocco personale.

    D'altra parte, accogliamo ben volentieri scuole, associazioni e altre organizzazioni non a scopo di lucro (come ad esempio una compagnia di teatro amatoriale).

    Nessun conto fasullo che impersno personaggi famosi, anche se solo a scopo umoristico.

    Scorraggiamo i bots, a meno che siano carini o amicali.

    I robot che abusano del server verranno rottamati.

    I replicanti sono come ogni altra macchina: possono essere un vantaggio o un rischio. Se sono un vantaggio, non sono un problema nostro.

    Non sono ammessi zombi, sotto nessuna circostanza.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interpretazione e l'applicazione finali di queste regole, linee direttrici e di ci√≤ che costituisce una buona netichetta in generale, cos√¨ come ogni decisione che pu√≤ risultare in una sospensione del conto e/o una revocazione dell'accesso, sono in ultima istanza il privilegio dell'amministrazione di mammouth.cafe.

    Supporto

    Puoi seguire o contattare @support@mammouth.cafe per il supporto.

    Per informazioni sullo stato del server, sospensioni pianificate del servizio, ecc., puoi seguire @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Prendi buona nota del fatto che questo √® per ora uno spettacolo diretto e interpretato da una sola persona. Non attenderti dunque ad una risposta nell'ora che segue. Se la tua domanda √® urgente, prova a porrla alla communit√†: qualcun'altro potrebbe darti una mano.

    Cercheremo di non combinare guai, ma probabilmente lo faremo ad un momento o ad un altro. Se credi che ci√≤ che pubblichi qui √® di importanza vitale per te, fanne una salvaguardia da qualche altra parte (ci sono dei feed atom a disposizione per ogni conto) o, ancora meglio, offri un po' del tuo tempo e delle tue conoscenze per darci una mano con tutto questo.

    Trattamento di abusi e molestie

    Se sei vittima di abusi o molestie, segnala l'utente utilizzando il pulsante "‚Ä¶" e poi "Segnalare".

    Se hai un comportamento abusivo o offensivo, l'amministrazione pu√≤ intraprendere qualsiasi azione che riterr√† opportuna, come una sospensione del conto o una revoca dell'accesso.

    Abuso √® ci√≤ che noi consideriamo come tale. Se non sei d'accordo: peccato.

    Istanze bloccate

    Procediamo al blocco di alcune istanze Mastodon nei casi in cui una parte significativa delle loro communit√† violi le nostre regole e/o linee direttrici con il loro comportamento. In genere non commentiamo su conti individuali resi silenziosi, sospesi o soppressi.

    Privacy e sicurezza

    Rispettiamo la tua privacy. Siamo qui per divertirci, non per fare soldi sul tuo gobbo faccendoti inghiottire tonnelate di pubblicit√† indigeste o monetizzando tutto il giorno (e la notte) le tue attivit√† online. Nessuna pubblicit√† o tracker sono presenti su questa istanza.

    Tuttavia, ricordati che gli amministratori di mammouth.cafe hanno potenzialmente accesso a tutti i tuoi dati, inclusi i tuoi messaggi diretti. Inoltre, il backend non √® crittografato. Se questo non ti si addice, questa non √® l'istanza che stai cercando.

    Infine, un buon consiglio: considera tutto questo come se fosse uno spazio pubblico. Tutto ci√≤ che pubblicherai qui, sar√† esposto al pubblico e potr√† essere (e probabilmente sar√†) letto da altre persone oppure potr√† potenzialmente essere archiviato dall'Internet Archive e/o altre istutuzioni affini.

    Cercheremo di mantenere un livello di sicurezza ragionevole, ma se ti trovi in una situazione dove hai l'obbligo di mantenere la riservatezza delle tue fonti oppure nella quale le tue attivit√† rischiano di mettere in pericolo te stesso o altre persone, nel tuo paese o altrove, ti preghiamo di notare che non siamo in grado di offrirti delle condizioni di privacy e/o di sicurezza sufficienti.

    Inoltre, per inviare dati in modo veramente privato tra due persone, Mastodon non offre alcuna crittografia da un capo all'altro (end-to-end). Utilizza un'applicazione dedicata E2E con buona reputazione, come Signal per esempio, per le comunicazioni che veramente desideri mantenere private.

    E ricordati di sempre proteggerti durante ogni rapporto hexuale.

    A proposito di questa istanza

    Questa istanza √® gestita dall'Atelier Mammouth in un TARDIS da qualche parte/tempo in una specie di grande sfera di roba spazio-tempo... coso.

    Per il momento, i costi di questa istanza sono piuttosto ragionevoli e l'amministratore se li pu√≤ permettere. Non devi assolutamente sentirti obbligato a pagare qualsiasi cosa, ma se veramente vuoi sostenere questo sforzo, puoi fare un dono sul nostro conto Liberapay. Grazie mille!

    Ma ricordati: accettiamo solo doni. Non ci paghi per questo servizio. Non agire come se fosse il caso.

    E ricordati: questo √® un software LIBERO e...

    ‚Äú...se distrugge il tuo computer, violenta il tuo gatto, installa Win98 sul tuo tostapane e sul tuo microonde, blocca il tuo stimolatore cardiaco, ti provoca disfunzioni sessuali e trasforma i tuoi bambini in fottuti adolescenti che indossano capotti e brandiscono armi adulando Hitler, non dare la colpa a me perch√® ti avevo detto che poteva fare proprio questo, e tu non hai voluto ascoltarmi e lo hai utilizzato lo stesso.‚Äù

    ‚Äî James Turinsky (tradotto dall'inglese)

    Think before you type.

    With great power comes great responsibility.

    ÂåóÊµ∑ÈÅì„ÅÆMastodon„Çµ„Éº„Éê(ÂåóÊµ∑‰∏º)„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ „Åï„Åè„Çâ„ÅÆ„ÇØ„É©„Ç¶„ÉâÁü≥Áã©Á¨¨2„É™„Éº„Ç∏„Éß„É≥„ÅßÁ®ºÂÉç‰∏≠„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÁèæÂú®„ÄÅhotmail„Å®outlook„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Å´„É°„Éº„É´„ÇíÈÖç‰ø°„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑÂïèÈ°å„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„Çå„ÅØhotmail/outlook„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Çµ„Éº„ÉêÂÅ¥„Å´Ëø∑ÊÉë„É°„Éº„É´„Å®„Åó„Å¶Âà§ÂÆö„Åï„Çå„Å¶„Åó„Åæ„ÅÜ„Åü„ÇÅËµ∑„Åì„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ Ê≠£„Åó„Åè„É°„Éº„É´„ÅåÂèó‰ø°„Åï„Çå„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„Åã„Çâ„ÅîÁôªÈå≤„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    freehold.earth

    about

    preview

    join

    Freehold Earth

    Users: 139 . Toots: 1179 . Connections: 513 . Language: English

    Freehold.Earth is a free-speech centered community, extremely lightly moderated (we'll do what we can about spam and harassment, and possibly some management of the federated public timeline, that's about it...do as you please when communicating with followers!). More info at https://freehold.earth/about/more

    More Info... Welcome!

    The unifying theme of Freehold.Earth is free speech. We welcome people from all walks of life, even those we don‚Äôt particularly like, to have a voice in the world. While the initial round of invites mostly went to folks from the infosec and free speech advocacy communities, registration is open whenever our capacity limitations permit.

    However, if you are the sort of person who wants those you deem to be ‚Äúbad people‚Äù or holders of ‚Äúdangerous opinions‚Äù ejected from the community‚Ä¶this is not the place for you. I guarantee that no matter your ideological bent, there will be someone here you deem bad/dangerous.

    What does this mean in terms of user experience?

    The admins don‚Äôt want to hear about your problems with anyone you haven‚Äôt both muted and blocked. It‚Äôs your job to step away from speech that is troubling to you. We will take action to:

    Try to mitigate spam problems.

    Try to intervene in harrassment, defined specifically as a user persistently contacting another user who has already muted and blocked them. If you didn‚Äôt mute and block, they aren‚Äôt harrassing you, though they may be annoying. Annoying is not on the list of things we care about.

    Try to mitigate actual security issues.

    Encourage a tolerant and open community where users can control which content they produce and engage with.

    Note the use of ‚Äútry‚Äù and ‚Äúencourage‚Äù‚Ä¶there are things we simply do not control, and we will not sacrifice free speech for everyone in an attempt to make our community a safe haven from all the world‚Äôs ills. Earth is a chaotic place, and Freehold.Earth will likely be so as well.

    What should users know?

    A ‚Äúpost‚Äù (‚Äútweet‚Äù elsewhere) is called a ‚Äútoot‚Äù here. To repeat/amplify a toot is to ‚Äúboost‚Äù that toot.

    We favorite things we like, by clicking the star on the toot.

    The Local Timeline is all public posts at the moment on Freehold.Earth

    The Federated Timeline is every public post from anywhere that is seen by Freehold.Earth ‚Äì the more remote users followed by our users, the more of a firehose this becomes.

    Are there any tips for being loved and followed by many?

    Generally, we‚Äôre not here to tell you what to do‚Ä¶but in case you were wondering what social conventions are popular, consider the following. Observing these tips will also help keep other servers from blocking our traffic!

    Please use the #NSFW tag for NSFW posts‚Ä¶this allows other users to filter their view in public places.

    Please wrap content likely to annoy some of your audience (politics, rants, etc) in a CW (Content Warning).

    Please don‚Äôt use an animated GIF for your avatar.

    Please place the #bot tag in the profile of any non-human account.

    Please be a bit kinder than is really called for, and disengage rather than escalate when you see drama starting.

    When someone‚Äôs being an asshat, please assume it‚Äôs out of misunderstanding rather than malice, until they prove you wrong.

    Meet the Freehold.Earth admin team:

    HedgeMage ‚Ä¶This is my server, but I‚Äôm more often active on my personal account, HedgeMage@maly.io than on Freehold.

    Consentacles ‚Ä¶I‚Äôm generally friendly‚Ä¶AFTER coffee has been applied.

    KatamariChaos ‚Ä¶I like to boost a good toot.

    Nodes (instances) currently blocked by Freehold.Earth

    **NONE**

    A note on bot accounts:

    We are currently experimenting with silencing followbot accounts to reduce noise in the Federated Timeline at Freehold.Earth.

    Follow bot traffic should not appear in the Federated Timeline, if it does, feel free to report it so we can silence.

    Follow bots are NOT under a suspension ban. You can still follow them (and they you) if desired, the traffic just won‚Äôt be in the Federated Timeline. Some followbots will not follow users with #nobot in their profile.

    It is possible for bots that are not follow bots to get caught up in this ban. If you think you have seen this happening, please contact the admins.

    A follow bot is a bot that indiscriminately follows most/all users it comes across, in an attempt to increase federation between small servers and the rest of the Fediverse. Because their follow choices are random (and some spew statistics as often as every twenty minutes), we‚Äôre hoping that removing this traffic will make Freehold.Earth‚Äôs Federated Timeline more relevant and interesting to our users.

    This is currently an experiment and may change at any time.

    Email: admins@freehold.earth

    Admin: Not Available

    ostatus.ttanimichi.com

    @ttanimichi's Mastodon

    Users: 3 . Toots: 64 . Connections: 261 . Language: English

    @ttanimichi „ÅÆ Mastodon „Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „É°„Éº„É´„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅÆË®≠ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Å™„ÅÑ„Çì„ÅßÁôªÈå≤„Åó„Å¶„ÇÇ„É°„Éº„É´È£õ„Å∞„Å™„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„Åå„ÄÅË®Ä„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„Çâ„Åà„Çå„Å∞ÊâãÂãï„ÅßÊâøË™ç„Åó„Åæ„Åô

    nrd.li

    about

    preview

    join

    nrd.li

    Users: 50 . Toots: 2407 . Connections: 782 . Language: English

    A mastodon instance for nerds. If you're passionate about something you're welcome here.

    More Info... Rules

    ü§ñ Bots welcome, if they aren't bad üí©

    üòá Be good to each other

    üìÉ Report things that are illegal. They will be removed and/or muted.

    üôä If you harass users on other instances-- which is to say if you knowingly post content against the ToS of their instance to them-- action will be taken against you on this instance to protect our federation status. In extreme cases knowledge of an instances rules will not be necessary for action to be taken.

    Ultimately this instance aims to be as permissive as possible, while preserving federation with as many nodes as possible. In the interest of openness all administrative actions taken will be announced by a bot user on this instance (to be created when necessary).

    Actual terms of service to come when/if necessary.

    Blocks

    Blocking another instance from federating is, essentially, the nuclear option. I won't say that I will never block an instance, but I hope I never have to. I hope that we can judge people by their interactions with us, instead of where they have the misfortune of registering their account.

    If there is abuse, harassment, discrimination, or general prolonged unkindness from an individual, please report them and they will be silenced. Extreme cases, or people who have a pattern of bad behavior may be suspended. Send reports to @terribleplan@nrd.li

    Free speech is a right that the government cannot infringe upon. It is an important way to spread information however unpopular, hated, misguided, or plain wrong it may be. Luckily I am not the government, and I can choose who can speak (everyone by default), and who cannot on this small corner of the web I run and pay for.

    If there comes to be a democratic blocking system we may subscribe to it, or use it as a source of users to block at our own discretion. We will also report users that we block to such a service.

    Privacy

    This server is hosted in the United States by a US Citizen, and as such is subject to US Law. Any posts that are against the law will be removed and possibly reported to the relevant authorities.

    There is nothing special being done to track users, but the server does keep some logs and other potentially identifying information, including the IP address accessing the site, for abuse detection and statistical reasons. This information is not shared except as required by law.

    Email: kegan@keganmyers.com

    Admin: @terribleplan@nrd.li

    sn.angry.im

    about

    preview

    join

    SN.Angry.Im

    Users: 52 . Toots: 1015 . Connections: 566 . Language: English

    Yet another excited Mastodon instance. This node has not a main focus, and I do think it should never have. Read Rules before deciding to join, please.

    More Info... About Me

    I am @PeterCxy,

    a free-software enthusiast, currently an Undergraduate student.

    I am also a daily Linux user, and learning to be a sysadmin.

    This instance is hosted for personal hobby. It runs on a VM on an online.net server with E3-1231v3, 32G RAM, unmetered up to 1Gbps bandwidth and 2x1T HDD storage. An east-asian reverse proxy is applied for better connection to Asia. I also run my personal blog at https://typeblog.net (in Chinese).

    This instance currently runs Mastodon v1.3.3 on ArchLinux with Docker. Everything rolls fast :) Below after the Rules

    section, you can have an overview on the current status of the server.

    Rules

    This is an open community, so please try to be open and loving to others.

    Please understand this is not the Dark Web.

    Decentralization is not synonym to hidden identity. Contact the admins if anything illegal come in here.

    Sorry, but no politics here, and please avoid extreme religious content. Actually we won't ban you just because content on politics, but please be kindly noticed that it is not the best place for these content here. (But isn't the belief 'decentralization and privacy' itself a political idea? Huh.)

    Use Content Warning (CW) for any possible NSFW content or content that may make people uncomfortable here. BUT NO CHILD PORN ALLOWED. Please use the Report feature if you see any inappropriate content.

    This instance is hosted on a personal server and with periodical backups. Nothing will break soon :)

    I can't make any guarantee on how many registrations can this instance be open to. For now, sit back and relax.

    Donate if you like: 17qX8PpiSCNsqAMVRHA7BWRGcREzgXaH8F (BTC)

    After all, if you are joining this Mastodon instance, it means that you trust the administrator @PeterCxy, who set up and fully manage this instance, because thus he can block you, remove your content, view your email address etc. here. I still recommend that anyone who is able to set up his / her own instance should do it, and this is also good for the ecosystem of GNU Social / Mastodon.

    Have fun and don't be angry :joy:

    Status

    You can also view the complete status page here.

    iframe {

    width: 100%;

    }

    function resizeIframe(obj) {

    setTimeout(function() {

    obj.style.height = obj.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + 'px';

    }, 500)

    }

    var f = document.getElementById("monitor")

    f.onload = function() {

    resizeIframe(f)

    }

    Email: admin@typeblog.net

    Admin: @PeterCxy@sn.angry.im

    Ê≥ïÂæã„Å®„Éû„Éä„Éº„ÇíÂÆà„Å£„Å¶Ê•Ω„Åó„ÅèTOOTHÔºÅ


    Welcome to Ekitodon!

    What's this?

    ÈßÖ„É°„É¢„Éï„Ç°„É≥„Å´„Çà„Çã„ÄÅÈßÖ„É°„É¢„Éï„Ç°„É≥Âêë„Åë„ÅÆÈùûÂÖ¨ÂºèMastodon„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    Tutorial

    „Äå‰Ωï„Åã„ÇâÂßã„ÇÅ„Åü„Çâ„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åã„Çè„Åã„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑÔºÅ„Äç

    Attention!

    18Á¶Å„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åù„ÅÜ„Å™SSÁ≠â„ÅÆÊñáÁ´†„ÅØCW„ÄÅÁîªÂÉè„Å´„ÅØNSFW„Çø„Ç∞„Çí„Åó„Å£„Åã„Çä„Å®‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „Ç≠„É£„Éñ„Å©„Çì

    ÊóßËªä„Å®ÁèçËªä„ÇíÊÑõ„Åó„ÄÅ„Ç≠„É£„Éñ„ÅßÂê∏„ÅÜÁ©∫Ê∞ó„ÅÆÁæéÂë≥„Åó„Åï„ÇíÁü•„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÄÇ

    • „ÄåCome And Buy To‚Ä¶„Äç„ÅÆ„Ç¢„É¨„Å®„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Åæ„ÇäÈñ¢‰øÇ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    Ê≥®ÊÑè‰∫ãÈ†Ö

    • ÁôªÈå≤„Å®„ÅîÂà©Áî®„Å®„Åù„ÅÆÂæå„ÅÆÁµêÊûú„ÅØ „Éé„Éº„ÇØ„É¨„Éº„É†„Éª„Éé„Éº„É™„Çø„Éº„É≥ „Åß„ÅäÈ°ò„ÅÑ„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    • „Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ(„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº)„ÅØÊóßËªä„ÉªÁèçËªä„Å®Âêå„Åò„Åß„ÄÅ‰∫àÂëä„Å™„Åó„Åß‰Ωï„Åã„ÅåÂ£ä„Çå„Åü„Çä„Åó„Å¶Á™ÅÁô∫„É°„É≥„ÉÜ„Éä„É≥„Çπ„ÅåÂøÖË¶Å„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑ„Å®„Åç„ÅØË¶ãÂÆà„Å£„Å¶„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    physi.cc

    about

    preview

    join

    Physi.cc Mastodon

    Users: 38 . Toots: 1600 . Connections: 684 . Language: English

    Mastodon is a distributed, open-source social platform. This instance is run by a graduate worker and physics PhD candidate in Ithaca NY , but can be used to connect with people on any other GNU Social compatible instance. There are no formal rules on this instance for now, just don't be a jerk! We reserve the right to keep anything and anyone bad off the server.

    Contact

    Jaron Kent-Dobias üë∂üò≥

    @kentdobias

    Business e-mail:

    kentdobias@physi.cc

    Email: kentdobias@physi.cc

    Admin: @kentdobias@physi.cc

    scholar.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Scholar Social

    Users: 16 . Toots: 357 . Connections: 305 . Language: English

    A Mastodon instance for academics

    "The Mastodon profile that you're not embarrassed to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference"

    Read more ...

    More Info... This is a general-purpose federated Mastodon instance. You may use it as a personal account, but the focus is on academics. This is supposed to be "the Mastodon profile that you're not embarrassed to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference." :P

    Real names and credentials are recommended for networking purposes but are absolutely not required.

    Do

    Brag about your publications

    Share references and resources

    Network with other academics

    Add CW's (content warnings) to your posts liberally: label strong language, rants, spoilers of TV shows, etc. We're academics! We love meta-data!

    Recruit participants for academic surveys‚Äîformal, IRB-approved ones or even informal ones (just make sure to CW them and don't get too obnoxious about it)

    Don't

    Post anything that could be described as "spam"

    Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.

    Impersonate other people

    Harass other people

    In more detail

    Many thanks to mastodon.social, from whom I took these policies.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of scholar.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: scholar.social.mastodon@gmail.com

    Admin: @socrates@scholar.social

    mastodon.coffee

    about

    preview

    join

    mastodon.coffee

    Users: 41 . Toots: 248 . Connections: 1202 . Language: English

    The coffee flavored instance for all us coffee addicts

    More Info... This is taken straight from mastodon.social as we apply the same guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: admin@mastodon.coffee

    Admin: @Liljeberg@mastodon.coffee

    mastodon.jtwp470.net

    Mastodon

    Users: 23 . Toots: 834 . Connections: 262 . Language: English

    @jtwp470 „ÅÆmastodon„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    More Info...

    Hosted on Amazon Web Service EC2 t2.micro

    Region

    Tokyo

    ap-northeast-1

    vCPU

    1

    Core

    RAM

    1

    GB

    EBS

    30

    GB

    Running Cost: About 0.4 USD / Day (On-Demand)

    OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS

    „É´„Éº„É´

    Êñ∞Ë¶èÁôªÈå≤„ÅØÂèó„Åë‰ªò„Åë„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅÆÂÆâÂÆöÊÄß„ÅØ‰øùË®º„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    „Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ‰∫àÂëä„Å™„Åè„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Éº„ÅåÂÅúÊ≠¢„Åô„ÇãÊÅê„Çå„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åï„Çâ„Å´„ÄÅÂÖ¨Â∫èËâØ‰øó„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™ÁîªÂÉè„ÄÅÂãïÁîª„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ(„Å®Ë®Ä„ÅÜ„ÅãÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´ÂÆπÈáè„ÇíÂúßËø´„Åô„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅßÁîªÂÉè„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„ÅØ„Åä„ÇÑ„ÇÅ„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ)

    ÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∫∫„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    social.lasanha.org

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 9 . Toots: 106 . Connections: 338 . Language: English

    social.lasanha.org

    More Info... We are following the rules that mastodon.social also uses for moderation, so:

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lasanha.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mastodon@luizirber.org

    Admin: Not Available

    die Gratzhurksen sind heute

    wie Hundemurzen durch Lochexkursion.

    So forksabbelnd kannst mich ankerm√∂rteln auf der Eiterplansche.

    Summelnder w√ºrgfratzelnder Schnapperzaff haut sie mit Rotfurzen.

    Oh Kraukenstachel,

    wie toll du hodenquarzelst

    mit deinen Onusticken.

    Stricken tust du Atzekra

    in Donnerponus dank Freutzelgebein.

    Wir blommsen dich in Urges√∂ffel

    mit unseren Onusticken,

    auf das du w√ºrgejacheln kannst.

    Oh ja! Schnapperzaff ist unser

    Knochensturz und krasselnder Dumpfponus.

    So forksabbelnd kannst mich ankerm√∂rteln auf der Eiterplansche.

    Summelnder w√ºrgfratzelnder Schnapperzaff haut sie mit Rotfurzen.

    Oh allukierender Schnapperzaff!

    Dein Onusticken ist f√ºr uns wie

    Blommsgedeihe auf Atzekra.

    Wenn nicht werden wir dich blommsen

    mit unseren Rotzelquarzen.

    Oh ja! Schnapperzaff, warts nur ab!

    • Ë©¶È®ìÈÅãÁî®‰∏≠„ÄÇ„ÄÇ„ÄÇ
    ÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∫∫„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ idolon.club/@admin

    „Ç¢„Ç§„Éâ„É´Èñ¢ÈÄ£Mastodon„É™„Çπ„ÉàÔºà‰∏çÂÆöÊúüÊõ¥Êñ∞Ôºâ

    mastodon.hk

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.hk

    Users: 175 . Toots: 1979 . Connections: 511 . Language: English

    mastodon.hk

    More Info...

    Rules

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.hk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Racism, Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Content illegal in Hong Kong

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Contact

    Other than

    Mastodon

    , you may contact me via Twitter

    @siuying

    Email: francis@ignition.hk

    Admin: @siuying@mastodon.hk

    mastodon.civleaguejp.net

    misanthropy.wang

    about

    preview

    join

    misanthropy.wang

    Users: 36 . Toots: 2589 . Connections: 621 . Language: English

    This is a mastodon instance that only exists because I thought the domain was funny.
    Also, mastodon is pretty neat.

    Keeping the server alive

    If you want to support this server, you can do so by either signing up and being nice to me or help me pay my hosting bills through my patreon

    More Info... Since this is a small instance on a small server, I'll reserve the right to close registrations at any time.

    I have not authored a full CoC yet, but you should be aware that using this instance you are going to be silenced, removed, blocked and whatever'd if someone reports you as abusive, you harass someone, or you spew sexist/racist/transphobic bullshit.

    Yes, this site is called misanthropy.wang, but that doesn't mean that everyone here hates each other. At least not, you know, verbally. Just on the inside.

    Location

    The server for this instance is located in Paris, France, and is operated from Germany. I don't know what exactly that might mean to you, but if you're the type of persons who cares, you probably already know.

    Email: jemus42@quantenbrot.de

    Admin: @jemus42@misanthropy.wang

    witches.academy

    about

    preview

    join

    Witches.Academy

    Users: 32 . Toots: 691 . Connections: 329 . Language: English

    Welcome to Witches Academy

    Admins

    Currently, the Admin are @spiderrobotpig and @ashkitten

    We are working together to keep the site up, and updated.

    We are a rather laid back community. However, as a note, there are several things that will not be tolerated here:

    • Harassment in any form
    • Anything resembling White Supremacy
    • Anyone defending White Supremacy
    • In general, awful behaviour
    • Ableism
    • Transmisia
    • Homomisia
    • Bigotry in general

    Basically, if you are a Nazi, TERF, or a sympathizer for either, you're gonna get banned.

    This is a very SJW friendly-Instance

    Don't let us down, witches.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of witches.academy; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Email: me@anjaghraves.com

    Admin: @spiderrobotpig@witches.academy

    Mastodon #Ëâ¶„Åì„Çå

    Users: 170 . Toots: 11715 . Connections: 86 . Language: Japanese

    Ëâ¶„Åì„Çå„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ
    „Éó„É¨„Ç§ÂÆüÊ≥Å„ÄÅÊîªÁï•ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÄÅ„ÉÑ„Éº„É´„ÅÆ‰Ωø„ÅÑÊñπ„Å™„Å©„Äå‰ªñSNS„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„Åã„Å™„ÅãË©±„Åõ„Å™„ÅÑ‰∫ã„ÄÅÁõ∏Ë´á„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑ„Åì„Å®„Äç„ÇíÊ∞óËªΩ„Å´Ë©±„Åõ„ÇãÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Å´„Å™„Çå„Å∞„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Å™„Å®ÊÄù„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
    Ê≥ïÂæã„ÅØÂÆà„Çä„ÄÅÊ•Ω„Åó„Åè„ÅîÂà©Áî®„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „Åø„Çì„Å™„Åß„Ç≤„Éº„É†„ÇÑ„Å£„ÅüÊñπ„ÅåÊ•Ω„Åó„ÅÑÔºÅ

    ÊÄù„ÅÑ„ÇÑ„Çä„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãÁô∫Ë®Ä„ÇíÂøÉ„Åå„Åë„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª‰ªñ„ÅÆÊñπ„Å´Ëø∑ÊÉë„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰∏çÂø´„Å´ÊÑü„Åò„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÇíÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ‰∏ÄÊôÇÁöÑ„Å´Âà©Áî®„ÇíÂà∂ÈôêËá¥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚Äª„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„ÅÆ„Éê„Éº„Ç∏„Éß„É≥„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„ÅØÂÆâÂÖ®„Å´ÂÆüÊñΩÂá∫Êù•„Çã„Å®„Åç„Å´Ë°å„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ „Ç§„Éô„É≥„ÉàÈñãÂÇ¨‰∏≠„ÅØÂÆüÊñΩ„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„ÅîÂÆπËµ¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    dolphin.town

    about

    preview

    join

    üê¨ Town

    Users: 222 . Toots: 884 . Connections: 146 . Language: English

    Eeeee! EEEEE, eeeeee!

    dolphin.town is a Mastodon instance where you can only say the letter e. Some instances exist that do not allow this letter. This is not helpful if you are a dolphin.

    Therefore, Darius Kazemi created this instance for all your dolphin-posting needs.

    Email: dolphintown@feeltrain.com

    Admin: @e@dolphin.town

    toot.redmine.jp ‚Äì RedmineÂà©Áî®ËÄÖ„ÅÆ„Ç≥„Éü„É•„Éã„ÉÜ„Ç£„Çµ„Ç§„Éà

    „Ç™„Éº„Éó„É≥„ÇΩ„Éº„Çπ„ÅÆ„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„ÉàÁÆ°ÁêÜ„ÉÑ„Éº„É´„Äå Redmine „Äç„ÅÆÂà©Áî®ËÄÖÂêåÂ£´„Åß„ÄÅRedmine„ÇÑ„Åù„ÅÆÂë®Ëæ∫„ÅÆ„ÉÑ„Éº„É´„ÅÆÊ¥ªÁî®„ÉªÊúÄÊñ∞ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÄÅ„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„ÉàÈÅãÂñ∂„Å™„Å©„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶Ë™û„Çä„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇ

    ‚òÜ„Çπ„Éû„Éº„Éà„Éï„Ç©„É≥„Ç¢„Éó„É™„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶‚òÜ

    iphone„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄåAmaroq for Mastodon„Äç„ÅåÊúâÂêç„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    Android„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅØ„ÄåTusky„Äç„ÅåÊúâÂêç„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åù„Çå„Åû„Çå„Ç¢„Éó„É™Ëµ∑ÂãïÂæå„Å´ÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„ÇπÂêç„Äåmastodon-nagano.info„Äç„ÇíÂÖ•Âäõ„Åó„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„ÅåÂÆå‰∫Ü„Åó„Åü„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÂêç„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„Åî‰ΩøÁî®„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    „ÉªÊó•Êú¨ÂõΩÂÜÖ„ÅÆÊ≥ïÂæã„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    „Éª‰ªñËÄÖ„Å´‰∏≠ÂÇ∑„ÉªËÑÖËø´„ÉªÁµåÊ∏àÁöÑ„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÁ≤æÁ•ûÁöÑ„Å´ÊêçÂÆ≥„ÇÑ‰∏çÂà©Áõä„Çí‰∏é„Åà„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    „Éª‰ªñËÄÖ„ÅÆËëó‰ΩúÁâ©„ÇíÁÑ°Êñ≠Ëª¢Ëºâ„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    „Éª„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å´Ê•µÁ´Ø„Å™Ë≤†Ëç∑„Çí„Åã„Åë„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÂÖçË≤¨‰∫ãÈ†Ö

    ÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶Áô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÊêçÂÆ≥„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØÈÅãÂñ∂ËÄÖ„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„Çè„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    mel.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon for Melburnians

    Users: 9 . Toots: 40 . Connections: 141 . Language: English

    mel.social is a small mastodon instance aimed primarily at Melbourne and Victoria based people who want a safe digital space to communicate and be creative. members are encouraged to communication and share their work as long as it adheres to our Code of Conduct

    Please make sure you've familiarised yourself with our Code of Conduct before signing up and if our rules aren't to your liking then there are many other instances that may be better suited to your needs.

    Follow @status for status & maintenance updates. Instance admin is @ajfisher

    More Info... mel.social Code of Conduct

    As a user of mel.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from mel.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathises with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admin.

    Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from mel.social:

    Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact @ajfisher)

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and graphic violence

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from mel.social:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from mel.social.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on mel.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing mel.social or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behaviour may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Admin reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to mel.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @ajfisher@mel.social

    Â©öÊ¥ª„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‰∫∫„ÅåÈõÜ„ÅÜ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „ÅÑ„ÅæÊµÅË°å„Çä„ÅÆ„Ç≥„Éü„É•„Éã„Ç±„Éº„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„ÄÅMastodon„ÅÆÂ©öÊ¥ª„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åø„Çì„Å™„Åß„ÉØ„Ç§„ÉØ„Ç§Ê•Ω„Åó„Åè„ÇÑ„Çä„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ„ÄÇ

    ‰ªñ‰∫∫„ÇíË™πË¨ó‰∏≠ÂÇ∑„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÇÑ„Éä„É≥„ÉëÁõÆÁöÑ„Åß„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„ÅØÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ „Éû„Éä„Éº„ÇíÂÆà„Å£„Å¶„ÅîÂà©Áî®„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    mastodon.elmit.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 19 . Toots: 549 . Connections: 498 . Language: English

    The Twitter Killer

    Welcome

    Here some resources to understand Mastodon:

    • Welcome to Mastodon by @Gargron
    • Bye, Twitter. All the cool kids are migrating to Mastodon by Mashable

    Rules

    • No illegal content. The server is hosted in France : racism, apology for terrorism, bullying, defamation, violations privacy rights and child pornograhy are illegal under French law.
    • No oppressive content (sexism, homophobia, etc).
    • No parody account.
    • No bot (for the moment).
    • Any graphical content have to contain a Content Warning.
    • No explicit sexual content in the public timeline without content warning (you can configure your toot privacy on "public but do not display on public timeline").

    Mobile applications

    • Android : Tusky
    • iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon
    • Full list

    Support Mastodon

    • The code source can be found here : Github
    • You can help the developer of Mastodon on Patreon

    Support this instance mastodon.elmit.com

    ...sponsored by Elmit

    Email: ronald+mastodon@elmit.com

    Admin: @Elmit@mastodon.elmit.com

    now.kibousoft.co.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    Kibousoft Now - A Mastodon Instance

    Users: 58 . Toots: 527 . Connections: 437 . Language: English

    ÈÅãÂñ∂‰ºöÁ§æÔºöÂêàÂêå‰ºöÁ§æ„Åç„Åº„ÅÜ„ÇΩ„Éï„Éà

    http://kibousoft.co.jp

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„Çã„ÅäÂïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ„ÅØ„Åì„Å°„Çâ„Åæ„Åß

    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

    xhr.open('GET', 'https://viav6.kibousoft.co.jp/', true);

    xhr.onreadystatechange = function(){

    if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200){

    var dom = document.getElementById('kibousoft-viav6');

    dom.innerHTML = xhr.responseText;

    }

    };

    xhr.send(null);

    Á¨¨ÔºëÊù°„ÄÄÁ∑èÂâá

    „Åì„ÅÆË¶èÁ¥ÑÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºâ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂêàÂêå‰ºöÁ§æ„Åç„Åº„ÅÜ„ÇΩ„Éï„ÉàÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÂΩìÁ§æ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºâ„ÅåÈÅãÂñ∂„Åô„Çã„ÄÅ„ÇΩ„Éº„Ç∑„É£„É´„Éª„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„Éª„ÉØ„Éº„Ç≠„É≥„Ç∞„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÄåKibousoft Now„ÄçÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºâ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®Êù°‰ª∂„ÇíÂÆö„ÇÅ„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂„Åô„Çã„Ç¶„Çß„Éñ„Çµ„Ç§„ÉàÔºàhttp://now.kibousoft.co.jp/Ôºâ„ÅÆ„Åª„Åã„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÈÅãÁî®„Åô„Çã„Éñ„É≠„Ç∞„ÄÅTwitter„ÄÅFacebook„ÄÅ„É°„Éº„É´„Éû„Ç¨„Ç∏„É≥Á≠â„ÅÆÂ™í‰Ωì„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶Êèê‰æõ„Åï„Çå„ÇãÊßò„ÄÖ„Å™ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇÑ„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇÇ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´Âê´„Åæ„Çå„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „Åô„Åπ„Å¶„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´ÂêàÊÑè„Åó„Åü„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åø„Å™„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Çí„Çà„ÅèË™≠„Çì„ÅßÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºíÊù°„ÄÄÂÆöÁæ©

    Êú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶‰ΩøÁî®„Åô„ÇãÁî®Ë™û„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁÆáÊâÄ„Å´ÂÆö„ÇÅ„Çâ„Çå„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„ÅÆ„Åª„Åã„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆÈÄö„Çä„ÅÆÊÑèÂë≥„Çí„ÇÇ„Å§„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
