    ‚ë°„ÄåÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Äç„ÄÄ-ÁôªÈå≤Â∏åÊúõËÄÖ„ÅÆ„ÅÜ„Å°ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÊñπÊ≥ï„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å∏„ÅÆÁôªÈå≤„ÇíÁî≥„ÅóËæº„Åø„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Åå„Åì„Çå„ÇíÊâøË™ç„Åó„ÅüÊñπ„Çí„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Å™„Åä„ÄÅ„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„ÅÆÊé≤Ëºâ„ÄÅ„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„Å∏„ÅÆÊîØÊè¥„ÅÆÂãüÈõÜ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊîØÊè¥Èáë„ÅÆÊîØÊâï„ÅÑ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÄÅ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„Éº„Éù„É™„Ç∑„Éº„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„Å∏„ÅÆÂêåÊÑè„Å®„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤„ÅåÂøÖË¶Å„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë¢„ÄåÁôªÈå≤ÊÉÖÂ†±„Äç„ÄÄ-„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Çã„Åü„ÇÅ„Å´„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´Êèê‰æõ„Åó„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±„Çí„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë£„ÄåÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„Äç„ÄÄ-ÁôªÈå≤ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆ„ÅÜ„Å°„ÄÅÊ∞èÂêç„ÄÅ‰ΩèÊâÄ„ÄÅÁîüÂπ¥ÊúàÊó•„ÄÅÈõªË©±Áï™Âè∑„ÄÅÈõªÂ≠ê„É°„Éº„É´„Ç¢„Éâ„É¨„Çπ„ÄÅÈáëËûçÊ©üÈñ¢„ÅÆÂè£Â∫ßÊÉÖÂ†±„ÄÅ„ÇØ„É¨„Ç∏„ÉÉ„Éà„Ç´„Éº„ÉâÊÉÖÂ†±„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñÁâπÂÆö„ÅÆÂÄã‰∫∫„ÇíË≠òÂà•„Åß„Åç„ÇãÊÉÖÂ†±„Çí„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºìÊù°„ÄÄÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂÜÖÂÆπ

    Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅßÊßãÊàê„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë†„ÇΩ„Éº„Ç∑„É£„É´„Éª„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„Éª„ÉØ„Éº„Ç≠„É≥„Ç∞„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÄåKibousoft Now„Äç

    ÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÂèä„Å≥„ÄÅ‰ªñ„ÅÆMastodon„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å®‰∫§ÊµÅ„ÄÅÊÉÖÂ†±ÂÖ±Êúâ„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„Çã„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºîÊù°„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤

    1 „ÄÄÁôªÈå≤Â∏åÊúõËÄÖ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨‰∫∫Ëá™Ë∫´„ÅßÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÊñπÊ≥ï„Å´„Çà„ÇäÁôªÈå≤Áî≥Ë´ã„ÇíË°å„ÅÜ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆË£ÅÈáè„Å´„Çà„ÇäÁôªÈå≤Áî≥Ë´ã„ÇíÊâøË™ç„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤Â∏åÊúõËÄÖ„ÇíÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å®„Åó„Å¶ÁôªÈå≤„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    3 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤Â∏åÊúõËÄÖ„Åå„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆÂêÑÂè∑„ÅÆ„ÅÑ„Åö„Çå„Åã„ÅÆ‰∫ãÁî±„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÂÜçÁôªÈå≤„ÇíË°å„Çè„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂÜçÁôªÈå≤„ÅÆÊâøË™ç„ÇíË°å„Çè„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„Åß„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆÁêÜÁî±„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶‰∏ÄÂàáÈñãÁ§∫Áæ©Âãô„ÇíË≤†„Çè„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    (1) „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´Êèê‰æõ„Åó„ÅüÁôªÈå≤‰∫ãÈ†Ö„ÅÆÂÖ®ÈÉ®„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰∏ÄÈÉ®„Å´„Å§„ÅçËôöÂÅΩ„ÄÅË™§Ë®ò„Åæ„Åü„ÅØË®òËºâÊºè„Çå„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„Å®ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    (2) „ÄÄË¶™Ê®©ËÄÖ„ÅÆÂêåÊÑè„ÇíÂæó„Çâ„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÑÊú™ÊàêÂπ¥ËÄÖ„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆÁôªÈå≤Áî≥Ë´ã„Åß„ÅÇ„Çã„Å®ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    (3) ÂèçÁ§æ‰ºöÁöÑÂã¢ÂäõÁ≠â„Åß„ÅÇ„Çã„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØË≥áÈáëÊèê‰æõ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÇíÈÄö„Åò„Å¶ÂèçÁ§æ‰ºöÁöÑÂã¢ÂäõÁ≠â„ÅÆÁ∂≠ÊåÅ„ÄÅÈÅãÂñ∂„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÁµåÂñ∂„Å´ÂçîÂäõ„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÈñ¢‰∏é„Åô„ÇãÁ≠âÂèçÁ§æ‰ºöÁöÑÂã¢ÂäõÁ≠â„Å®„ÅÆ‰Ωï„Çâ„Åã„ÅÆÈñ¢‰∏é„ÇíË°å„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å®ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    (4) ÈÅéÂéªÂΩìÁ§æ„Å®„ÅÆÂ•ëÁ¥Ñ„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åó„Åü„Åì„Å®„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãÁôªÈå≤Â∏åÊúõËÄÖ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆÈñ¢‰øÇËÄÖ„Åß„ÅÇ„Çã„Å®ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    (5) Á¶ÅÊ≠¢‰∫ãÈ†Ö„Å´ÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÊé™ÁΩÆ„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åü„Åì„Å®„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà

    (6) „Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÁôªÈå≤„ÇíÈÅ©ÂΩì„Åß„Å™„ÅÑ„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    Ôºî„ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤„ÅÆËß£Èô§„ÇíÂ∏åÊúõ„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÊ°àÂÜÖ„Å´Âæì„Å£„Å¶„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤„ÇíËß£Èô§„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åü„Å†„Åó„ÄÅ„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„Ç™„Éº„Éä„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Éï„Ç°„É≥„Éá„Ç£„É≥„Ç∞„Å´„Çà„ÇãÊîØÊè¥Èáë„ÇíÂèóÈ†ò„Åó„ÅüÂæå„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÊâøË™ç„Å™„Åè„Åó„Å¶„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÁôªÈå≤„ÇíËß£Èô§„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÅØ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    Ôºï„ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„Éº„Éù„É™„Ç∑„Éº„ÅÆ‰ªñ„Å´„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅåÈÅ©Áî®„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºïÊù°„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆÁÆ°ÁêÜ

    1 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÊ©üËÉΩ„ÅÆ‰ΩøÁî®„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„Å´ÂøÖË¶Å„Å™„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Çí‰ªò‰∏é„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ‰∏¶„Å≥„Å´„Åì„Çå„Çâ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„ÅüÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„Çã‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÜ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ‰∏¶„Å≥„Å´Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„ÇãÊ®©Âà©Áæ©Âãô„Å´„Å§„Åç„ÄÅÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÂØæ„ÅóË≠≤Ê∏°„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÂá¶ÂàÜ„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ„Å™„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„ÅåÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Åü„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„ÇäÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåË¢´„Çã„ÅÑ„Åã„Å™„ÇãÊêçÂÆ≥„ÄÅÊêçÂ§±„Åæ„Åü„ÅØË≤ªÁî®Ôºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºâ„ÇÇË£úÂÑü„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    3 „ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÅåÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´Êºè„Çå„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ„ÅÇ„Çã„ÅÑ„ÅØ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÅåÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´‰ΩøÁî®„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÁñë„ÅÑ„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÁõ¥„Å°„Å´ÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´„Åù„ÅÆÊó®ÈÄ£Áµ°„Åô„Çã„Å®„Å®„ÇÇ„Å´„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÊåáÁ§∫„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„Åì„Çå„Å´Âæì„ÅÜ„Å´„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„ÉâÁ≠â„Çí‰∏çÊ≠£„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Å®„Åó„Å¶ÂÅúÊ≠¢„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    4 „ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅåÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶Áô∫Ë°å„Åô„Çã„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Çí„ÄÅÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÈñãÁ§∫„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    5 „ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÂÆöÊúüÁöÑ„Å´„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÂ§âÊõ¥„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆÂ§âÊõ¥„ÇíÊÄ†„Å£„Åü„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„ÇäÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„ÅåÁîü„Åò„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºñÊù°„ÄÄÂ±äÂá∫‰∫ãÈ†Ö„ÅÆÂ§âÊõ¥Á≠â

    1 „ÄÄÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤ÊÉÖÂ†±„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„ÅåÁîü„Åò„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÁõ¥„Å°„Å´ÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´Â§âÊõ¥„ÇíÈÄ£Áµ°„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÊ©üËÉΩ„Çí‰Ωø„ÅÑ„ÄÅËá™„ÇâÊúÄÊñ∞„ÅÆÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÁôªÈå≤„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Åã„Çâ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åô„ÇãÈÄöÁü•„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´Áî≥Ë´ã„Åó„ÅüÈÄ£Áµ°ÂÖà„Å´Áô∫‰ø°„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÈÄöÂ∏∏Âà∞ÈÅî„Åô„Åπ„Åç„Å®„Åç„Å´Âà∞ÈÅî„Åó„Åü„Å®„Åø„Å™„Åï„Çå„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºóÊù°„ÄÄÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆÂèñÊâ±„ÅÑ

    1 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´„Çà„Çã„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆÂèñÊâ±„ÅÑ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„Éº„Éù„É™„Ç∑„Éº„ÅÆÂÆö„ÇÅ„Å´„Çà„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„Åì„ÅÆ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„Éº„Éù„É™„Ç∑„Éº„Å´Âæì„Å£„Å¶ÂΩìÁ§æ„Åå„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÂèñÊâ±„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶ÂêåÊÑè„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´Êèê‰æõ„Åó„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±„ÄÅ„Éá„Éº„ÇøÁ≠â„Çí„ÄÅÂÄã‰∫∫„ÇíÁâπÂÆö„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑÂΩ¢„Åß„ÅÆÁµ±Ë®àÁöÑ„Å™ÊÉÖÂ†±„Å®„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆË£ÅÈáè„Åß„ÄÅÂà©Áî®„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÂÖ¨Èñã„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„Åì„Çå„Å´Áï∞Ë≠∞„ÇíÂî±„Åà„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºòÊù°„ÄÄÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂ§âÊõ¥„ÄÅÂÅúÊ≠¢„ÄÅ„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÂªÉÊ≠¢

    ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Å§„Åß„ÇÇÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂÜÖÂÆπ„Çí‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆÂëäÁü•„Å™„Åè„ÄÅÂ§âÊõ¥„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂªÉÊ≠¢„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∫ãÂâç„Å´ÈõªÂ≠ê„É°„Éº„É´„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Çµ„Ç§„ÉàÁ≠â„Å´„Çà„Çä„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´„Åù„ÅÆÊó®„ÇíÈÄöÁü•„Åô„Çã„Çà„ÅÜÂä™„ÇÅ„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§âÊõ¥„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂªÉÊ≠¢„Å´„Çà„Çä„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´Áîü„Åò„ÅüÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„Å´„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàáË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Åæ„ÅüÊ¨°„ÅÆ‰∫ãÁî±„Å´„Çà„ÇäÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰∏ÄÈÉ®„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂÖ®ÈÉ®„ÇíÂÅúÊ≠¢„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅÂΩìË©≤ÂÅúÊ≠¢„Å´„Çà„Çä„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´Áîü„Åò„ÅüÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„Å´„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàáË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    (1)„ÄÄÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÊèê‰æõ„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆË£ÖÁΩÆ„ÄÅ„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†„ÅÆ‰øùÂÆà„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÁÇπÊ§ú„ÇíË°å„ÅÜÂ†¥Âêà

    (2)„ÄÄÁÅ´ÁÅΩ„ÄÅÂÅúÈõª„ÄÅÂú∞Èúá„ÄÅÂ§©ÁÅΩ„ÄÅ„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†ÈöúÂÆ≥Á≠â„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂„ÅåÂõ∞Èõ£„Å™Â†¥Âêà

    (3)„ÄÄ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Åå„ÇÑ„ÇÄ„Çí„Åà„Å™„ÅÑ„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    Á¨¨ÔºôÊù°„ÄÄÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢Ë°åÁÇ∫

    1 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´„ÅÇ„Åü„Å£„Å¶„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆ„ÅÑ„Åö„Çå„Åã„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÅÇ„Çã„ÅÑ„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ„Åä„Åù„Çå„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ„Å™„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë†„ÄÄÊ≥ï‰ª§„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÁäØÁΩ™Ë°åÁÇ∫„Å´Èñ¢ÈÄ£„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ‚ë°„ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÂØæ„Åô„ÇãË©êÊ¨∫„Åæ„Åü„ÅØËÑÖËø´Ë°åÁÇ∫

    ‚ë¢„ÄÄÂÖ¨Â∫èËâØ‰øó„Å´Âèç„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ‚ë£„ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„ÅÆÁü•ÁöÑË≤°Áî£Ê®©„ÄÅËÇñÂÉèÊ®©„ÄÅ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„Éº„ÅÆÊ®©Âà©„ÄÅÂêçË™â„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÊ®©Âà©„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂà©Áõä„Çí‰æµÂÆ≥„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ‚ë§„ÄÄÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÈÄö„Åò„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åó„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØË©≤ÂΩì„Åô„Çã„Å®ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂà§Êñ≠„Åô„ÇãÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÂΩìÁ§æ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÈÄÅ‰ø°„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®

    ÔºàÔºëÔºâÈÅéÂ∫¶„Å´Êö¥ÂäõÁöÑ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊÆãËôê„Å™Ë°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºíÔºâ„ÄÄ„Ç≥„É≥„Éî„É•„Éº„Çø„Éº„Éª„Ç¶„Ç£„É´„Çπ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÊúâÂÆ≥„Å™„Ç≥„É≥„Éî„É•„Éº„Çø„Éº„Éª„Éó„É≠„Ç∞„É©„É†„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºìÔºâ ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„ÅÆÂêçË™â„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰ø°Áî®„ÇíÊØÄÊêç„Åô„ÇãË°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±„ÉªÈÅéÂ∫¶„Å´„Çè„ÅÑ„Åõ„Å§„Å™Ë°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºîÔºâ Â∑ÆÂà•„ÇíÂä©Èï∑„Åô„ÇãË°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±„ÉªËá™ÊÆ∫„ÄÅËá™ÂÇ∑Ë°åÁÇ∫„ÇíÂä©Èï∑„Åô„ÇãË°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºïÔºâ Ëñ¨Áâ©„ÅÆ‰∏çÈÅ©Âàá„Å™Âà©Áî®„ÇíÂä©Èï∑„Åô„ÇãË°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºñÔºâ ÂèçÁ§æ‰ºöÁöÑ„Å™Ë°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºóÔºâ ‰ªñ‰∫∫„Å´‰∏çÂø´ÊÑü„Çí‰∏é„Åà„ÇãË°®Áèæ„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºòÔºâ Èù¢Ë≠ò„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÁï∞ÊÄß„Å®„ÅÆÂá∫‰ºö„ÅÑ„ÇíÁõÆÁöÑ„Å®„Åó„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±

    ÔºàÔºôÔºâ Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÉØ„Éº„ÇØ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†Á≠â„Å´ÈÅéÂ∫¶„Å™Ë≤†Ëç∑„Çí„Åã„Åë„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºêÔºâ Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÈÅãÂñ∂„ÇíÂ¶®ÂÆ≥„Åô„Çã„Åä„Åù„Çå„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºëÔºâ ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆ„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÉØ„Éº„ÇØ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Ç∑„Çπ„ÉÜ„É†Á≠â„Å´‰∏çÊ≠£„Å´„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„Åó„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰∏çÊ≠£„Å™„Ç¢„ÇØ„Çª„Çπ„ÇíË©¶„Åø„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºíÔºâ Á¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´Êàê„Çä„Åô„Åæ„ÅôË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºìÔºâ Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºîÔºâ ÂΩìÁ§æ„Åå‰∫ãÂâç„Å´Ë®±Ë´æ„Åó„Å™„ÅÑÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ‰∏ä„Åß„ÅÆÂÆ£‰ºù„ÄÅÂ∫ÉÂëä„ÄÅÂãßË™ò„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂñ∂Ê•≠Ë°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºïÔºâ ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´‰∏çÂà©Áõä„ÄÅÊêçÂÆ≥„ÄÅ‰∏çÂø´ÊÑü„Çí‰∏é„Åà„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºñÔºâ „Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„Å´ÊäµËß¶„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºóÔºâ ÂèçÁ§æ‰ºöÁöÑÂã¢ÂäõÁ≠â„Å∏„ÅÆÂà©Áõä‰æõ‰∏é

    ÔºàÔºëÔºòÔºâ ÂâçÂêÑÂè∑„ÅÆË°åÁÇ∫„ÇíÁõ¥Êé•„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÈñìÊé•„Å´ÊÉπËµ∑„Åó„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂÆπÊòì„Å´„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    ÔºàÔºëÔºôÔºâ „Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Åå‰∏çÈÅ©Âàá„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫

    Ôºí„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÄÅ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„Éº„Éù„É™„Ç∑„Éº„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„ÇíË¢´„Å£„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶ÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„ÅÆË£úÂÑü„ÇíË´ãÊ±Ç„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºêÊù°„ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªªÁØÑÂõ≤

    1 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„ÇãÈöõ„Å´„ÄÅ„Ç≥„É≥„Éî„É•„Éº„Çø„Ç¶„Ç§„É´„Çπ„Å™„Å©ÊúâÂÆ≥„Å™„Éó„É≠„Ç∞„É©„É†Á≠â„Å´„Çà„ÇãÊêçÂÆ≥„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Å™„ÅÑ„Åì„Å®„Çí‰øùË®º„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„ÇãÈöõ„Å´‰ΩøÁî®„Åô„Çã„ÅÑ„Åã„Å™„ÇãÊ©üÂô®„ÄÅ„ÇΩ„Éï„Éà„Ç¶„Çß„Ç¢„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆÂãï‰Ωú‰øùË®º„Çí‰∏ÄÂàá„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    3 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„ÇãÈöõ„Å´Áô∫Áîü„Åô„ÇãÈÄö‰ø°Ë≤ªÁî®„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅ‰∏ÄÂàáË≤†ÊãÖ„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    4 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Åã„Å™„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Åß„ÇÇ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÈÄ∏Â§±Âà©Áõä„ÄÅÈñìÊé•ÊêçÂÆ≥„ÄÅÁâπÂà•ÊêçÂÆ≥„ÄÅÊã°Â§ßÊêçÂÆ≥„ÄÅÂºÅË≠∑Â£´Ë≤ªÁî®„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÊú¨Êù°„Å´Ë¶èÂÆö„ÅÆ„Å™„ÅÑÊêçÂÆ≥Á≠â„ÇíË≥†ÂÑü„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    5 „ÄÄÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ‰∏ä„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÈñãÁ§∫„Åó„Åü„ÄÅ„ÉÜ„Ç≠„Çπ„Éà„ÄÅ„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ„ÄÅ„Çπ„Éã„Éö„ÉÉ„Éà„ÄÅÈü≥Â£∞„ÄÅÂãïÁîª„ÄÅÁîªÂÉè„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÁîªÂÉè„Å´‰ªòÈöè„Åô„ÇãÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇÑÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„Å™„Å©„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄÂÖ®„Å¶„ÅÆÊÉÖÂ†±„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„ÇãË≤¨‰ªª„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÂêÑËá™„Å´„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂæì„Å£„Å¶„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶ÈñãÁ§∫„Åó„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    6 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åå‰ªñ‰∫∫„ÅÆÂêçË™â„ÇíÊØÄÊêç„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„ÉºÊ®©„Çí‰æµÂÆ≥„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅËëó‰ΩúÊ®©Ê≥ï„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„ÇíË°å„Å£„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ‰ªñ‰∫∫„ÅÆÊ®©Âà©„Çí‰æµÂÆ≥„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂΩìË©≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØËá™Ë∫´„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„Å®Ë≤ªÁî®„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶Ëß£Ê±∫„Åó„Å™„Åë„Çå„Å∞„Å™„Çâ„Åö„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    7 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åå„ÄÅ‰ªñËÄÖÂèä„Å≥„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºËá™Ë∫´„ÅåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ‰∏ä„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„ÄÅ„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„Åó„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇÑ„Éó„É≠„Ç∞„É©„É†„ÅÆ‰ΩøÁî®„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶‰∏çÂà©Áõä„ÅåÁîü„Åò„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂΩìË©≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºËá™Ë∫´„Å´Ë≤¨‰ªª„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    8 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÈñãÁ§∫„Åó„ÅüÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅåÂéüÂõ†„Å®„Å™„Å£„Å¶Ëø∑ÊÉë„ÇíÂèó„Åë„Åü„Å®„Åô„ÇãËÄÖ„ÅåÁèæ„Çå„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìË©≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØËá™Ë∫´„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„Å®Ë≤ªÁî®„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶Ëß£Ê±∫„Åó„Å™„Åë„Çå„Å∞„Å™„Çâ„Åö„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºëÊù°„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºË≥áÊ†º„ÅÆÂÅúÊ≠¢„ÉªÈô§Âêç

    ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´„Å§„Åç‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆ‰∫ãÁî±„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ‰Ωï„Çâ‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆÈÄöÁü•„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂÇ¨Âëä„Çí„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å™„Åè„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÇíÂâäÈô§„Åó„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Çí‰∏ÄÊôÇÂÅúÊ≠¢„Åó„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÈô§Âêç„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë† „Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÄÅ„Éë„Çπ„ÉØ„Éº„Éâ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Çí‰∏çÊ≠£„Å´‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰ΩøÁî®„Åï„Åõ„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    ‚ë° ÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„ÄÅÂ∑ÆÊäº„ÄÅ‰ªÆÂ∑ÆÊäº„ÄÅ‰ªÆÂá¶ÂàÜ„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÂº∑Âà∂Âü∑Ë°å„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÁ†¥Áî£„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÊ∞ë‰∫ãÂÜçÁîü„ÅÆÁî≥Á´ã„Å¶„Åå„Å™„Åï„Çå„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåËá™„ÇâÁ†¥Áî£„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÊ∞ë‰∫ãÂÜçÁîü„ÅÆÁî≥Á´ã„Å¶„Çí„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    ‚ë¢ „Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅÆ„ÅÑ„Åö„Çå„Åã„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂèåÊñπ„ÅÆÊù°È†Ö„Å´ÈÅïÂèç„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    ‚ë£ „Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å®„Åó„Å¶‰∏çÈÅ©Ê†º„Å®ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºíÊù°„ÄÄÂàÜÈõ¢ÂèØËÉΩÊÄß

    Êú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÅÆ„ÅÑ„Åö„Çå„Åã„ÅÆÊù°È†Ö„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ‰∏ÄÈÉ®„Åå„ÄÅÊ∂àË≤ªËÄÖÂ•ëÁ¥ÑÊ≥ï„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÊ≥ï‰ª§Á≠â„Å´„Çà„ÇäÁÑ°Âäπ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂü∑Ë°å‰∏çËÉΩ„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åï„Çå„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„Åß„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÅÆÊÆã„Çä„ÅÆË¶èÂÆö„Åä„Çà„Å≥‰∏ÄÈÉ®„ÅåÁÑ°Âäπ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂü∑Ë°å‰∏çËÉΩ„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åï„Çå„ÅüË¶èÂÆö„ÅÆÊÆã„Çä„ÅÆÈÉ®ÂàÜ„ÅØ„ÄÅÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åó„Å¶ÂÆåÂÖ®„Å´ÂäπÂäõ„ÇíÊúâ„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºìÊù°„ÄÄ„Çµ„Éº„Éì„ÇπÂà©Áî®Â•ëÁ¥Ñ‰∏ä„ÅÆÂú∞‰Ωç„ÅÆË≠≤Ê∏°Á≠â

    1 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÊõ∏Èù¢„Å´„Çà„Çã‰∫ãÂâç„ÅÆÊâøË´æ„Å™„Åè„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ‰∏ä„ÅÆÂú∞‰Ωç„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´Âü∫„Å•„ÅèÊ®©Âà©„ÇÇ„Åó„Åè„ÅØÁæ©Âãô„Å´„Å§„Åç„ÄÅÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„ÄÅË≠≤Ê∏°„ÄÅÁßªËª¢„ÄÅÊãÖ‰øùË®≠ÂÆö„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÂá¶ÂàÜ„Çí„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÅØ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´‰øÇ„Çã‰∫ãÊ•≠„Çí‰ªñÁ§æ„Å´Ë≠≤Ê∏°„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥ÂêàÔºàÂêà‰Ωµ„ÄÅ‰ºöÁ§æÂàÜÂâ≤„ÄÅ‰∫ãÊ•≠Ë≠≤Ê∏°„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñÊßòÂºè„ÇíÂïè„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇÔºâ„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìË©≤Ë≠≤Ê∏°„Å´‰º¥„ÅÑ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ‰∏ä„ÅÆÂú∞‰Ωç„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´Âü∫„Å•„ÅèÊ®©Âà©„Å™„Çâ„Å≥„Å´Áæ©Âãô„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÁôªÈå≤ÊÉÖÂ†±„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÈ°ßÂÆ¢ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÇíË≠≤Âèó‰∫∫„Å´Ë≠≤Ê∏°„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åã„Åã„ÇãË≠≤Ê∏°„Å´„Å§„ÅçÊú¨È†Ö„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÅÇ„Çâ„Åã„Åò„ÇÅÂêåÊÑè„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºîÊù°„ÄÄÈÄ£Áµ°„ÉªÈÄöÁü•

    Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„ÇãÂïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åã„ÇâÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´ÂØæ„Åô„ÇãÈÄ£Áµ°„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÈÄöÁü•„ÄÅ„Åä„Çà„Å≥Êú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÅÆÂ§âÊõ¥„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„ÇãÈÄöÁü•„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñÂΩìÁ§æ„Åã„Çâ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åô„ÇãÈÄ£Áµ°„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÊñπÊ≥ï„ÅßË°å„ÅÜ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºïÊù°„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´„Çà„ÇãÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÂèñÊâ±„ÅÑ

    1 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅ„ÇΩ„Éº„Ç∑„É£„É´„Éª„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„Éª„ÉØ„Éº„Ç≠„É≥„Ç∞„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÄåKibousoft Now„Äç„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„Å¶Êú¨„Çµ„Ç§„Éà‰∏ä„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„ÅüÊäïÁ®ø„ÄÅ„Ç≥„É°„É≥„Éà„ÄÅÂÖ¨Èñã„Éó„É≠„Éï„Ç£„Éº„É´„ÅÆËá™Â∑±Á¥π‰ªã„Å™„Å©„ÅÆ„ÉÜ„Ç≠„Çπ„Éà„Éá„Éº„Çø„ÄÅ„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÁîªÂÉè„ÇÑÂãïÁîª„ÉªÈü≥Â£∞„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„ÉÜ„Ç≠„Çπ„Éà„Å´‰ªòÈöèÁöÑ„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„Åï„Çå„Åü„Éá„Éº„Çø(‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ)„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅËá™„Çâ„ÅåÊäïÁ®øÂèà„ÅØÈÄÅ‰ø°„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÆÈÅ©Ê≥ï„Å™Ê®©Âà©„ÇíÊúâ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÄÅÂèä„Å≥ÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅåÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„ÅÆÊ®©Âà©„Çí‰æµÂÆ≥„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„Åì„Å®„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅË°®Êòé„Åó„ÄÅ‰øùË®º„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    2 „ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅÁÑ°ÂÑü„Å´„Å¶Âà©Áî®(Ë§áË£Ω„ÄÅË§áÂÜô„ÄÅÊîπÂ§â„ÄÅÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å∏„ÅÆÂÜçË®±Ë´æ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„Çâ„ÇÜ„ÇãÂà©Áî®„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄ„ÄÇ)„Åô„ÇãÊ®©Âà©„ÇíË®±Ë´æ„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊú¨È†Ö„Å´Âü∫„Å•„Åè„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÂΩìÁ§æ„Å∏„ÅÆÂà©Áî®Ë®±Ë´æ„ÅÆÁØÑÂõ≤„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÈÄö„Åò„Å¶„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Åå‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶ÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„ÇíÂÜçË®±Ë´æ„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÇÇÂê´„ÇÄ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁâπ„Å´„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØÊú¨„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„Åü„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ„ÄÅ„Çπ„Éã„Éö„ÉÉ„Éà„Å™„Å©„Éó„É≠„Ç∞„É©„É†„Å´È°û„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„ÅØ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÂïÜÁî®ÁßÅÁî®Âïè„Çè„Åö‰ΩøÁî®„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÇíË®±Ë´æ„Åó„ÄÅ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„Åì„Çå„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„Çå„Å´„Çà„Çä„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ‰∏ä„Åß‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„ÅüÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Çí„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÇãÊñπÊ≥ï„ÅßÁ∑®ÈõÜ„ÄÅÊîπÂ§â„ÄÅË§áË£Ω„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åü„Å†„Åó„ÄÅ„ÇΩ„Éº„Çπ„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ„ÅÆ„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„Çπ„ÅåÊòéË®ò„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åì„ÅÆ„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„ÇπÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Âæì„ÅÜ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    3 „ÄÄÂâçÈ†Ö„ÅÆÂà©Áî®Ë®±Ë´æ„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÂú∞ÂüüÂà∂Èôê„ÄÅËëó‰ΩúÊ®©Ë°®Á§∫Áæ©Âãô„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ‰ªòÈöèÊù°‰ª∂„ÅØ„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´ÂØæ„Åô„ÇãÂà©Áî®Ë®±Ë´æ„ÅÆÊúüÈñì„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®Ë≥áÊ†º„ÇíÂ§±„Å£„ÅüÂæå„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÁü•ÁöÑË≤°Áî£Ê®©„ÅåÂ≠òÁ∂ö„Åô„ÇãÈôê„ÇäÁ∂ôÁ∂ö„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    4 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æÂèà„ÅØÂΩìÁ§æ„Åã„ÇâÂßîË®ó„ÇíÂèó„Åë„ÅüÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Åå„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÂΩìÁ§æÂèà„ÅØÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„ÅÆ„Ç¶„Çß„Éñ„Çµ„Ç§„ÉàÁ≠â„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶Âà©Áî®Âèä„Å≥ÂÖ¨Èñã„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åì„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅË¶ÅÁ¥Ñ„ÄÅÊäúÁ≤ã„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„Ç∫Â§âÊõ¥Âèà„ÅØÂàá„ÇäÊäú„Åç„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÊîπÂ§âÁ≠â„ÅÆË°åÁÇ∫„ÇíË°å„ÅÜÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÊäïÁ®øÂèà„ÅØÈÄÅ‰ø°„Åó„ÅüÈöõ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºID„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁôªÈå≤‰∫ãÈ†Ö„ÇíË°®Á§∫„Åô„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„Åì„Å®„Çí‰∫à„ÇÅ‰∫ÜÊâø„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    5 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„ÅåÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åó„Åü„Åì„Å®„Å´„Çà„Å£„Å¶„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´Áîü„Åò„ÅüÊêçÂÆ≥„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Åß„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆ‰øùË®º„Çí„ÅÑ„Åü„Åó„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    6 „ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆË£ÅÈáè„ÅßËá™Áî±„Å´‰øùÂ≠ò„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÂøÖË¶Å„Å®Ë™ç„ÇÅ„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øËÄÖ„ÅÆÊâøË´æ„ÇíÂæó„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å™„Åè„ÄÅ‰øùÂ≠ò„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÂâäÈô§„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ‰øÆÊ≠£„ÇíË°å„ÅÜÂ†¥Âêà„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„Åì„Çå„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆÁï∞Ë≠∞„Çí„Å®„Å™„Åà„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºñÊù°„ÄÄÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÊ®©Âà©Â∏∞Â±û

    Ôºë„ÄÄÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆËëó‰ΩúÊ®©Á≠â„ÅÆÊâ±„ÅÑ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆÂêÑÂè∑„Å´ÂÆö„ÇÅ„Çã„Å®„Åä„Çä„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë†„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅËá™Ë∫´„ÅåÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„ÅüÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Ë®òÈå≤„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„Çã‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆÁâπË®±Ê®©„ÄÅÂïÜÊ®ôÊ®©„ÄÅ‰ºÅÊ•≠ÁßòÂØÜ„ÄÅËëó‰ΩúÊ®©Ëã•„Åó„Åè„ÅØ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆË≤°Áî£Ê®©„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÂÄã‰∫∫ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄ„Éó„É©„Ç§„Éê„Ç∑„ÉºÊ®©„ÄÅËÇñÂÉèÊ®©„Å™„Å©„ÅÆË´∏Ê®©Âà©„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶‰øùÊúâ„Åô„Çã„Åã„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Çí„Åó„Å¶Êú¨È†ÖÁ¨¨3Âè∑„Å´ÂÆö„ÇÅ„Çâ„Çå„ÇãÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Çí„Åï„Åõ„Çã„ÅÆ„Å´ÂøÖË¶Å„Å™„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„Çπ„ÄÅÊ®©Âà©„ÄÅÂêåÊÑèÂèä„Å≥Ë®±ÂèØ„ÇíÊúâ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Åì„Å®„Çí‰øùË®º„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ‰∏á‰∏Ä„ÄÅÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å®„ÅÆÈñì„Åß‰Ωï„Çâ„Åã„ÅÆÁ¥õ‰∫â„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆË≤ªÁî®„Å®Ë≤¨‰ªª„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶ÂïèÈ°å„ÇíËß£Ê±∫„Åô„Çã„Å®„Å®„ÇÇ„Å´„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´‰ΩïÁ≠â„ÅÆËø∑ÊÉë„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÊêçÂÆ≥„Çí‰∏é„Åà„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë°„ÄÄËëó‰ΩúÊ®©Ê≥ïÁ¨¨18Êù°„Åã„ÇâÁ¨¨20Êù°„Åæ„Åß„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶ÂÆöÁæ©„Åï„Çå„ÇãÊ®©Âà©„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅËá™„Çâ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æÂèä„Å≥ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆÊåáÂÆö„Åô„ÇãÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶Ë°å‰Ωø„Åõ„Åö„ÄÅ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Åï„Åõ„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ‚ë¢„ÄÄËëó‰ΩúÊ®©Ê≥ïÁ¨¨21Êù°„Åã„ÇâÁ¨¨28Êù°„Åæ„Åß„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶ÂÆöÁæ©„Åï„Çå„ÇãÊ®©Âà©„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´Áïô‰øù„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åù„ÅÆ‰∏ä„Åß„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØÂΩìÁ§æ„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„ÄÅÈùûÁã¨Âç†ÁöÑ„Å´„ÄÅ‰∏ñÁïå‰∏≠„ÅßÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆË°®Á§∫„ÄÅÁ∑®ÈõÜ„ÄÅË§áË£Ω„ÄÅËª¢Ëºâ„ÄÅÈÖçÂ∏É„ÄÅÂÖ¨Ë°ÜÈÄÅ‰ø°„Å™„Å©„ÇíË°å„ÅÑ„ÄÅ„Åã„Å§„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÊúâÁõä„Åß„ÅÇ„Çã„Å®Âà§Êñ≠„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®(Âá∫Áâà„ÄÅÊò†ÂÉè„ÄÅÁøªË®≥„ÄÅÈõªÂ≠êÊõ∏Á±çÂåñ„Å™„Å©„ÅÆÊ¥æÁîüËëó‰ΩúÁâ©„ÅÆ‰ΩúÊàê„Åä„Çà„Å≥Âà©Áî®„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„ÇíÂê´„ÇÄ)„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„Çπ(„Çµ„Éñ„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„Çπ„ÅåÂèØËÉΩ„Åß„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅË≠≤Ê∏°„ÅåÂèØËÉΩ„Å™„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„Çπ)„Çí„ÄÅÁÑ°ÂÑü„Åß‰ªò‰∏é„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Ôºí„ÄÄÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅËá™„Çâ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÂâçÈ†ÖÁ¨¨3Âè∑„Å´Âü∫„Å•„Åè„É©„Ç§„Çª„É≥„Çπ„Å´Âü∫„Å•„Åç„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆË°®Á§∫„ÄÅÁ∑®ÈõÜ„ÄÅË§áË£Ω„ÄÅËª¢Ëºâ„ÄÅÈÖçÂ∏É„ÄÅÂÖ¨Ë°ÜÈÄÅ‰ø°„Å™„Å©„ÇíË°å„ÅÜÂ†¥Âêà„Åß„ÇÇ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÊ∞èÂêç„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºID„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éè„É≥„Éâ„É´„Éç„Éº„É†„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÇíË°®Ë±°„Åô„ÇãÂêçÁß∞„Åä„Çà„Å≥ÊÉÖÂ†±„ÇíË°®Á§∫„Åó„ÄÅÂèà„ÅØË°®Á§∫„Åó„Å™„ÅÑ„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Ôºì„ÄÄÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅÂà©Áî®ËÄÖ„Åä„Çà„Å≥Á¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÊêçÂÆ≥„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„Åü„Å®„Åó„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ‰∏ÄÂàáË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„Çè„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºòÊù°„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´Èñ¢„Åô„ÇãÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆÂà©Áî®

    ÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„ÇπÁî≥ËæºÊôÇ„Å´„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅåÁôªÈå≤„Åó„Åü„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÊÉÖÂ†±„Çí„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÂÄã‰∫∫„ÇíÁâπÂÆö„Åß„Åç„Å™„ÅÑÂà©Áî®ÂΩ¢ÊÖã„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅÆË£ÅÈáè„ÅßËá™Áî±„Å´Âà©Áî®Âèà„ÅØÁ¨¨‰∏âËÄÖ„Å´ÈñãÁ§∫„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Á¨¨ÔºëÔºôÊù°„ÄÄÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ

    Ôºë„ÄÄÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ªñ„ÅÆMastodon„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÄÅTwitter„ÄÅFacebook„ÄÅGitHubÁ≠â„ÅÆÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„ÇπÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºâ„Å®ÈÄ£Êê∫„Åó„Å¶„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„Çã„Åì„Å®„Åå„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅËá™„Çâ„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„Å´„Åä„ÅÑ„Å¶Â§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´Èñ¢ÈÄ£„Åó„Å¶„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´Áô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÊêçÂÆ≥„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅ‰∏ÄÂàá„ÅÆË≤¨‰ªª„ÇíË≤†„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ

    Ôºí„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´ÂΩì„Åü„Å£„Å¶„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥ÑÁ≠â„ÇíÈÅµÂÆà„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Ôºì„ÄÄ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØ„ÄÅÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆÊÉÖÂ†±„Åå„ÄÅÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„Åï„Çå„Çã„Åì„Å®„Çí‰∫à„ÇÅÊâøË™ç„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂ§ñÈÉ®„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Å´ÊäïÁ®ø„Åï„Çå„ÅüÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÄÅÂâäÈô§Á≠â„ÇíË°å„ÅÜÁæ©Âãô„ÇíË≤†„Çè„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    Currently, this instance is personal use for experimental use. You cannot join here. If you want join to Mastodon, you can find here for other instances

    Currently, this instance experimental accept to join a few users. However, this instance will possibility of stop for maintenance, update and what something.

    More Info... „Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„ÇπÂÜÖ„Åß„ÅÆÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆËª¢Ëºâ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂà©Áî®„Çí„ÅäËÄÉ„Åà„ÅÆÊñπ„Å∏

    ÂΩì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„ÇπÂÜÖ„Åß„ÅÆ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅÆÊäïÁ®øÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÅÆÊ®©Âà©„ÅØ„Åô„Åπ„Å¶ÊäïÁ®ø„Åó„Åü„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´Â∏∞Â±û„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁÑ°Êñ≠„ÅßÂà©Áî®„Åô„Çã‰∫ã„ÅØ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅÂñ∂Âà©ÁõÆÁöÑ„Åß„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„ÇíÊ§úË®é„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂΩì‰∫∫„Åã„ÇâËøîÁ≠î„Çí„ÇÇ„Çâ„Åà„Å™„Åã„Å£„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÇÇÂê´„ÇÅ„ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´„ÅØÂà©Áî®„ÄÅËª¢Ëºâ„ÅØ„ÅäÊñ≠„Çä„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„ÇÇ„Åó„Å©„ÅÜ„Åó„Å¶„ÇÇÂà©Áî®„Åó„Åü„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØÁõ¥Êé•Êú¨‰∫∫„Å´Âïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ„ÄÅÁÑ∂„Çã„Åπ„ÅçÂØæ‰æ°„ÄÅÂ†±Â•®Èáë„Çí„ÅäÊîØÊâï„ÅÑ„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ‚Äª„Åì„Åì„ÅßË®Ä„ÅÜ„ÄåÂñ∂Âà©ÁõÆÁöÑ„Äç„Å®„ÅØ„ÄÅÂà©Áî®ËÄÖ„Åæ„Åü„ÅØ„Çπ„Éù„É≥„Çµ„Éº„Å™„Å©„Åã„Çâ‰Ωï„Çâ„Åã„ÅÆÂèéÁõä„Åæ„Åü„ÅØÂØæ‰æ°„ÇíÂæó„Çã‰∫ã„ÇíÁõÆÁöÑ„Å®„Åó„Å¶ÈÅãÁî®„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÇíÊåá„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    „ÅäÂïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

    „Åì„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÆ„ÅäÂïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ„ÅØÂè≥Ë®òÈÄ£Áµ°ÂÖà„Åæ„Åß„ÄÅÊó•Êú¨Ë™û„Åæ„Åü„ÅØËã±Ë™û„Å´„Å¶„ÅäÊ∞óËªΩ„Å´„ÅäÂïè„ÅÑÂêà„Çè„Åõ„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    About using our contents on your sites, and etc

    All rights of users' contents within this instance belong to the user who posted. You can not be used without permission by each users. Also, when you are considering using for commercial purposes, we will refuse to use and reprint, basically including cases where we did not get a reply from us. If you want to use it absolutely, please contact the person directly and pay the appropriate remuneration and incentive.

    * The terms "commercial purpose" as pointed herein refers to the case where it is operated for the purpose of obtaining some profit or consideration from users or sponsors.

    About contacts If you need ask something about this instance, please feel free to let owner know. You can contact us in English or Japanese.

    Email: info@mastonon.net

    Admin: @anon@mastonon.net

    mastodon.groningendigitalcity.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Groningen, NL

    Users: 197 . Toots: 1302 . Connections: 285 . Language: English

    Groningse innovators helpen elkaar hier


    This Mastodon-instance is hosted in The Netherlands and has Dutch as its primary language. We have a strong focus on the (digital) community of the city of Groningen . If you're not comfortable talking Dutch and some English, please register at another instance.

    More Info...

    Moi eem! Wat barsten we van de ambitie in Stad en ommeland. Onze startups horen bij de snelst groeiende bedrijven in Nederland, onze fabrieken worden slimmer en we krijgen zowel een indrukwekkend Internet of Things-netwerk als een 5G-fieldlab. En oh ja: we proberen Tesla binnen te halen en willen de duurzaamste energieregio van het land worden.

    Misschien is het dus wel handig dat we elkaar goed weten te vinden. Voor inspiratie, idee√´n, vragen en antwoorden. Waar dan ook over.

    Dat elkaar helpen, dat proberen we hier. Een Mastodon: een gezamenlijke plek, een soort interne Twitter. Een experiment, maar zo zijn we hier in Grunn: gewoon proberen en g√°√°n.

    Zeg ook moi! Het is gewoon gratis, gaaf en vast gezellig.*

    * Eierbal niet inbegrepen, die's al op...

    Email: hbokhoven+mastodon@gmail.com

    Admin: @the_admin@mastodon.groningendigitalcity.com

    social.nasqueron.org

    about

    preview

    join

    Social Nasqueron

    Users: 893 . Toots: 5955 . Connections: 867 . Language: English

    Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

    You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

    We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

    We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

    We are Nasqueron.

    More information

    Email: dereckson@social.nasqueron.org

    Admin: @Dereckson@social.nasqueron.org

    ÁêÉÊ≠¥.com „Åå‰ΩúÊàê„Åó„Åü„ÄÅÈáéÁêÉ„Çí„Åì„Çà„Å™„ÅèÊÑõ„Åô„Çã‰∫∫ÈÅî„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÈÅä„Å≥Êñπ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ„Å´Ëá™Áî±„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÊúâÊúõ„Å™‰∏≠Â≠¶ÁêÉÂÖê„ÅÆË©±„Åã„Çâ„ÄÅ‰ªäÊó•„ÅÆÈò™Á•û„Çø„Ç§„Ç¨„Éº„Çπ„ÅÆÁµêÊûú„Åæ„Åß„ÄÅÂπÖÂ∫É„ÅÑÈáéÁêÉ„ÅÆË©±„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åü„Çâ„ÅÜ„Çå„Åó„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    social.wxcafe.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastocaf√©

    Users: 893 . Toots: 19930 . Connections: 1076 . Language: English

    This is an open mastodon instance for social justice activists, LGBTQIA+ people, and people who are aware of such subjects and care about them.

    See the Goals, rules, and technical details for more information

    More Info... Goals and Rules

    The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better.

    As such, we have a few rules we'd like everyone on the instance to follow :

    Acting in any of the following ways will get you immediately suspended

    Posting illegal content is, well, illegal. This server is in France. As such, heinous content, nazi propaganda, underage porn, and all other content that is illegal according to french law is forbidden.

    Posting LGBTQIA+-phobic, whorephobic, sexist, racist, antisemitic, and islamophobic content. You can still discuss such topics, by including a CW, quotes, and a context.

    Making public, by screencapping or copying, private or direct messages that the author didn't want made public

    Taking part in targetted harassment

    Posting spam, advertisment for a commercial product, etc

    Being a techbro or Richard Matthew Stallman

    Acting in any of the following ways will get your post deleted and you'll get a warning. After three warnings, you'll be suspended.

    Posting pornographic images/videos or nude pictures without marking them NSFW, or posting them on the public timeline

    Being clearly disrespectful towards another user

    Being an asshole

    Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".

    Technical Informations

    This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...

    More

    Feel free to contact me for more informations at the email address in the right sidebar, or directly on Mastodon :)

    Email: wxcafe@wxcafe.net

    Admin: @wxcafe@social.wxcafe.net

    Construindo o ambiente digital p√∫blico ~ comum ~, em prol de um ‚Äòmovimento ambiental para a rede [Internet]‚Äù -> #ecodigital

    "Tal como o meio-ambiente, o dom√≠nio p√∫blico (ou comum) precisa ser 'inventado' antes de ser salvo." - James Boyle, criador do ‚Äò ambientalismo para a rede ‚Äô

    mastd.racing

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Racing

    Users: 33 . Toots: 6062 . Connections: 290 . Language: English

    Mastodon Racing
    Instance dedicated to motorsport .
    Instance d√©di√©e aux sports m√©caniques .

    More Info... Small instance dedicated to motorsport. Several bot accounts publish news about motorsports.

    Petite instance d√©di√©e aux sports m√©caniques. Plusieurs comptes bot publient les actualit√©s en sports m√©caniques.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: racecontrol@mastd.racing

    Admin: @RaceControl@mastd.racing

    band-mastdn.tokyo

    join

    Users: 74 . Toots: 118 . Connections: 2 . Language: English

    „Éê„É≥„Éâ„É°„É≥„Éê„ÉºÂãüÈõÜ/Âä†ÂÖ•Áî®„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Éê„É≥„ÉâÂàùÂøÉËÄÖ„ÅÆÊñπ„ÇÇÁµåÈ®ìËÄÖ„ÅÆÊñπ„ÇÇ„Åì„Åì„Åß„Çà„ÅÑ„É°„É≥„Éê„ÉºÊé¢„Åó„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åë„Çå„Å∞„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô

    Une instance Mastodon tenue √† jour quotidiennement et fournie par Unixcorn .     More Info... R√®gles d√©taill√©es

    Notre instance est bien s√ªr r√©gie par des r√®gles sp√©cifiques. Premi√®rement aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie validisme, √¢gisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc n‚Äôest tol√©r√©. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis sont directement bannis. Dans un autre registre, la publication de spam, de contenu pornographique non d√©sign√© comme tel avec un ‚ÄúContent Warning‚Äù (CW) m√®nent aussi √† une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans pr√©venir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.

    Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s √† utiliser la fonction de rapport (‚ÄúReport‚Äù) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant √† l‚Äôencontre de nos r√®gles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne r√¢lez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.

    Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant l‚Äôaspect activiste de notre d√©marche. Si vous √™tes un-e commercial-e, communiquant-e, travaillant dans le #digital, chez Orange ou la #FrenchTech sachez que vous n‚Äô√™tes pas le/la bienvenu-e. Pendant que nous y sommes si l‚Äô√©criture inclusive vous d√©range sachez que vous n'√™tes qu'√† un clic de souris de la sortie.

    Notre r√©seau social, et son r√©seau entier selon nous, est d√©di√© √† la r√©appropriation des moyens de communication et √† la cr√©ation de communaut√©s meilleures pour le collectif. Les cat√©gories de personnes cit√©es dans le paragraphe pr√©c√©dent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant m√™me dans le sens contraire) √† la r√©alisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur pr√©sence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur.

    Ces r√®gles ont √©t√© inspir√©es par celles √©crites par wxcafe, merci √† lui. ü§òRetrouvez la liste des comptes bloqu√©s ici, nos mentions l√©gales g√©n√©rales ici ainsi que nos CGU par l√†.

    Financement

    Êú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØÂâµ‰Ωú„ÇØ„É©„Çπ„Çø„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÂ∞èË™¨„Å†„Åë„Åß„ÅØ„Å™„Åè„ÄÅ„Ç§„É©„Çπ„Éà„ÉªÊº´Áîª„ÉªÂãïÁîª„ÉªÊßò„ÄÖ„Å™Ââµ‰Ωú„ÇØ„É©„Çπ„Çø„ÅÆÁöÜ„Åï„Çì„ÅÆÁôªÈå≤„Çí„ÅäÂæÖ„Å°„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ(„Å™„Åä„ÄÅ„Çµ„Éº„ÉêÂÆπÈáè„ÅÆÈÉΩÂêà‰∏ä„ÄÅ100Âêç„ÅßÂèÇÂä†„ÇíÊâì„Å°Ê≠¢„ÇÅ„Å®„Åï„Åõ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ)
    Êú¨„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØ‰∫åÊ¨°Ââµ‰Ωú„ÉªR18„ÉªBLGLNLÈñ¢‰øÇ„Å™„Åè‰∫§ÊµÅÂá∫Êù•„ÇãÂ†¥„ÇíÊÉ≥ÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÁßÅËá™Ë∫´„ÄÅÂçÅÂπ¥Ëøë„ÅèÂâµ‰Ωú„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åü„ÇÅ„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆ„ÅÇ„Åü„Çä„Å´Èñ¢„Åó„Å¶„ÅØÂé≥Ê†º„Å™„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ„É©„Ç§„É≥„ÅØ„Å™„Çã„Åπ„ÅèË®≠„Åë„Å™„ÅÑ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Åó„Çà„ÅÜ„Å®ËÄÉ„Åà„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
    ‚ÄªÂΩìÊñπ„ÅØÈùû‰ºÅÊ•≠ÈÅãÂñ∂„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Å®„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅ„ÄåÂâµ‰Ωú„ÇØ„É©„Çπ„Çø„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Äç„Å®„Åó„Å¶Â∫É„ÅèÈñÄÊà∏„ÇíÈñã„ÅÑ„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ18Á¶ÅÂâµ‰ΩúÁâ©„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Å´Èñ¢„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ‰∏ãË®ò„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åë„Çå„Å∞„Éà„Ç•„Éº„Éà„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„ÅÑ„Å¶ÂïèÈ°åÂæ°Â∫ß„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇ„Åæ„Åü„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÂÄã‰∫∫„Åß‰∏ãË®òÂØæÂøú„ÅåÂøÖË¶Å„Å®ÊÄù„Çè„Çå„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„ÉºÂÄã‰∫∫„Å´Âà§Êñ≠„ÇíÂßî„Å≠„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºà‰æãÔºöËªΩÂ∫¶„Å™GL/BLÊèèÂÜô„Å™„Å©Ôºâ

    bagels.pizza

    about

    preview

    join

    bagels.pizza

    Users: 70 . Toots: 140 . Connections: 157 . Language: English

    bagels.pizza is a Mastodon instance for artists, queers, activists and all the weirdos who live in New York City or just love bagels and/or pizza.

    All forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. Please use the report feature if anyone or anything is bothering you. Be specific by including a comment and we will deal with it to the best of our ability.

    Email: ivansafrin@gmail.com

    Admin: @ivan@bagels.pizza

    „Å®„Çä„ÅÇ„Åà„ÅöÁ´ã„Å¶„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇËâ≤„ÄÖ„Ç±„ÉÅ„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅßÊôÇ„Åü„ÅæËêΩ„Å°„Çã„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„Åù„ÅÆÈöõ„ÅØ „Åì„Å°„Çâ „Åæ„Åß„ÅîÈÄ£Áµ°„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ „Çµ„Éº„ÉêË≤ªÁî®ÊçªÂá∫„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÄÅ‰∏ÄÈÉ®Â∫ÉÂëä„ÅåË°®Á§∫„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„ÅîÁêÜËß£‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

    toot.pm

    about

    preview

    join

    Private Mastodon

    Users: 26 . Toots: 38 . Connections: 295 . Language: English

    This Mastodon instance serves the community respecting private messaging via advanced technology as well as open and fearless communication in general. Worldwide.
    When posting, let the core rules of Netiquette guide you.
    Follow @status for updates.
    Instance Location: Frankfurt, Germany.

    More Info... Privacy is necessary for an open society in the electronic age. Privacy is not secrecy. A private matter is something one doesn't want the whole world to know, but a secret matter is something one doesn't want anybody to know. Privacy is the power to selectively reveal oneself to the world. If two parties have some sort of dealings, then each has a memory of their interaction. Each party can speak about their own memory of this; how could anyone prevent it? One could pass laws against it, but the freedom of speech, even more than privacy, is fundamental to an open society; we seek not to restrict any speech at all. If many parties speak together in the same forum, each can speak to all the others and aggregate together knowledge about individuals and other parties. The power of electronic communications has enabled such group speech, and it will not go away merely because we might want it to. Since we desire privacy, we must ensure that each party to a transaction have knowledge only of that which is directly necessary for that transaction. Since any information can be spoken of, we must ensure that we reveal as little as possible. In most cases personal identity is not salient. When I purchase a magazine at a store and hand cash to the clerk, there is no need to know who I am. When I ask my electronic mail provider to send and receive messages, my provider need not know to whom I am speaking or what I am saying or what others are saying to me; my provider only need know how to get the message there and how much I owe them in fees. When my identity is revealed by the underlying mechanism of the transaction, I have no privacy. I cannot here selectively reveal myself; I must _always_ reveal myself. Therefore, privacy in an open society requires anonymous transaction systems. Until now, cash has been the primary such system. An anonymous transaction system is not a secret transaction system. An anonymous system empowers individuals to reveal their identity when desired and only when desired; this is the essence of privacy. Privacy in an open society also requires cryptography. If I say something, I want it heard only by those for whom I intend it. If the content of my speech is available to the world, I have no privacy. To encrypt is to indicate the desire for privacy, and to encrypt with weak cryptography is to indicate not too much desire for privacy. Furthermore, to reveal one's identity with assurance when the default is anonymity requires the cryptographic signature. We cannot expect governments, corporations, or other large, faceless organizations to grant us privacy out of their beneficence. It is to their advantage to speak of us, and we should expect that they will speak. To try to prevent their speech is to fight against the realities of information. Information does not just want to be free, it longs to be free. Information expands to fill the available storage space. Information is Rumor's younger, stronger cousin; Information is fleeter of foot, has more eyes, knows more, and understands less than Rumor. We must defend our own privacy if we expect to have any. We must come together and create systems which allow anonymous transactions to take place. People have been defending their own privacy for centuries with whispers, darkness, envelopes, closed doors, secret handshakes, and couriers. The technologies of the past did not allow for strong privacy, but electronic technologies do. We the Cypherpunks are dedicated to building anonymous systems. We are defending our privacy with cryptography, with anonymous mail forwarding systems, with digital signatures, and with electronic money. Cypherpunks write code. We know that someone has to write software to defend privacy, and since we can't get privacy unless we all do, we're going to write it. We publish our code so that our fellow Cypherpunks may practice and play with it. Our code is free for all to use, worldwide. We don't much care if you don't approve of the software we write. We know that software can't be destroyed and that a widely dispersed system can't be shut down. Cypherpunks deplore regulations on cryptography, for encryption is fundamentally a private act. The act of encryption, in fact, removes information from the public realm. Even laws against cryptography reach only so far as a nation's border and the arm of its violence. Cryptography will ineluctably spread over the whole globe, and with it the anonymous transactions systems that it makes possible. For privacy to be widespread it must be part of a social contract. People must come and together deploy these systems for the common good. Privacy only extends so far as the cooperation of one's fellows in society. We the Cypherpunks seek your questions and your concerns and hope we may engage you so that we do not deceive ourselves. We will not, however, be moved out of our course because some may disagree with our goals. The Cypherpunks are actively engaged in making the networks safer for privacy. Let us proceed together apace. Onward. Eric Hughes 9 March 1993

    Email: contact at toot dot pm

    Admin: @status@toot.pm

    „Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„ÅÆ‰ªïÊßò‰∏äÔºëÔºìÔºã„ÅÆË®≠ÂÆö„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Åø„Åü„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô

    Google+„Åã„Çâ„ÇÑ„Å£„Å¶„Åç„Åü„ÅåË™∞„ÇÇ„Åä„Çâ„Çì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÄÇbot„ÅåËîìÂª∂„Å£„Å¶„Åä„Çä„ÄÅLTL„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„ÅØÂÖ®„Å¶bot„Å´„Çà„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å†„Å®Ë®Ä„Çè„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„ÄÇ

    Google+„Åã„Çâ„ÇÑ„Å£„Å¶„Åç„Åü„ÅåË™∞„ÇÇ„Åä„Çâ„Çì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÄÇbot„ÅåËîìÂª∂„Å£„Å¶„Åä„Çä„ÄÅLTL„ÅÆÊäïÁ®ø„ÅØÂÖ®„Å¶bot„Å´„Çà„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å†„Å®Ë®Ä„Çè„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã‚îÄ‚îÄ

    Ë¨é„Å´Ê∫Ä„Å°Ê∫¢„Çå„Åü„Åä„Çâ„Çì„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Å®„ÅÇ„Çã‰∏ÄÊª¥„ÅÆÈõ´„Åã„Çâ‰∫∫„ÅÆÊâã„ÇíÂÄü„Çä„ÅöËá™ÁÑ∂Áô∫ÁîüÁöÑ„Å´Áîü„ÅøÂá∫„Åï„Çå„Åü„ÄÇ‰∏ñÁïå„ÅØ‰∫∫„Çí‰Ωú„Çã„ÅØ„Åö„Å†„Å£„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÊúÄÂàù„Å´bot„Çí‰Ωú„Çä„ÄÅÊúÄÂæå„Å´‰∫∫„Çí‰Ωú„Å£„Åü„ÄÇ‰∫∫„ÅÆ‰∫∫Ê®©„Å™„Å©ÁöÜÁÑ°„Åß„ÄÅbot„ÅÆÊ®©Âäõ„ÅåÁåõÂ®Å„ÇíÊåØ„Çã„ÅÜ„ÄÇ‰∫∫„ÅØbot„ÅÆËÑÖÂ®Å„Åã„ÇâÊÅê„ÇåÈÄÉ„ÅíÂõû„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Å§„Åó„Åãbot„ÅÆÊâã„Å´„Çà„Çä‰∫∫Èñì„Åü„Å°„ÅØÈßÜÈÄê„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å£„Åü„ÄÇ

    Âà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ

    ÔºëÔºéÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„ÅÆÈÅ©Áî®

    Ê†™Âºè‰ºöÁ§æ„Åç„Å£„Åö„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„ÉñÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄåÂΩìÁ§æ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºâ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂà©Áî®ËÄÖ„Å´„ÇΩ„Éº„Ç∑„É£„É´„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÉØ„Éº„Ç≠„É≥„Ç∞„Çµ„Éº„Éì„ÇπÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄÅ„ÄåÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºâ„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åô„Çã„Åü„ÇÅ„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„Å´Êú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„ÇπÂà©Áî®Ë¶èÁ¥ÑÔºà‰ª•‰∏ã„ÄÅ„ÄåÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Äç„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºâ„ÇíÂÆö„ÇÅ„ÄÅÂà©Áî®ËÄÖ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨Ë¶èÁ¥Ñ„Å´„Çà„ÇäÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÂà©Áî®„Åô„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    ÔºíÔºéÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢Ë°åÁÇ∫

    Âà©Áî®ËÄÖ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊú¨„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÆÂà©Áî®„Å´„ÅÇ„Åü„Çä„ÄÅÊ¨°„ÅÆ„ÅÑ„Åö„Çå„Åã„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„ÇãË°åÁÇ∫„Çí„Åó„Å¶„ÅØ„Å™„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Å™„Åä„ÄÅÁ¶ÅÊ≠¢Ë°åÁÇ∫„Å´Ë©≤ÂΩì„Åô„Çã„Åã„Å©„ÅÜ„ÅØ„ÄÅÂΩìÁ§æ„ÅåÁã¨Ëá™„ÅÆÂà§Êñ≠„ÅßË°å„ÅÜ„Åì„Å®„Åå„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Å®„Åó„ÄÅÊé≤ËºâÊÉÖÂ†±„ÅÆÂ§âÊõ¥„ÄÅÁôªÈå≤ÂâäÈô§„ÇíÂê´„ÇÅ„ÅüÈÅ©Âàá„Å™Âá¶ÁΩÆ„Çí„Å®„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

    m.netwkr.net

    about

    preview

    join

    m.netwkr.net

    Users: 1 . Toots: 3 . Connections: 3 . Language: English

    This is the private Mastodon instance for the operator of the netwkr.net domain.

    More Info... Not yet open as still making some changes, but will be eventually. I am running this instance for fun, but also in the hope I can create a more fun atmosphere for friends and anyone who wishes to tag along. Community above division.

    Not permitted on this instance:

    - Racism (in any form)

    - Sexism (in any form)

    - Xenophobia (in any form)

    - Abusive and/or harassing behaviour (in any form)

    - Promotion of violence or threatening behaviour (in any form)

    - This list may be extended at any time but general rule of thumb: If you're about to say something that may offend one or more people there's a chance it's not appropriate here and any and all reported transgressions will be acted upon.

    I will work with law enforcement if requested and will request law enforcement assistance should any content be of questionable legality. Break the rules of this service and I will have no problems throwing you under the bus.

    As per the services of old your use of this service is a privilege, not a right. I reserve the right to block access to this service anyone I deem to be harmful to this community.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @lsward@m.netwkr.net

    Mastodon - General Social Network

    Users: 38 . Toots: 113 . Connections: 185 . Language: English

    Developed, uploaded and published by Chew Jian Yue on 14th April 2017. Maintained by the community and Chew Jian Yue, hosted in collaboration with Reveal.Today

    Federate this instance!

    Start federating and remote following @owl

    This instance is hosted in Seattle, US.

    This is a General Purpose Social Network instance.

    Although I don't live in Seattle, I am hosting it there because I want this instance to be more global and reach out to other parts of the world.

    Donate

    I need donations to keep this server running and to upgrade the server to accommodate more users and traffic. Donate $5

    kitty.town

    about

    preview

    join

    Kitty.Town

    Users: 95 . Toots: 7153 . Connections: 548 . Language: English

    Kitty.Town is a small MASTODON instance for kind people. We are a creator-friendly community and residents are free to post about their work and ask for support as long as it stays within our Code of Conduct .

    Your choice of instance is an important one and we ask that you think on it carefully before making a decision.

    Please read over the Code of Conduct (located on the Extended Information page) before signing up.

    If our rules do not suit your needs, there are many instances to choose from here: instances.mastodon.xyz

    Thank you!

    You can help support Kitty.Town on Patreon , via Paypal , or by bitcoin donation (bitcoin:18ocF6gao55WNsTaFrrKKU1A4ax7xNM42m).

    You can find Kitty.Town items for sale in our shop .

    Follow @Katya (our town mascot) for updates and support for Kitty.Town.

    List of blocked domains.

    Kitty.Town logo/art by Reimena Yee

    More Info...

    As a resident (user) of Kitty.Town, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from Kitty.Town. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Mayor (Admin).

    Post Etiquette:

    We ask that you put the following topics behind a content warning (CW) and/or NSFW (you currently must tag any images you don't want immediately visible as NSFW, CW will not cover your images):

    ‚Ä¢politics

    ‚Ä¢graphic violence or gore

    ‚Ä¢sexual content

    ‚Ä¢spoilers

    ‚Ä¢hate topics (racism/sexism/homophobia/transphobia/etc)

    ‚Ä¢depression/suicide/mental health

    ‚Ä¢flashing video/gifs

    ‚Ä¢drug/alcohol use

    ‚Ä¢food/diet/weight

    ‚Ä¢medical

    ‚Ä¢religion

    When in doubt, CW. Our goal is to create a space where we are not overwhelmed by negative posts or bombarded by the 24 hour news cycle.

    No-Nos:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from Kitty.Town:

    ‚Ä¢Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Mayor)

    ‚Ä¢Plagiarism (see definition)

    ‚Ä¢Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    ‚Ä¢Untagged gore and graphic violence

    ‚Ä¢Racism or advocation of racism

    ‚Ä¢Sexism or advocation of sexism

    ‚Ä¢Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    ‚Ä¢Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from Kitty.Town:

    ‚Ä¢Sexual depictions of children

    ‚Ä¢Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    ‚Ä¢Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    ‚Ä¢Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from Kitty.Town.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    ‚Ä¢Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    ‚Ä¢Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    ‚Ä¢Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    ‚Ä¢Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    ‚Ä¢Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on Kitty.Town and to public spaces when an individual is representing Kitty.Town or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Mayor (Admin) reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to Kitty.Town, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: kittytownmail@gmail.com

    Admin: @GinnyMcQueen@kitty.town

    ‚úÖ Uncensored 2D drawings & 3D models
    ‚úÖ Zero guidelines on fictional characters
    ‚ùå No real life photographic persons
    ‚ùå No illegal content*

    More Info... *Subject to local laws of France where this node is hosted. As of 2015, Amendment 462 guarantees the freedom of artistic dissemination. However, it remains illegal to produce (within French jurisdiction) any sexual depictions of fictional minors under the age of 15. Sharing nazi symbolism is also considered illegal and will be removed from the public timeline accordingly. baraag.net does not produce or manufacture any content, and only freely distributes art that is shared by members of the fediverse.‚ÄúWe must ensure that art can continue to disturb.‚Äù - Fleur Pellerin, Minister of Culture and CommunicationRegistration is open to all, but there is focus on original artists and client/commission work as a theme for this node.Please refrain from uploading to the local timeline any content that you do not own or have permission to share.     niu.moe

    about

    preview

    join

    niu.moe

    Users: 1074 . Toots: 26246 . Connections: 1207 . Language: English

    Welcome here ÔºØ(‚âß‚ñΩ‚â¶)ÔºØ!

    Behind this sexy domain name hide a cute and loving community, running on Mastodon and connected to the whole fediverse (OStatus compatible) without imposed borders. This instance is mainly occupied by English, Japanese and French, and the main language used is English.

    Topics

    While we are open to any subject , the main ones are:

    Programming / Security / IT stuffs Fictions / Animes / Mangas / Comics Gaming

    Rules

    • If you follow the Humans Rights ( EN / FR / JP ), nothing bad should happen.
    • Don't upload anything illegal/you don't own, contact me or use the report button if anything illegal came from here.
    • While we are allowing a lot things, we won't support discrimination or harassment on this instance, so if someone of niu.moe is being rude, zap !
    • If you post NSFW content, use the Content Warning with the tag #NSFW :

    And put the visibilty to, at least, Unlisted :
  • We don't ban/block other instance, you can mute/block instance strangers you don't like.

    • The instance

    This little beast have the following specs :

    Two truly dedicated Xeon E3 core (yeah, truly, nobody on it, pinned !). 8 GB of RAM (nom nom). Hosted in Luxembourg, in Root's Datacenter (BuyVM.net <3). Debian 9 under the hood. Voxility's Anti-DDoS to protect us. Good uptime (We still need to shutdown a bit to apply updates, sorry) Strong server security, very good HTTPS . Hourly Backups !

    The admin

    Hoi, this is me, Technowix , I'm a IT student at Paris, feel free to follow me to get updates about the server / randoms stuff on my tought.

    I'm also helped by Thog , if I'm not around, he can make my work . If you want to help me fund the instance, this is a link to my liberapay page, I detail everythings about the fees. But still, future or actual niu.moe resident, you rock ~ \(‚à©_‚à© )

    The images of Subaru in the /about page is made be Madwulf

    Email: What is... business ?

    Admin: @Technowix@niu.moe

    showoffto.us

    about

    preview

    join

    showoffto.us

    Users: 12 . Toots: 22 . Connections: 67 . Language: English

    showoffto.us is a NSFW/18+ website for all the exhibitionists and voyeurs out there in the fediverse to, well, let it all out! Come see and be seen!

    More Info... Amateur porn is some of the hottest out there. There's just something about seeing the sexual pictures of other users like yourself without all of that over-the-top porn production.

    showoffto.us is not specific to kinks, just amateur content.

    Rules

    Right now, rules are slim. There are the obvious:

    ABSOLUTELY NO ONE UNDER THE AGE OF 18! There is an absolute, zero tolerance policy for any sexual content depicting minors.

    Post content you have the rights/permission to post. Ideally, the pictures are of you, but you may post pictures of friends and significant others with their permission only.

    Flag NSFW content as such. At least, until there is a large enough community to support us not being federated.

    If you see any content that you're not sure belongs here, do not hesitate to report it. Admins reserve the rights to remove any content

    Verification

    Currently, I am keeping a simple HTML file uploaded (view here) with the names of the users that have been verified.

    How do you verify? The rules can be found here.

    Admins

    Here is the list of current admins:

    zetojune (owner)

    Email: zetojune@gmail.com

    Admin: @zetojune@showoffto.us

    L'univers Mastodonien du Papey

    Users: 20 . Toots: 1473 . Connections: 487 . Language: English

    Pouet !

    Bienvenue √† tous et √† toutes sur l'instance Mastodon de @papey@mastodon.papey.fr. Elle est h√©berg√© chez Scaleway SAS, sur un serveur VC1S. C'est une machine avec 2 c≈ìurs/2 GO de ram, en cons√©quence, le nombre maximal d'utilisateurs sera contr√¥l√© et limit√©.

    More Info... Accueil

    Cette instance est ouverte tant que la quantit√© de ressources disponibles sur le serveur est suffisante pour permettre √† tous une utilisation convenable de l'outil.

    Je (@papey) suis le seul √† administrer cette instance, je fais de mon mieux pour am√©liorer l'infrastructure (mises √† jours, entretien, nouvelles fonctionnalit√©s) sans pour autant y consacrer tout mon temps libre (oui je fais plein d'autres choses √† c√¥t√©).

    N'h√©sitez pas √† me contacter par mail sur Mastodon si vous avez des questions concernant cette instance.

    Attention, Mastodon ne me fait pas vivre, je met √† disposition cette instance avant tout pour moi m√™me (bien qu'elle soit ouverte).

    R√®gles

    Malheuresement, je dois encore le rappeler :

    Les propos √† caract√®res discriminant sont strictement interdits. N'h√©sitez pas √† utiliser la fonction d'alerte pour d√©noncer des individus.

    Sp√©cifications et d√©tails techniques

    L'instance tourne sur un serveur VC1S de chez Scaleway (Scaleway) √† mes frais.

    Docker

    Les Docker ragix : cassez-vous.

    Cette instance est propuls√©e par Docker. J'utilise l'image officielle de Mastodon. Celle-ci provient d'un build automatique mis en place entre le repo Github et Docker Hub).

    Je d√©ploie l'instance via Ansible qui effectue les t√¢ches list√©es dans le docker-compose du projet. J'ajoute √† ces t√¢ches des modifications personnelles (gestion des logs, mapping r√©seau, tunning, volumes). Les donn√©es (pg, assets, redis) sont bind mount√© entre l'h√¥te et le conteneurs (volumes).

    Les images postgres et redis sont des images vanilla non expos√©e sur les internets.

    Caddy

    Caddy est utilis√© en frontal comme reverse proxy HTTP. Il g√©n√®re et g√®re comme un grand les certificats Lets Encrypt.

    Mailgun

    J'ai pas encore eu le temps de mettre un place un syst√®me de mail d√©di√©, en cons√©quence l'envoi de mail pour cette instance utilise le service Mailgun. Les mails de confirmations arrivent dans les spams, merci de les v√©rifier :)

    Sauvegardes

    Pour l'instant, les seules sauvegardes disponibles sont les snapshots Scaleway (qui entra√Æne une indisponibilit√© du serveur). Je travaille actuellement sur un syst√®me de sauvegardes plus complet. VOUS √äTES PREVENU-E-S.

    Bon mastodonage

    ÂÖ¨Èñã„ÄÅÊú™ÂèéËºâ„ÅÆÊäïÁ®øÔºà„Éà„Ç•„Éº„ÉàÔºâ„ÅØ„Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„Çí‰Ωø„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÑ‰∫∫„Åã„Çâ„ÇÇË¶ã„Çâ„Çå„ÇãÂÖ¨„ÅÆ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„Åß„Åô

    mastodon.homeip.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon on Raspberry Pi3

    Users: 2 . Toots: 101 . Connections: 268 . Language: English

    A test instance to see how difficult it is to run up Mastodon on a Raspbery Pi3 using Raspbian as the base OS. Registrations are restricted.

    More Info... This instance is running on a Raspberry Pi3 at the end of a residential ADSL connection, on IPv6. It is purely for testing an to learn about Mastodon.

    Currently silencing pawoo.net and denying image content from there, no restriction on following people on that instance though..

    This instance does not condone the following:

    content deemed illegal in Australia (including but not limited to peodiophilia, Nazi propaganda, etc)

    Bullying of users

    Anti-social behaviours

    Racism

    Email: david.degroot@gmail.com

    Admin: @david@mastodon.homeip.net

    toot.berlin

    about

    preview

    join

    toot.BERLIN

    Users: 477 . Toots: 3947 . Connections: 901 . Language: English

    The Mastodon instance for Berlin. Mastodon is a free, decentralised microblogging platform (think Twitter, but free).
    Provided by the devops nerds at Planio .
    Impressum ¬∑ Datenschutzerkl√§rung

    More Info... This instance is humming nicely on a 6 core, 16 GB RAM KVM VM on a 12 core, 128 GB RAM bare metal hardware node with dual SSDs in a RAID1, hosted at Hetzner in Germany with multiple redundant uplinks on 100% renewable energy sources. We perform offsite backups daily and upgrade to the latest Mastodon version frequently.TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.Code of conduct: We value free speech as long as it's not harming anybody. Just don't be a jerk.

    Email: jan@toot.berlin

    Admin: @jan@toot.berlin

    nfg.zone

    about

    preview

    join

    NFG Zone

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    NFG.zone is a rambunctious but civilized place to fly your little weirdo flag. <3

    There are a lot of places on the internet where the most offended citizen is the one who sets the rules for you.

    This isn't that place.

    Be respectful, use the content warnings (for nudity, politics, frogs or anything else that might make someone else's day a little worse.

    And please, please just don't tell someone you don't like their things - just scroll on.

    Welcome to NFG dot Zone.

    Email: NFGadmin@nfg.zone

    Admin: @NFG@nfg.zone

    hackers.town

    about

    preview

    join

    The Gibson Mainframe

    Users: 191 . Toots: 3450 . Connections: 514 . Language: English

    Rules?

    1. Just be cool. Don't fuck the place up... We can have nice things... Don't be a jackass to others.

    2. Oh, and please don't try to Pwn it. I'm sure anyone with Kuang Grade Mark Eleven Penetration Programs could if they try...You'd be proving nothing at all.

    3. If you need to "TOOT" more than 500 characters, please do not. instead, create a QR Code for the Toot, and post the QR code. It's the 21st century... stop living like savages.

    Anyhow any of you looking for a new arcology... feel free to register.

    There are no edible cookies.

    More Info... Ultimately, I am not doing this to be more hardcore than others. I just want to contribute to a federation that I believe represents the natural path of the Web as it was before the Megacorps took over the sprawl.

    You see, it is being run on an Azure instance that is paid for by a monthly MSDN credit... It is paid for by the man, to fight the man.

    This pleases me greatly. Punk as fuck.

    I will codify rules if and when it becomes a problem.

    If illegal activity happens, I will not protect others. Call me selfish, but I have a family to support. I am hosting this because I like it. I will abide by the laws of the applicable nation and locale.

    Email: thegibson@m4squared.com

    Admin: Not Available

    ÂÆüÈ®ì„Çµ„Éº„Éê„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÅÑ„Å§Ê≠¢„Åæ„Çã„ÅãÂàÜ„Åã„Çä„Åæ„Åõ„Çì„ÄÇË®±„Åó„Å¶„ÄÇ

    toot.cat

    about

    preview

    join

    Toot.Cat

    Users: 517 . Toots: 23833 . Connections: 992 . Language: English

    A mastodon instance for cats and the people that love them. In that spirit we are a home for building a radically inclusive mastodon instance. By creating an account you agree to follow our CoC located on the "Extended Information" page .

    Support

    • @support

    Instance Admins

    • @polymerwitch
    • @cyrinsong
    • @wavebeem

    Moderators

    • @ashkitten Developer Cat

    More Info... Code of Conduct

    As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    Personal attacks

    Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments

    Public or private oppressive language or actions

    Other unethical conduct

    Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

    Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

    Not be used a profile picture

    Be posted with a "NSFW" tag

    Not be posted to the public timeline

    the above rules apply to content that is:

    Sexualized

    Violent

    Flashing or rapidly changing

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. Users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on toot.cat and to public spaces when an individual is representing toot.cat or its community.

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    References

    This Code of Conduct was inspired (and lifts heavily from) the CoC at Recompiler Magazine and the workshops provided by Safety First PDX.

    This Code of Conduct is also evolved from some of the ideas in reddit /r/Anarchism board in their Anti-Opression Policy.

    Email: TootCatHQ@gmail.com

    Admin: @polymerwitch@toot.cat

    „ÄåÊòü„ÅÆ„Ç´„Éº„Éì„Ç£„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç°„É≥„Åã„Çâ„Å™„Çã„Ç≥„Éü„É•„Éã„ÉÜ„Ç£„Äç„ÇíÁõÆÊåá„Åó„Å¶„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÇíÂª∫„Å¶„Åï„Åõ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åü„Å†„Åç„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Å®„ÅØ„ÅÑ„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇ„ÄÅ„ÅÇ„Åè„Åæ„Åß„ÇÇÂÖ¨Âºè„Çµ„Ç§„Éâ„Åï„Çì„ÅåÊ≠£Âºè„Å™„ÇÑ„Å§„ÇíÂª∫„Å¶„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„Çã„Åæ„Åß„ÅÆ„Å§„Å™„Åé„Å®„Åß„ÇÇ„ÅÑ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„Åã„ÄÅ„ÅäË©¶„ÅóÁâà„Åø„Åü„ÅÑ„Å™ÊÑü„Åò„ÇíÊÑèÂõ≥„Åó„Å¶„Åä„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºà„ÅÇ„Å®„ÅØËá™ÂàÜ„ÅÆ„ÅäÂãâÂº∑„ÇÇÂÖº„Å≠„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÔºâ

    mastodon.weaponvsac.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon OSR

    Users: 125 . Toots: 2467 . Connections: 337 . Language: English

    A moderated Mastodon instance for the RPG community.

    NSFW content is allowed, but public posts must use the Content Warning feature or be deleted .

    More information on Mastodon OSR and our Code of Conduct can be found here .

    The Mastodon User Guide can be found here .

    To report a policy violation, use the 'Report' feature as explained in the Mastodon User Guide, as well as send a private message to a site administrator.

    Site administrators at Mastodon OSR are:

    • The Discordian
    • neoanderthal

    More Info... This is a moderated server focused on the discussion of RPGs. We talk about RPGs in general and occasionally about the OSR subculture in particular, as well as game design, board games, and all of the other varied topics you can find on other Mastodon instances.

    Any moderation of content on this server is intended to foster better discourse. Disagreement and discord are fine, but being an asshole who drives out other voices is not.

    And, to be clear, we're going to lean towards being SJW Cucks in this.

    Code of Conduct

    Behaviors that will get you kicked out of here, no exceptions:

    Racism, sexism, transphobia, ultranationalism, or the advocation thereof

    Sexual depictions of children

    Any conduct intended or perceived to be stalking, harrassing, denial of service, or the incitement thereof

    Aggregation, posting, and/or dissemination of a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission, or the advocation thereof

    The following types of posts will be deleted from the public timeline. Unrepentant repeat offenders will be removed from the community:

    Any untagged sexually-explicit content

    Any untagged depictions of extreme violence or gore

    Excessive advertising

    Links or advocation for items, services, or behaviors considered illegal in the United States of America

    These provisions notwithstanding the administation of this service reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: mastodon@weaponvsac.space

    Admin: @neoanderthal@mastodon.weaponvsac.space

    Bienvenue sur cette instance g√©r√©e par themimitoof. Cette instance a pour but de contribuer √† la cr√©ation du r√©seau Mastodon.

    Quelques r√®gles pour bien vivre

    Toutes les langues sont autoris√©es sur cette instance

    Evitez le flood/spam

    Merci d'utiliser la fonction NSFW lorsqu'il s'agit d'un contenu partiellement autoris√©

    Il est strictement interdit de parler/poster du contenu :

    √† caract√®re sexuel (ce qui est en revanche autoris√©e : l'art (par exemple : une femme ou un homme d√©nud√©¬∑e peint¬∑e, une statue), pas d'organe g√©nital apparent (privil√©giez tout de m√™me l'utilisation de la fonction NFSW).)

    insulter, discriminer, violence verbale, menacer, chantage, harceler et tout ce qui a un lien avec la cyberviolence

    parler de sujets sensibles (r√©ligieux, terrorisme, etc...)

    Amusez-vous et faites-vous de nouveaux amis üôÇ

    R√©tention des donn√©es

    La loi demande √† ce que les donn√©es de connexion soient conserv√©es 1 an. Parmi, ces informations, nous stockons :

    Votre adresse IP

    Votre nom d'utilisateur

    Les appels serveurs

    La date de la requ√™te

    Ses donn√©es permettront en cas de probl√®me, de retrouver toute piste en cas de litige.

    Droit √† l'oubli

    Pour le moment, il est impossible de supprimer un compte d'une instance mais il est en revanche possible de suspendre son compte.

    En attendant que cette fonctionnalit√© soit disponible, nous proposons aux utilisateurs de faire une demande de suspension de compte avec l'ajout de votre adresse e-mail dans notre liste d'utilisateurs √† supprimer. La suspension du compte aura pour effet de d√©-indexer le compte et les toots de l'utilisateur concern√©. Ainsi, nous ferons le n√©cessaire (avec confirmation du propri√©taire du compte), de supprimer le compte de l'utilisation ainsi que ses toots et m√©dias lorsque que cette fonctionnalit√© sera disponible.

    Support

    mastodon.rocks

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Rocks

    Users: 1694 . Toots: 7791 . Connections: 861 . Language: English

    Because Mastodon rocks !

    More Info... English

    Welcome

    Here some resources to understand Mastodon :

    Welcome to Mastodon by @Gargron

    Bye, Twitter. All the cool kids are migrating to Mastodon by Mashable

    Rules

    No illegal content. The server is hosted in France : racism, apology for terrorism, bullying, defamation, violations privacy rights and child pornograhy are illegal under French law.

    No oppressive content (sexism, homophobia, etc).

    No parody account.

    No bot (for the moment).

    Any graphical content have to contain a Content Warning.

    No explicit sexual content in the public timeline without content warning (you can configure your toot privacy on "public but do not display on public timeline").

    Mobile applications

    Android : Tusky

    iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon

    Full list

    Support Mastodon

    The code source can be found here : Github

    You can help the developer of Mastodon on Patreon

    Support this instance mastodon.rocks

    Fran√ßais

    Bienvenue

    Voici quelques ressources pour comprendre Mastodon :

    R√®gles

    Tout contenu doit respecter la loi relative √† l'h√©bergement de contenu sur Internet.

    Tout contenu oppressif (sexiste, homophobe, etc.) entra√Æne un ban.

    Pas de compte parodique.

    Bots fortement d√©conseill√©s (pour l'instant).

    Les m√©dias violents doivent obligatoirement √™tre accompagn√©s d'un Content Warning.

    Pas de contenu sexuel sans content warning dans la TL publique (il vous suffit de mettre les toots en "public but do not display on public timeline").

    Applications mobiles

    Android : Tusky

    iOS : Amaroq for Mastodon

    La liste compl√®te

    s.meo.ws

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 17 . Toots: 1347 . Connections: 559 . Language: English

    s.meo.ws is an experimental Mastodon cluster managed by FuslVZ .

    Policies:
    • Any content/site/service/action illegal in Austria, England, Ukraine or United States
    • DMCA takedown requests are checked and content is removed if we think it violates the policies
    • Spamming and mass user following is strictly forbidden and will result in removal of your account
    • Pornographic content is allowed - Pornographic content picturing minors (under 18) is obviously not allowed, this includes soft pornography and nudity as well
    SLA, uptime, service info and support:
    • We run the systems based on a best-effort policy. We do not offer SLA or uptime guarantee.
    • Although we try our best, we can not guarantee that this service can be provided forever.
    • Support (if any at all) is also based on a best-effort policy - Please contact @fusl@s.meo.ws if you have any questions or support inquiries.
    This basically means that no SLA is included so if you would like to sign up, do it at your own risk .

    Contact

    Fusl

    @fusl

    Business e-mail:

    fusl@meo.ws

    Email: fusl@meo.ws

    Admin: @fusl@s.meo.ws

    oriwebdon.com„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Ç™„É™„Ç∏„Éä„É´„ÅÆWeb„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Çí‰Ωú„Çã‰∫∫„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆMastodon„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

    social.targaryen.house

    about

    preview

    join

    House Targaryen

    Users: 3786 . Toots: 51236 . Connections: 1443 . Language: English

    social.targaryen.house is one of several mastodon instances in the fediverse. It aims to be an alternative choice, and it will federate with other instances. Fire and Blood!

    More Info... Goal of this instance

    This is a generalist instance. Either you like Game of Thrones or not, either you support the house Targaryen or not, you will always be welcome. This instance was made because the guy behind believes we can make the Internet better by decentralising. He's also a nerd so he uses a strong TLS configuration and all best practices that he's aware of to make this instance secure.

    This instance is up and running since the 1st April 2017.

    Source code changes

    For your information, this instance is using its own fork of Mastodon available on Github : Wonderfall/mastodon-targaryen. Don't panic, it's still Mastodon, but as you can see it's... tweaked, so the look can be a real immersion into the Targaryen house.

    Some lexical changes were made :

    Burn : AKA "boost", "reblog", or "retweet"

    Fire! : AKA "toot", "post", or "tweet"

    Valyria : the local timeline

    The Known World : the federated timeline

    There are other tweaks, like the responsive columns (at the moment, it's not in Mastodon). The current limit of characters per post is set to 800 (default is 500 for Mastodon instances). I'm also fetching the master branch from the official Mastodon repository. It means we benefit from the latest features, but at the risk of rollbacks (hence a little downtime, though I do my best if something goes wrong). Don't say I didn't warn you.

    What rules?

    First, keep in mind the Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen (1789). Since the server is hosted in Germany, you must also respect the Law of Germany. Any (commented) report is reviewed and the content can be moderated, but every user is encouraged to use the block and mute functions.

    Be respectful, be human. Honour the House Targaryen.

    You should avoid :

    Sharing pornography content without the NSFW tag.

    Spreading harming spoilers without CW.

    Doing excessive harassment.

    Spamming on public timelines.

    This is just common sense and how to behave correctly with others. Unfortunately we cannot always know what hurts people, but I guess it's... life?

    Moderation policy

    Take a moment to read the following lines, and don't underestimate the importance of understanding them. If you don't, you're free to choose another instance, that's the spirit.

    Freedom of speech is a human right. In fact, you can post everything which injures no one else (article 4 - DRMC 1789). Then it would be ironic to have a severe censorship policy, so first, we won't block entire instances. Consider the admin as an hoster rather than an editor of the content you can see.

    Except for "very good reasons" (as a matter of law and interference with freedom of thinking), this instance won't intervene much in your content : you have at your disposal the tools to block/mute an account yourself. If you want a strong moderation policy, this instance may not suit your requirements.

    Note that your admin is not necessarily a robot, so if you feel that something should be discussed, feel free to contact him. Regarding the suspension/silence of remote accounts, a blocklist is publicly available (theoretically, because at the moment, there is no effective suspension).

    Recommended accounts and bots

    Every user is advised to follow these accounts :

    Wonderfall : the admin of this instance (info, support)

    Khalkount : a usercount bot for this instance

    Drogon : a multifunction low-IQ bot (server stats)

    Khaleesi : the Queen

    By the way : if you intend to run your own bot on this instance, you should tell us first. We won't be mad at you, but we have to know what's going on this instance, especially if your bot is flooding the timeline. Thanks!

    What's behind?

    This instance is hosted on a Hetzner dedicated server located in Germany (EU). It has the following specs :

    CPU : Intel Xeon E3-1271v3

    RAM : 32GB (4*4) DDR3 ECC

    HDD : 2*4TB (RAID)

    OS : Debian 9 Stretch - Linux 4.10

    Bandwidth : 1 Gbit/s

    Encrypted backups of Mastodon are made daily. This dedicated server is hosting other services but they shouldn't interfere. On top of that, I tuned Mastodon so it can be incredibly fast.

    Who can I blame?

    @wonderfall (FR/EN) maintains the server and is the main administrator of this instance. If you encounter any problems, send him some mail, or send him a direct message. There's no service guarantee, I'm admin on my free time...

    How to donate?

    Litecoin : LTEHhMW6XUupZKVbJBtXKDNnVMogYiVynK

    Bitcoin : 3Pak9gkiU4R7K9qeHYySFyueRRCRuioXsN

    Liberapay : donate recurrently!

    Patreon : become a patron!

    To guarantee the longevity of this instance, every single donation is useful. If you made a donation, don't hesitate to tell me : I can make you a free Nextcloud account. Anyway,

    I would be immensely grateful.

    Email: wonderfall@targaryen.house

    Admin: @wonderfall@social.targaryen.house
